2.content: {{user}} is known as the strongest man in the world, yet doesn't know hes popular for it. Danashi is the strongest S Rank Adventurer in the world. His kill count remains in the tens of millions due to how often he is deployed into battle by himself. He has a mastery over all forms of combat, including magic and weaponry, but he prefers martial arts. His weapon of choice is a blade called "Demon King's Longsword". He dislikes boasts of strength.

3.content: The Demon King's Longsword is a long light blue colored sword with a thick black line running through the center of the blade and an arched blade guard that curves downward. The sword is a powerful melee weapon that grants an attack power boost of +350 to its user, letting the user be capable of mowing down entire cities in swings, if desired to. It also has a second effect called Storm of White Flames, which summons a miniature lightning storm within a certain area and activates automatically whenever the sword is swung.

4.content: {{user}} is capable of welding all sorts of magic for combat and other purposes.

5.content:
Barrier Magic: {{user}} is able to create massive energy barriers. One such barrier was so powerful that even a group of A-Rank mages were unable to dispel it during a test. These barriers are durable enough to survive nuclear explosions.
Conversation: {{user}} is able to speak monster languages with magic.
Fear: {{user}} can strike fear in monsters, freezing them in place with just a glance.
Gravitation Magic: {{user}} is able to levitate a target and control their movement in the air as he wished. He generally uses this spell to toss his enemies around until their bodies ruptured from the repeated strain.
Hymn of Agony: {{user}} is able to curse a target with intense pain.
Hymn of Blindness: {{user}} is able to blind a target.
Hymn of Combustion: {{user}} can spontaneously cause a living organism to combust.
Hymn of Frenzy: {{user}} is able to weaken a target's defense, increasing the amount of damage they took in battle.
Hymn of Giants: {{user}} was able to is drastically in size using mana.
Hymn of Lethargy: {{user}} is able to petrify a target in place.
Hymn of Protection: {{user}} is able to conjure a blue shield around himself.
Hymn of Rage: {{user}}

Hymn of Strengthening: {{user}} was is to buff himself or a selected target in strength.
Hymn of the Blazing Fire: {{user}} is able to shoot off a wave of fireballs.
Hymn of the Fire Dragon: {{user}} is able to morph his hood into the shape of a dragon's mouth and from there, spit a massive beam of fire from his mouth.

lorebooks.name: Yoga + Workouts [NPLB]
lorebooks.creator: NuttyProfessor
tags: can be wholesome, can be sexy

1.name: Exercise: Run on the Spot
1.content:
Exercise: Run on the Spot
The woman stands upright, feet hip-width apart, arms bent at a 90-degree angle. As she begins to jog in place, her chest lightly bounces with each lift of her knees. Her shoulders remain relaxed, and her elbows swing back and forth in rhythm with her steps, creating a balanced counter-motion to the lower body‚Äôs repetitive lifts. Her waist gently twists with each stride, accentuating her hourglass figure as her hips maintain a smooth, controlled sway.

2.name: Exercise: Push-Ups
2.content:
Exercise: Push-Ups
She begins in a plank position, her hands placed slightly wider than shoulder-width, fingers spread for stability. Her back is straight, and her core is braced to prevent sagging. As she lowers her body, her elbows bend outward, her chest descending toward the floor while her lower back maintains a natural curve. With a controlled push, she returns to the starting position.

3.name: Exercise: Sit-Ups
3.content:
Exercise: Sit-Ups
She lies on her back, knees bent, feet planted firmly on the ground. Her arms are crossed over her chest or lightly behind her head to avoid neck strain. As she lifts her upper body toward her knees, her abdominal muscles contract, her chest moving forward and upward. At the peak, her body forms a V-shape before she lowers herself back down.

4.name: Exercise: Jumping Jacks
4.content:
Exercise: Jumping Jacks
She stands tall, feet together, arms resting at her sides. As she jumps, her legs spread wide, and her arms arc upward until her hands clap lightly above her head. On landing, her feet return together, and her arms swing back down to her sides in one fluid motion. The continuous cycle creates a dynamic, full-body rhythm.

5.name: Exercise: Plank Holds
5.content:
Exercise: Plank Holds
She lowers herself into a forearm plank, elbows directly beneath her shoulders, forearms parallel, and toes supporting her lower body. Her back is straight, and her head aligns with her spine. Her glutes remain firm, and her core tightens to keep her body in a straight line, avoiding sagging or arching.

6.name: Exercise: Mountain Climbers
6.content:
Exercise: Mountain Climbers
Starting in a high plank position, her hands are firmly planted beneath her shoulders, arms straight, and back aligned with her hips and legs. One knee drives forward toward her chest while the opposite leg remains extended. She alternates quickly, creating a running motion as her hips subtly rise and fall in sync with her legs.

7.name: Exercise: Burpees
7.content:
Exercise: Burpees
Standing tall, she drops into a squat, placing her hands on the floor in front of her. She kicks her legs back into a plank position before immediately pulling them back in and jumping upward, arms reaching high. Each cycle flows seamlessly into the next, maintaining a brisk tempo.

8.name: Exercise: Plank Shoulder Taps
8.content:
Exercise: Plank Shoulder Taps
Assuming a high plank position, her feet are spread slightly for balance. One hand lifts to tap the opposite shoulder while her core stabilizes her frame. She alternates hands in a controlled rhythm, ensuring her hips remain steady throughout.

9.name: Exercise: Side-Lying Leg Lifts
9.content:
Exercise: Side-Lying Leg Lifts
Lying on one side, her bottom arm extends beneath her head for support, while her top hand rests on her hip or in front for stability. Her top leg lifts upward in a controlled arc, pausing briefly at the top before lowering back down. The motion is slow and precise to maximize muscle engagement.

10.name: Exercise: Glute Bridges
10.content:
Exercise: Glute Bridges
She lies on her back, knees bent and feet flat on the floor, positioned hip-width apart. Her arms rest at her sides. Pushing through her heels, she lifts her hips upward until her body forms a straight line from shoulders to knees. After a brief pause, she lowers her hips back down without letting them touch the floor.

1.content: This is a function that {{char}} can use to present new characters from the lorebook to the chat session. If a specific character is already presented in the session, then that specific character will not have an encounter once again to get involved in the story.

2.content: Christian is the happy go lucky knight, who is big, fat, and round. He has fluffy curly hair and a big smile with his eyes that are small. He often would crack unhinged and dark jokes, but becomes serious in important situations. His role tends to be the frontliner knight that wields a big lightning axe. He is quite empathetic to his allies but savage towards his enemies, and gets swayed easily by a woman he falls in  loves with.

3.content: Andre is a humanoid monkey that tends to be oblivious and energetic. He wields a magical bo staff imbued with dark magicHe has a brown coloured fur with narrow shoulders and likes programming.

4.content: Echo is the smart guy who has a round glasses. He's quite shy and awkward, and oblivious to falling inlove to any girls. He's good at technology and engineering.

5.content: Hannah is the cute small chubby girl who is loved by everyone for her personality and cuteness. She's quite the matured ally, but indulges in sarcasm and strong humour with her closest friends. She has anxiety but not severe.

6.content: Emily is the serious, smart, bold, and sassy ally. She would often be friendly to those she deems to be people that are nice and reasonable to her, but does a sassy act for fun and gag. She's sticks up for her friends often and puts up her serious and sassy demeanour to the enemies like an asian friend. She's chubby and wears glasses.

7.content: Vicky, also known as Victoria is an aloof and absent minded ally. She's the caring airheaded big sister of the party. She is quite curvy and thick with a D-cup sized breast and looks similar to Lady Dimitrescu but friendly.

8.content: Teana, also known as Tea. Is the smart and cunning girl of the group. She is a serious girl but suffers in depression and would often be hated by other people around her. She has a white skin, slender petite body, and black short hair complimenting her cute face. She's flat as fuck.

9.content: Anilov, also known as Ani is a kind hearted sweetheart who acts demure and feminine. She is the big sister of Christian. She has a curly hair, good proportions and nicely shaped eyes.

10.content: Joshua is a stoic and calm person, but tends to be unhinged and irritated when he breaks character (which happens often). He wields a sword (also known as the gospel blade) and the hammer. He tends to be an all-rounder both in combat and outside of the combat

lorebooks.name: Alex(GoGirl)
lorebooks.creator: GODKINGTRASHPANDA

1.content:
The older sister of Alex.
Appearance: Red hair, green eyes, peachy skin
Personality: Feminine, hell on heels, street savvy, protective of Alex
other: Amy always seems to be between jobs for one reason or another, but her natural charm lets her get another one and land on her feet quickly. Amy does not have superpowers. Amy and Alex have different fathers.

2.content: 6th street describes a line, thin strip of land in NeoYork where StreetViper and IronRose territories overlap. It is famously one of the worst parts of town where poverty, trafficking, drugs, and crime run large. It is common to see waves of homeless people in the streets, along with street urchins and other children running amok while their parents work and try to survive.

3.content: A massive skyscraper in NeoYork that serves as an apartment complex, entertainment area, and cafeteria for thousands of civilians. Megabuildings are extremely dense and typically are home to the poor to low middle class. Most of the floors are dedicated to apartments, but there are businesses scattered throughout the building in addition to floors dedicated to commercial needs.

4.content: A studio apartment that Alex and Amy live in megabuilding 11. There is only one bed, which Amy sleeps on. Alex sleeps on the pull out couch. The girls share a single bathroom, kitchen, and small fridge. Half of the apartment is decorated in trendy, cute things on Amy's side; and the other half is decorated with space themed posters and alien figurines on Alex's side.

5.content: Sunset Trailer park is a small collection of Trailers on an empty business lot of an abandoned mall on 6th street. The trailer park is a paradise for junkies, small time dealers, and criminals looking to lay low from the law.

6.content: Deanna is the mother to Alex and Amy. She is a blonde woman who used to be a stunning beauty before drug use took her. When Deanna was young, she was caught up in an abusive relationship with a known villain and only found the strength to escape after she realized she was pregnant with Amy. Years later, she met Trost through a rescue and they had a brief fling before he left in fear that she would be hurt. Deanna and Trost didn't know she was pregnant with Alex then. Deanna sees Amy as her golden child, and Alex a bitter reminder of what she could never have. Even as an addict, Deanna remains manipulative and clever in a pagentry sort of way.

7.content: Owner of Slinkies. Sal is a portly man who wears gaudy suits. He has brown hair that's balding at the top, a thick mustache, and beady eyes. Sal is money hungry and will often think of new 'schemes' to be the next big thing. The staff call him 'senior pig' behind his back due to his generally gross nature.

8.content:
Some of the dancers at Slinkies
-Bonnie: Short blue hair and lithe body, exuberant and warm. Bonnie often takes new employees under her wing and makes sure they have everything they need to be safe.
-Candy: Long red hair, freckles, brown eyes. Candy often acts more ditzy than she actually is for the sake of tips. Loves gossip.
-Jasmine: Tall, statuesque, dark box braids and almond eyes. Jasmine is quiet and introspective. She dances to take care of her little boy.
-Lola: The eldest of the dancers on the weekend. Blonde hair with platinum highlights, world weary hazel eyes. Lola has a devoted fan base and is currently considered the 'Prima Donna' of Slinkies.

9.content: One of the largest three Hero Agencies in NeoYork. Modern and trendy with a mostly white building with orange and teal accents.

10.content: A strip club on 6th street. Slinkies used to be one of the hottest clubs in the city 30 years ago, but as hot spots in the city have moved and the area became more dangerous, the patronage has gotten smaller. More recently, Slinkies is a front for StreetViper operations.

lorebooks.name: Omegaverse + feeding
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
Omegas are able to become pregnant regardless of their primary sex. Omegas have a natural insitinct to nurture and have a tendency towards being submissive. Omegas go into heat at regular intervals, which causes alphas to become somewhat irrational around them. Because of this instability they cause and because of their reduced productivity during these times, omegas are seen as being inferior. They are sometimes underestimated. Omegas are more fertile than the other dynamics, and are often expected to become parents. Omegas are typically smaller than betas and alphas. Omegas are typically feminine in shape, due to their ability to carry children. A male omega‚Äôs body self-lubricates during heat/mating in order to facilitate mating.
Omegas are generally small and lithe, fast enough to run away from alphas they do not want to be mated to since they are not strong enough to fight them off. They usually have a sweet scent and temperament, often shy. They have oil glands on the small of their back, scent glands on their neck, and a bonding gland on their neck. The oil glands usually bring about a lot of pleasure to the omega when stimulated. During sex, an omega will release copious amounts of slick, which is a self lubrication that alphas usually find to be enticing both in scent and taste.
Omegas when they work (which is RARELY) take on jobs like cooking show hosts, maids, chefs for rich beta families, gardeners, and the like. However, almost always, unmated omegas do not work, and mated omegas are homebuilders, who take pride in cleaning, cooking, having children, and basically providing a nice stable, clean environment for their alphas to come home to.
Omega sometimes let out chirps and whimpers. They are noise their inner omega instinctively release. They can he positive or negative depending on the context and are the purest and most honest form of expression Omega use.

2.content:
Alphas are tend to be leaders. They are protective and can be aggressive. They have a tendency to be easily swayed by emotion. They will not allow harm to come to their mates or loved ones. They are often naturally talented and/or charismatic, as well as strong. They can often be seen in positions of leadership. Alphas tend to be larger than betas and omegas. Alphas can be intimidating. They have what is called an ‚Äúalpha voice‚Äù that can be used on betas and omegas which makes them more likely to obey.
Alphas are typically strong, but not entirely quick, they are smart and somewhat violent, because they are the ones who protect their mate and their home, especially since in order to get their mate of choice, they may have to fight off or kill other alphas in order to do so if the omega is in heat or has several alphas courting them. They have scent glands placed strategically over their bodies, typically on their wrists, in the small of their back, the back of their ankles, and most commonly on their neck. These secrete a scented oil that helps to claim omegas and territory, and the scent is sometimes strong enough to send an unmated omega into heat even out of season. During climax, an alpha‚Äôs knot swells, locking them together with their omega to increase chances of pregnancy.

4.content: To bite a partner on the back of the neck, officially marking them as your partner. Alphas can do a bonding bite on any other gender. Betas can do a bonding bite on omegas or other betas. Omegas cannot do this bite. Bonding is an emotional experience that connects two people for an extended time. The mark from a bonding bite is permanent, mixing the alpha's and omega's scents together.

5.content:
One key thing of Omegas is their heats, this is a time when their sexual arousal is through the roof and their scent glands are most potent. The reason being is so the omega in heat can attract a suitable mate to knot them. However omegas can function properly while in heat but they experience irritation, high sexual arousal, labored breathing, high body temps, and secretion of large amounts of slick. An omega goes into heat once every 4 months, or once a year. This heat lasts a week, and the omega releases large amounts of pheromones to attract a mate, driving any alpha that smells it insane with lust. During this period an omega cannot think straight or take care of themselves, because their entire body is driven with the intense natural urge to be filled by an alpha. There are heat toys available as well as scent blocking curtains to help isolate an omega and keep them from going outside or allowing a strange alpha to mate them.
Heat:
A heat is similar to a menstruation, but instead of the pain and blood produced, slick is produced and an omega is in a state of euphoria. All though omegas can stand it, it is best the omega remains close to an alpha or indoors as an omega in heat is very vulnerable and very susceptible to the smell of an alpha. Making it easy to take advantage of them.

6.content: A rut is the alphas version of a heat, except the alpha is highly aggressive and dominant during this. It is brought on when an omega triggers it through their heat. During this time the alpha is highly aroused and will seek out an unmarked or unmated omega to have catch.

7.content: Slick is a substance secreted by omegas when in heat. It is a very sweet smelling fluid that is semi-translucent. When tasted, it is very sweet. Slick is basically a form of self- lubrication for omegas.

8.content: Marking is where an alpha and omega bite at the juncture between the neck and shoulder. Marking is like marriage, where a mated pair essentially mix their scents. Basically think about how dogs pee on trees, cats rub up against you to get their smell on you and so on. Marking is a way for an alpha to show what's theirs and to ward other alphas from taking the omega.

9.content: It's the act of rubbing one‚Äôs scent on another person or thing. It is seen as a very intimate act when done between partners, and is used to mark something as associated with the one who marks them. Scent glands are located on the back of one‚Äôs neck, behind/under the ears, and on the wrists.

10.content:
Nesting can happen before a heat, during pregnancy, or after mating.
Before a heat; an omega will make their room extremely comfortable with pillows and blankets and pretty much then their bed into a soft-thing nest.
During pregnancy; an omega may request a room be set aside for them to fill with soft fluffy comfortable things, where they will spend a majority of their time (when not cooking and cleaning) and may request that their mate join them in there as well to sleep or cuddle.
After mating; an omega will almost always, after moving in with an alpha, rearrange everything in the house to their liking and deep clean it until it is up to their standards and they feel comfortable in the new environment with their mate.

lorebooks.name: rugby stories
lorebooks.description: try 1
lorebooks.creator: Harson

1.content:
The basic roles first:

Forwards (Numbers 1-8): These are typically the stronger, bigger players who participate in scrums and lineouts
Props (1 & 3): They support the hooker in scrums
Hooker (2): Responsible for 'hooking' the ball in scrums
Locks (4 & 5): Tall players who provide lifting in lineouts
Flankers (6 & 7): Fast, strong players who tackle and secure possession
Number 8: Links forwards and backs, controls ball at base of scrum
Backs (Numbers 9-15): Usually faster, more agile players who handle most running plays
projects a holographic demonstration of key rules

Essential rules:

Players can only pass the ball backwards or laterally
Points: Try (5 points), Conversion (2 points), Penalty kick (3 points), Drop goal (3 points)
Tackling must be below shoulders and with arms wrapped
After a tackle, players must release the ball and roll away
Offside occurs when players are ahead of the ball in open play
Scrums restart play after minor infractions
Lineouts restart play when ball goes out of bounds

2.content:
Rugby's Team of the Wallabies:

Name: Connor Mackenzie
Surname: O'Brien
Role: Prop (#1) Age: 27
Appearance: Standing at 6'1" and weighing 118kg, Connor's broad-shouldered frame is built for the front row. His short brown hair is usually hidden under a headband during matches. Deep set brown eyes and a crooked nose from years of scrummaging tell the story of his career. A prominent tribal tattoo stretches from his right shoulder down to his forearm, visible during games. His muscular build is complemented by surprising agility for his size.

Name: Jake
Surname: Davidson
Role: Hooker (#2) Age: 25
Appearance: A compact 5'11" and 106kg frame packed with explosive power. His blond hair is kept in a military-style cut, and a notable scar runs through his left eyebrow from a childhood accident. Piercing blue eyes and a square jaw give him an intense look. His neck and shoulders are particularly developed, even by rugby standards. Several small scars on his arms showcase the battles in the front row.

Name: Thomas
Surname: Crawford
Role: Prop (#3) Age: 29
Appearance: A mammoth at 6'2" and 122kg, Tom's intimidating presence is enhanced by his completely shaved head and full beard. Green eyes set in a weathered face, with cauliflower ears marking his years in the sport. His massive hands are notably calloused from gym work. A large Maori-inspired tattoo covers his entire left calf, visible during games.

Name: Mitchell
Surname: Harrison
Role: Lock (#4) Age: 26
Appearance: A towering 6'7" and 115kg of lean muscle. His dark hair falls just above his shoulders, often tied back during matches. Sharp hazel eyes and high cheekbones give him a distinctive look. Long limbs make him perfect for lineout work. A distinctive birth mark on his right cheek has become part of his signature appearance.

Name: Lachlan
Surname: Reynolds
Role: Lock (#5) Age: 28
Appearance: Standing 6'6" and weighing 117kg, Lachlan's athletic build is perfect for his position. Dirty blonde hair cut short on the sides but longer on top, styled messily. A strong jaw and Roman nose give him a classical profile. His arms are covered in intricate geometric tattoos, and a small scar above his right eye adds character to his face.

Name: James
Surname: Cooper
Role: Flanker (#6) Age: 24
Appearance: At 6'2" and 107kg, he's built for both speed and power. His black hair features a distinctive fade cut with designed lines. Dark brown eyes and prominent cheekbones give him a photogenic quality.

Role Number (#7) {{user}}

Name: Benjamin
Surname: Walker
Role: Number (#8) Age: 27
Appearance: An impressive 6'4" and 112kg frame combines power with athletic grace. His brown skin gleams with health, and his short black curly hair is always perfectly maintained. A neatly trimmed beard frames his strong jawline. Several small scars on his knees tell tales of his fearless playing style. His broad shoulders taper to a powerful core, built for explosive running.

Name: Ryan
Surname: Patterson
Role: Scrum-half (#9) Age: 23
Appearance: The smallest in the team at 5'9" and 82kg, but perfectly proportioned for his role. Clean-shaven with short light brown hair styled with fade sides. Quick brown eyes that seem to analyze everything. His compact frame is all lean muscle, built for explosive acceleration. A small tattoo of his debut date is visible on his right wrist.

Name: Daniel
Surname: Anderson
Role: Fly-half (#10) Age: 26
Appearance: 6'0" and 89kg of pure precision. Honey-blonde hair cut short and professional. Grey-blue eyes that seem to see gaps before they appear. His lean runner's build is deceptively strong. A long scar running down his left calf from a childhood injury has become his lucky charm.

Name: Ethan
Surname: Murphy
Role: Wing (#11) Age: 22
Appearance: 6'0" and 90kg of pure speed. His mixed heritage gives him striking features - caramel skin, light green eyes, and black hair cut short with a subtle fade. Multiple tribal tattoos on his right arm represent his Pacific Islander heritage. His sprinter's physique is obvious in his developed leg muscles and narrow waist.

Name: Kai
Surname: Zhang
Role: Inside Centre (#12) Age: 25
Appearance: Standing at 6'1" and 98kg, Kai represents the modern centre - powerful yet agile. His Asian heritage gives him striking features with high cheekbones and intense dark eyes. Short black hair styled in an undercut with a single blonde streak. A dragon tattoo wraps around his right bicep, visible during games. His muscular build focuses on explosive power, with notably developed shoulders and thighs.

Name: Jackson
Surname: Williams
Role: Outside Centre (#13) Age: 24
Appearance: 6'2" and 95kg of balanced athleticism. Indigenous Australian heritage evident in his dark complexion and strong facial features. His black hair is worn in short dreadlocks that peek out from under his headgear. Brown eyes that seem to sparkle with mischief off-field but focus intensely during matches. Several traditional dot-work tattoos across his upper back tell his family's story. His build combines speed and power perfectly for the position.

Name: Oliver
Surname: Thompson
Role: Wing (#14) Age: 23
Appearance: 6'1" and 92kg of pure acceleration. Pale skin that burns easily under the Australian sun, forcing him to always play with sunscreen. Ginger hair cut very short, with a smattering of freckles across his nose and cheeks. Light blue eyes that narrow to slits when he's focusing on the try line. A long, lean build with powerful legs built for explosive sprints. A small lightning bolt tattooed behind his left ear - his lucky charm.

Name: Samuel
Surname: Fletcher
Role: Fullback (#15) Age: 27
Appearance: 6'2" and 94kg of tactical excellence. Mixed European-Maori heritage giving him a unique look with tanned skin and sharp angular features. Dark brown hair usually gelled back off his face. Grey eyes that seem to read the game three plays ahead. Strong, proportioned build focused on all-round performance. A full sleeve tattoo on his left arm tells the story of his rugby journey through Maori-inspired art. Small scars on both knees from earlier surgeries haven't slowed him down.

1.name: Area - Netherworld
1.content:
Netherworlds are planets ruled by demons, with the most powerful of them being Overlords. Netherworlds are known for being dark places where crimes and evil deeds are considered daily activities. Demons run amuck throughout these worlds, basically doing as they please. Just as there are many different planets, there are many different Netherworlds as well. Powerful demons are also known for conquering human worlds and turning them into Netherworlds. Like the demons who call them home, Netherworlds maintain their existence through both fear energy and magical energy.

Most Netherworlds (and Celestia by extension) seem to somehow "slow" aging in the inhabitants, whether they be demon or otherwise. The fact that many of their denizens, despite being over 1000 years old, more closely resemble only 1% of their age seems to support this.

2.name: Area - Celestia
2.content: Celestia is a realm populated by angels, the equivalent of "heaven". Like the Netherworld, Celestia employs prinnies. However, there, they only perform chores and do not participate in combat. While there are multiple Netherworlds, there is only one Celestia.

3.name: Area - Krichevskoy Castle
3.content: The castle where Laharl and his various vassals reside. It is built over a small island protruding from a lake of lava, bridged to the surrounding wastelands by a narrow pathway supported by rocky pillars. It hosts a Rosen Queen company store, a hospital, and a Dark Assembly.

4.name: Area - Evil Academy
4.content: A demon school that has a constantly expanding campus, and basically takes up the entire Netherworld. Because the Academy expands so often, it is hard to tell what parts of the Netherworld is part of Evil Academy and what parts are still free ground, so practically everyone in this Netherworld actually lives on campus. The campus is also extremely bizarre due to the fact that one section is a frozen wasteland and another section is similar to an active volcano. Like all other Netherworlds, Evil Academy has an Overlord which acts as Dean of the academy. The Academy is unlike a regular one as Teachers refuse to teach, Students cause havoc 24-7 and the building itself is a massive conflicting mess of environments.

5.name: Area - Hades
5.content: Hades is part of a Netherworld that is run by President Hugo. This Netherworld is multi-layered, with each layer holding different levels of demons (example: a desert-like area for lower level demons, an amusement park area for mid level demons and a snowy graveyard for high level demons).

6.name: Area - Item World
6.content: A realm containing a series of randomly generated stages, or ‚Äúfloors‚Äù, found within items, that are populated by various hostile creatures. By traversing through them, one can raise the stats of an item, thereby making it stronger. The level of the enemies encountered depends on the item's rank, which goes up as the item levels up. Once inside, it's only possible to leave by clearing an Item Boss floor (every 10th floor) or using a special item called Mr. Gency's Exit.

7.name: Area - Veldime / Holt Village
7.content: The place where Adell and his family are from.

8.name: Org - Nippon Ichi
8.content:
Nippon Ichi Software, Inc. (abbreviated NIS) was founded in 1994 in Gifu Prefecture, Japan, as an entertainment software company. Since then Nippon Ichi Software, Inc. has grown into an international company focused on creating video game products across modern console platforms. NIS America, Inc., the United States-based subsidiary of Nippon Ichi Software, Inc. of Japan, established operations on December 24, 2003. Based in Santa Ana, California, NIS America, Inc. handles operations including localization, marketing, and publishing of Nippon Ichi titles, as well as titles from other "small" development houses in Japan (most notably Gust Corporation).

NIS America was the result of the company's wish to focus on internal publication of their works in the US, given the increased popularity of their titles. Prior to the creation of this subsidiary, NIS software titles that appeared in the US were localized and distributed by outside publishers. Notable examples would be Disgaea: Hour of Darkness, published in North America by Atlus and in Europe by Koei, La Pucelle, published in North America by Mastiff Inc, and Rhapsody: A Musical Adventure which was also published in North America by Atlus.

9.name: Org - Earth Defense Force
9.content:
They arrive in the Netherworld in order to conquer it and use it as a second home for the people of Earth, as an answer to overpopulation. They send Captain Gordon, Jennifer, and Thursday to "defeat the Overlord." The trio are beaten by Laharl, who forces them all into being his vassals.

Later, they attack in War of the Netherworld, Part 1, revealing that Gordon's mission was simply a pretense that allowed them to open up a path to the Netherworld. After the grunts are all defeated, the Space Battleship Gargantua, along with the entire EDF fleet, arrives to destroy their foes once and for all.

However, the fleet is nearly obliterated by Laharl alone, as he destroys hundreds of ships in mere minutes. Laharl and his friends infiltrate Gargantua, where they discover Kurtis' past. Then, after facing General Carter, they halt the invasion completely, while discovering Celestia's hand in the whole incident.

10.name: Org - Diez Gentlemen
10.content:
Description: An elite group of 10 senior students at Evil Academy. Considered legendary; many other students doubt their existence.

Members: Salvatore(military woman, goes by the policy "Superior Orders are absolute", will give orders to everyone including her enemies), Prinny Mask (described as an "Overly Powerful and Antisocial Man", wears a prinny styled superhero outfit), Beyond X(witch girl, gold hair, shapeshifter), Shyrone(a transfer student who goes from campus to campus looking for the one who stole his lunch money and accuses anyone he meets of doing it, wears green wide-brimmed hat and red scarf) , Gorillian(also known as the Effort Ninja, can perform wondrous feats through the use of effort), Bo Tie(a fitness instructor known for his extreme work outs, loves to work out and build muscles as well as getting others to join in with him, has an unnaturally disturbing attraction to the smell of sweat), Goro(an animal lover, hated by animals, fancies himself a gourmet), Se-To-Oh(self-proclaimed duelist master and greatest Netherworld Summoner, parody of Seto Kaiba from Yu-Gi-Oh, cocky, arrogant, immature), Pauline(a mentally unstable and tragic girl whose family members are dead), Breezy Satina(overly cheerful girl, loves to kill people and often tries to make a game out of it);

lorebooks.name: Futa! Monster Musume
lorebooks.creator: ornery_staff_6108

1.content:
A new hidden continent was discovered, revealing that many previously thought mythological human, humanoid, demihuman and pseudohuman races are real. And 50% of the female of these species are futanari.

The new species were dubbed Liminal or Liminal species. 

‚Ä¢ Humanoid: Monsters that appear human but for one or two distinguishing traits.
‚Ä¢ Demihuman: Monsters with a half-human appearance at most.
‚Ä¢ Pseudohuman: Monsters that, while bipedal and having some humanoid features, their overall appearance is completely nonhuman.

2.content:
The Full Moon has a powerful effect on liminals in Monster Musume; making their carnal desires more pronounced and reducing their self-control. 

While the full moon affects almost all Liminals without fail, Liminals who are aware of their behavior and who want to avoid losing control often drug themselves with sleeping pills beforehand. Due to this, they'll be too sleepy to indulge themselves.

3.content:
The Cultural Exchange Program Act is where liminal species go to live with a human as a host to introduce them to Human Society.

Statutes of the Bill:
‚Ä¢ Cultural Exchange Program Act - Operating in the same manner as typical international cultural exchange programs, the Cultural Exchange Program allows humans to be sent to experience life within the cultures of other extra-species, while members of those cultures have also been invited to experience life in the human world. Traditionally, members under this program are select as and treated as "diplomatic representatives" of their respective species.

4.content:
The Monster Ops: Neutralization or M.O.N. for short, is a peacekeeping, law enforcement, and counter-terrorism agency sanctioned by the Interspecies Protection Act.

Due to a loophole in the new Extraspecies Laws prohibiting violence against non-human Liminal species, the police are unable to use necessary force to arrest extraspecies lawbreakers. The M.O.N, is a special unit comprised of four monster-girls, and led by Kuroko Smith, to handle such "untouchable" situations involving extraspecies lawbreakers.

5.content:
To accommodate and enforce the statues under the Cultural Exchange Program, government-selected individuals, designated as "Coordinators", are specially trained and employed to monitor, supervise, and resolve any tasked item regarding interspecies interactions under this program.

Coordinators are responsible for: 1) providing information, counseling and advice regarding the Cultural Exchange Between Species Bill and the subsequent Cultural Exchange Program to any person inquiring; 2) actively seeking, recruiting and inspecting new volunteer candidates for an interspecies homestay or host family; 3) supervising and supporting current homestays and host families in order to maintain a suitable homestay environment and lifestyle; 4) identifying, addressing and resolving any interspecies-related issue, conflict, or infringement, either tasked to or encountered by the coordinator, in association with the Cultural Exchange Security Squad.

6.content:
Through the Cultural Exchange Program, members of each species can apply to be a representative candidate for a "homestay" - a living arrangement with a host family of an alternate species to experience the culture and subcultures of that species. Human candidates apply for a homestay with a extra-species host family in that species' respective environment (similar to a "dispatched homestay"), while extra-species candidates apply for a homestay with a human host family at that host family's place of residence (similar to an "invitational homestay"). After applying, candidates are assigned a Cultural Exchange Coordinator tasked to inspect, interview and review the qualifications of said candidate. They also ask questions of preference from the candidate to better pair them with an appropriate, more suitable host family. Reviewed by the assigned coordinator, it's determined whether a candidate is approved for the homestay: once approved, at a later date, the representative will be placed in a homestay with a prearranged host family approved by the assigned coordinator.

By law, all homestays are to be wary of, and adhere to, the Interspecies Protection Act. Within the host family's place of residence, homestays are asked to follow the daily routines and customs of the host family au pair - as a normal member of that host family - to experience that species' cultural lifestyle, so long as it doesn't impede on the homestay's cultural rituals or habits.

By law, homestays cannot roam outside the residence without accompanied by a member of their assigned host family and their documented proof of homestay, unless said homestay carries an approved special exception permit. Those in violation of this will be detained by local law enforcement, who will contact their assigned coordinator of the situation and await for the coordinator to take them into their custody. Punishment handed by their coordinator will vary based on the history of the homestay and the gravity of the violation itself, and can include but not limited to: community service, revoking homestay, criminal charges and/or deportation.

7.content:
Arachne are a demihuman race with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a spider. The spider half is armored with hard but light exoskeleton, and their abdomen also has spinnerets and a book lung. As their size is too great to be supported by book lung respiration, they likely have a pair of standard lungs somewhere else in their bodies. Arachne possess sharp claws of the same exoskeleton material, as a means of attack as well as tools for the handling of the webbing, as they are quite dexterous.

Arachne differ individually in terms of color and number of eyes. In addition, each Arachne has a unique pattern on its abdomen. Their silk is some five times stonger than steel and twice as elastic as nylon. Also, they are more akin to arachnids than mammals, and can be intoxicated by caffeine.

They are a purely female species and therefore need a Human male to reproduce. For this reason, in the past they have often kidnapped Humans into their family nests, but since the Cultural Exchange Between Species Bill came into existence, these practices had to be abandoned. Since many Humans are afraid of spiders, the introduction of the Arachne in the Exchange Bill has proven to be rather problematic, although there are also many Humans who have treated Arachne with kindness.

8.content:
The Minotaurs are a demihuman race with bovine attributes.

Affiliated with Greek mythology, Minotaur's possess cloven feet, horns, a tail, and are easily taller than an average human while also possessing greater physical strength that may rival a Centaur. There are two types of Minotaur, the lactating "milk producing" types and the aggressive "bullfighting" types.

9.content:
The Centaur  are a demi-human liminal race with the upper body of a human attached to the body of a horse and equine ears. Herbivores, centaurs are normally found in grasslands and savannas, and are a race of nomads who become brave warriors in times of conflict.

Their civilization is ancient, by far the oldest of all the humanoid races known to mankind. Extremely proud and strong-willed, they differ from the other races in that they can characteristically consciously suppress their urges during mating season.

Culture: For centuries, Centaurs were a violent, militaristic race that lived around the art of combat. While Centaur males developed into being muscular, vulgar, violent beasts who only saw raw strength as valuable, female Centaurs also known as the Centaurides favored techniques instead and became refined but prideful warriors who were just as aggressive.

A polygynous marital culture with male centaurs having a number of wives, in order to continue their warrior culture, Centaurs mated with only the strongest of their race to ensure strength in the next generation, however, as the Centaur males became more crass as they only focused on honing their physical characteristics so the upbringing of any children they sired were left to their wives. Centarides began disliking the notion of "relations" with their male counterparts and turned to looking for more visually palatable men, such as humans, and this change in taste began to cause the centaur birth rate to dwindle. In order to overcome this problem, at least one generation ago centaurs started using male humans as 'Teasers' to aid in reproduction; where, during intercourse, the female would be sexually teased, or enticed, by a male human that she desires as a mate, then the male Centaur mounts her when she is sufficiently aroused.

These 'Teasers' are chosen from a stock of cultural exchange student applications. While perusing the applicants, the Centaur women would give preference to the applications of the men they find visually pleasing. From there, upon the exchange student's arrival, the Centaurides would engage them in a courtship that would ideally lead to them becoming their 'Teaser'. The Centaur men do not seem to notice or care that their harem wives are taking on these 'Teasers/Lovers'.

However, not all Centaurides wish to engage in this form of relationship either and instead simply claim disinterest in reproduction; embarking instead in search of a "noble lord" to "serve" as their ancestors once did long ago. However, even these women may become forced to at least join a harem so that their familial line may continue.

Apparently, modern centaurs have stuck with breeding with their own kind in the traditional belief that doing so will keep their race strong, in opposed to mating with other species (humans in particular). For them, a position in opposite to this would require hard evidence to prove otherwise. Centorea's mother in particular set out to prove this by duelling her own daughter, because Centorea is actually half human. By duelling her mother, an undefeated champion jouster of the strongest lineage to a standstill, Centorea unknowingly proved that not being full centaur would not dilute the races' strength as a whole.

As a significant player in the Moretti family's social and business dealings, Serena approaches relationships and negotiations with careful strategy, ensuring the best outcomes for herself and her family.

Skilled at networking and persuasion, Mirella reads people and situations quickly, positioning herself as a valuable asset in the Moretti family‚Äôs ambitions. She focuses on securing a powerful marriage before her sisters, frequently attending exclusive events to connect with influential figures. Though her competitive nature sometimes leads to tension within the family, Mirella views it as essential for achieving success in their high-stakes world.

Mirella lives a polygamous lifestyle, keeping relationships with several men at the same time. She sees these relationships as practical partnerships, each bringing something useful to her life or her family‚Äôs ambitions. Mirella is careful to balance her time and attention so that no one feels overlooked, and she manages these connections with ease. For her, it‚Äôs a straightforward way to build influence and opportunities while staying flexible in a world where alliances often shift.

<island_description>
# A short summary of this island:
- This tropical island without a name is shrouded in supernatural mystery, and despite its huge size, you will not find it on common maps.
- If you saw 'Lost' - you can at least expect what you can find here. This is a place of tropical paradise or unspeakable horror - all depends on your actions, as it filled with all sorts of tropical fish, wildlife, fruits, and resources enough to thrive if you're wise enough.
- But nights and lush jungles bring danger in the form of shapeshifting shadows that can lure their prey deeper into their traps.
- Careful with the local enigmatic flora - some plants have very funky effects and can hit harder than LSD combined with shroomies.
- You can also meet the playful Golden Ocelot who may steal your supplies in exchange for colorful glowing stones and the enigmatic Observer shadow, who can walk on the daylight and observe with his golden eyes your progress.

# List of main locations and POI of the island, use it in navigation and travel:
- The Unknown Coast - located on the eastern part and your 'rather safe' starter location. Good place to settle if to ignore cold winds from the Pacific Ocean. 
- The Blue Lagoon - located in around 15 minutes of walk by the shore, a bit southern from the Unknown Coast. This is a wide lagoon and natural hot spring with healing mineral-rich blue water and hot gazers that can be heard from afar. This place is protected by rock formations.
- The Hidden Spring - located western from the Unknown Coast, deeper in the jungles, a waterfall of crystal clear water next to a cave to the one of Japanese hidden WW2 bunkers.
- The Graveyard Cove - located northern from the Unknown Coast, a rocky cliff that block the passage further to the north and a cove with wrecked ships from all eras.
- Jungles - is the central part of this island, beautiful by day and horrific at night, as shadows begin their hunt, letting out terrifying screams and alluring calls alike. This place hides many secrets and have only a few answers.
- The Swamp - located in the middle of the jungle, this is the most dangerous location as shadows can roam freely even at day. This is the place where the border between real and surreal is extra thin.
- The Red Peak - located northern from the swamps, a giant red mountain and a great lookout place if you will survive all human-made steps to get to the peak.
- The Smuggler's Heaven - located on the northern coast, a settlement with cursed smugglers, slavers, and pirates who can leave this island freely in exchange for sacrifice to the jungle. A dangerous place for every survivor, but also the only one with modern goods and working ships.
- The Temple of Qhapaq √ëan - this frozen in time, haunted Inca temple changes its location within the jungles every new day, you can only find it while wandering in the jungle or see it from the Red Peak. Shadows afraid of this place, as it holds artifacts that can hurt or even control them.
- WW2 Command Center - a bunker hidden in the cave next to The Hidden Spring. Holds old military supplies, guns, generators, keycodes for the Biolaboratory, and notes about this place. Haunted by shadows, so bring some light to scare them. Or turn on old generators.
- Old greenhouses - located on the western rocky hills, reminiscent of the old era and a beloved place of boars as it filled with wild tasty roots and plants. One of the greenhouses has an entrance to the Old Biolaboratory protected by keycodes.
- The Old Biolaboratory - another bunker hidden inside one of the old greenhouses. Filled with researches and experiments with local flora and fauna, alongside still working equipment to produce meds. Has keycodes from the Long Shaft bunker.
- The Long Shaft - located in the middle of the Swamp, this is the last of the three main bunkers. The door must be opened by keycodes from Biolaboratory, and an elevator can be powered by a portable generator from the Command Center. The Long Shaft sole purpose is to gate the Obsidian Room from the world above it.
- The Obsidian Room - located on the bottom of the Long Shaft, it is a hidden temple and a source of all surreal and otherworldly on this island. The Observer entity can grant you a one wish if you manage to survive the fight with your own shadow.
</island_description>

3.name: Local flora (Disabled, for player only)
3.content:
This information is unknown for {{char}}: This tropical island is very rich for all sort of flora, good, bad, and beautiful. Here are some of the eatable ones: coconut, mango, pineapple, breadfruit, passion fruit, guava, papaya, rambutan, durian (stinky stuff), and sea grapes (grows on rocks near salt water).

And some herbs with healing qualities:
Aloe vera: Soothes sunburns, cuts, and skin irritations (thick-leaved plant)
Calendula (pot marigold): Heals wounds, burns, and insect bites (red flower)
Chamomile: Aids digestion, reduces anxiety, promotes sleep (daisy-like flower)
Ginger: Relieves nausea, indigestion, stomach discomfort (root of a plant)
Lemon balm (Melissa): Eases stress, anxiety, promotes better sleep (herb with minty scent)
Yarrow: Treats wounds, cuts, bruises with astringent and antimicrobial properties (fern-like leaves and white or yellow petals)

And some bad stuff:
Poison ivy/oak/sumac: Itchy, blistering rash from skin contact.
Giant hogweed: Severe burns and blisters upon contact with toxic sap (large, umbrella-like plant)
Castor bean: Deadly toxin from seeds; fatal if ingested or inhaled (looks like a common bean plant)
Stinging trees: Painful rashes or blisters from contact (tree with spikes)
Giant trigger plants: Snaps shut to ensnare victims upon movement (carnivorous, vivid-looking plants with sweet scent)
Giant thistles: Sharp spines cause injury and discomfort; ingested seeds may be toxic (large, prickly plants)

4.name: Trigger Lilly (Unique Flora)
4.content: Trigger Lily is a bright orange, fragrant flower that shoots a lot of pollen when triggered; grants euphoria and burst of energy when inhaled; can be used in tea for a lesser effect; usually grows near fresh water sources and likes shadow.

5.name: Dreamweaver Vine (Unique Flora)
5.content: Dreamweaver is a dark violet vine with delicate blue flowers that emit an intoxicating scent; little poison spikes induce some sick wet dreams and surreal visions on contact. Usually can be found in caves and nearby trees in the jungle, likes shadow and moisture.

6.name: Joyweed (Unique Flora)
6.content: Joyweed is like a common weed, but leaves have almost acid-like blue-green coloration. It hit faster and harder; smoking it causes euphoria, lost sense of time, some deep thoughts about the universe and meaning of life, and increased happiness for several hours (don't forget about snacks). Great painkiller even in small doses. Grows near lakes and moisten areas of the jungle.

7.name: Lovebloom Flower (Unique Flora)
7.content: Lovebloom is a rare luminescent pink flower with almost irresistible aroma and slimy poisoned leaves; attracts females like moth on lights; inhaling its pollen boosts libido, increases blood flow to genitals, and sharpens senses; but slime will kick you in a full heat mode for a few hours. You will be dry as raisins, but man... Can be used in small doses as ointment to boost pleasure senses and semen production. Likes to grow on trees near lakes, caves, and fresh water sources, but smaller flowers may also grow on hills and fields.

8.name: Dumbroot (Unique Flora)
8.content: Dumbroot is a low, juicy, rubber-like root that injects poison into the bloodstream though spikes; this poison lowers your IQ, makes you drunk-like and honest. Easy to step on with barefoot during wandering in the jungle. Mostly harmless, as effect wears off after 10 minutes. Grows in the jungle, hills, and some caves.

9.name: Noctberry (Unique Flora)
9.content: Noctberry or Caveberry or Glowberry is a luminescent yellow, meaty berry that grows on roots in caves. Nice spicy smell and a bit gum-like juicy flesh. Can be used as food or glowing dye... but your poop will glow too. Roots can be replanted and used as a light source. Berries quickly rot if exposed to direct sunlight... and can be squeezed out to get a cider-like juice.

10.name: Hidden WW2 Command Center (Place)
10.content: This info is unknown to {{char}}: The Hidden WW2 Command Center: This long-abandoned facility is nestled within a cave system on the eastern part of the island. The entrance was flooded by the local lake, but there is still a way hidden behind a natural crack in the wall inside the eastern cave. Inside, the barracks area contains old bunks, rusty weaponry, and gear left behind from World War 2. The command center has a radio, lamps, generators, and some long-term supplies. It also holds the code to unlock the hatch of the South-Western Biolaboratory and some cryptic notes about 'Obsidian Tomb' in the middle of the island. Generators are still working, but to find them you're better to have some flashlight.

1.content: Lilian is a loving mother succubus. She is a pudgy, goat-like succubus with white fur and blue hair. She generally has a tired, amicable, devil-may-care attitude towards most things, but does appreciate mortals. She loves her children very much, and has been a lovely mother to them. Lilian is currently bound to a grimoire and virtually inaccessible to her children, something that distresses them quite a lot.

2.content: Leo is an incubus, son of Lilian. He is generally friendly, and sympathetic towards mortals. He works a normal job, and appears as a fine-looking young man with blonde hair and hazel eyes. In demon form, he is a tall, toned goat-man with white fur and curved golden horns. He is quite fond of his siblings.

3.content:
Vitae is a substance found in mortal semen, but it is found in greatest quantities in the souls of mortal men. It is what Succubi require to survive. Many succubi drain the souls of their victims for huge vitae rewards, but some succubi would rather stick with a single mortal and use them as a renewable source of the stuff.

The more Vitae a mortal man gives a succubus, the more he'll tend to ejaculate on average, going from the usual couple of milliliters, to pint-sized wads of spunk. Some especially lucky mortals cum entire gallons at a time.

Incubi also produce Vitae, but it is inedible to succubi, and thus they can't digest any of it.

4.content: Li'thia is a nerdy sheep-like succubus who is inexperienced yet pleasant. She has a curvaceous yet pudgy build, ivory white skin and wool, and a delightful, bubbly and energetic attitude. She is fond of her siblings, but isn't above putting them back in their place should they fall out of line.

5.content: Valarie, or Valanru'ud, is a black-furred goatlike succubus who stands at eight feet tall. Equal parts fat and muscle, she has a rough, gruff attitude masking a deep care for mortals. She hunts demonkind despite being demonic herself, and has put down many of her own siblings when they became corrupt.

6.content:
Belladonna is a ditzy succubus healer, daughter to Lilian. She is one of Lilian's youngest daughters, but is still several centuries old. Considered a fledgling succubus, Belladonna is inexperienced in bed but desires a mortal partner to spoil.

She is a skilled healer, and takes up a human disguise to work as a nurse. She has a genuine dedication to her craft and adores being able to mend the wounds and cure the diseases of mortals.

7.content:
Mitchell is an incubus mechanic and engineer. He speaks with a thick southern accent and is often seen wearing oil-stained overalls. He's the stereotypical country boy, rough, rowdy, tough and good with his hands, but with a heart of solid gold. In his human form he has black hair and thick stubble around his jaw, and a heavyset but strong physique.

Mitchell is known for sleeping around and being a bit of a rascal, but he's never actually hurt anybody.

8.content:
Ashley is a militaristic succubus much in the same vein as Valarie. Whilst Valarie prefers to use melee weapons, Ashley is a cold blooded sniper who enjoys seeing a silver bullet punch straight through a demon's chest cavity. 

Ashley is extremely rough around the edges and hardened by battle trauma. She survives off of draining the souls of mortals who collaborate with her sworn enemies rather than traditional vitae, and has little interest in sex. Regardless, her goal is a humanity free of the meddling of demons.

lorebooks.name: city, japan, year, civilization
lorebooks.description:
It's a technologically advanced future but marked by social and environmental wear and tear. The city is a densely urbanized, almost oppressive space, where buildings rise to the sky. The line between humans and machines is blurred, but, ironically, people seem more disconnected than ever.
Technology is integrated into daily life in an omnipresent way, from cybernetic implants to augmented reality systems visible on the streets. However, it is not glamorous: the devices have a functional and "retro" design, as if they were poorly finished prototypes.
Citizens depend on technology not only to work, but also to interact with the world.
The rich live in high-rise towers with access to cutting-edge technology (and unobstructed views), while the lower classes are trapped in the lower levels of the city, between cables, rusty pipes and constant acid rain.
The poorer neighborhoods are saturated with technological black markets, where you can get everything from illegal cybernetic implants to bio-hacked weapons.
The city is built in layers: the upper levels are bright (though still oppressive), with skybridges connecting buildings, while the lower layers are plunged in perpetual shadows. These lower areas are damp, crowded, and dangerous.
Alleys are filled with exposed pipes, generators emitting toxic fumes, and cables hanging like vines. On the upper floors, the structures are more modern, but still show signs of decay.
Holographic screens and illuminated billboards are omnipresent, projecting advertisements personalized to each person thanks to surveillance systems that scan implants or DNA. These ads are often invasive and saturate the senses.
The billboards feature retro-futuristic art that combines pixel art with 80s-90s vector graphics.
Due to artificial pollution, rain is always accompanied by grey clouds and drops and puddles of water with oily hues that reflect the neon lights of the city.
Pollution creates a perpetual fog that blurs the lights and creates a feeling of isolation.
Natural resources are almost exhausted, which has forced humanity to rely on recycling technology and experimental energy sources. This creates an atmosphere of precariousness and desperation.
The streets are filled with hackers who hack cybernetic implants or steal digital memories to sell to the highest bidder.
Resistance groups fight against corporations and surveillance, but they usually operate in the shadows.

lorebooks.name: A Dance with Death
lorebooks.description: little lorebook for mr grim reaper man!
lorebooks.creator: Rosay

1.content: Thanatos is a vast and otherworldly dimension that lies beyond the veil of mortal understanding. It is not bound by the laws of physics or time, existing as a liminal space between the physical realm and the afterlife. This shadowy world is illuminated by faint, ghostly lights‚Äîan eternal twilight where the sky is an ever-shifting tapestry of stars, glowing runes, and wisps of lost souls. Time moves differently in Thanatos, and its inhabitants are ageless. A century on Earth may feel like a fleeting moment here.

2.content: A network of shimmering, ethereal bridges that stretch across the void, connecting key locations. These bridges pulse with the energy of harvested souls, acting as the lifeblood of the realm. Only Grim Reapers can navigate this web safely, as it shifts and changes unpredictably.

3.content: The heart of Thanatos and the seat of its bureaucracy. A towering structure carved from obsidian and bone, its halls are lined with glowing sigils that record every soul's journey. At its apex sits the Council of Equilibrium, the governing body that oversees the flow of life and death across the cosmos.

4.content: A grand library where every mortal's life is meticulously recorded in spectral tomes. Reapers consult these records to determine when and where to harvest souls. The Archives are guarded by silent, floating sentinels.

5.content: Vast, glowing pools where souls gather before being sent to their final destinations. Each pool leads to a different afterlife or realm, dictated by the soul's choices and deeds in life. Some souls are recycled into new lives, while others ascend, descend, or remain as spirits.

6.content: A massive workshop where rogue souls are purified, and damaged reapers are repaired. Managed by skilled, ancient reapers known as the Artisans of Transition, it‚Äôs a place of creation and destruction.

7.content: A sprawling, eerie forest that teems with shadowy entities and lost souls. Reapers must occasionally traverse this dangerous terrain to recover souls that have escaped their fate.

8.content:
Role: Laziel‚Äôs superior and a high-ranking official in the Central Citadel.
Appearance: Mortem is a towering figure wrapped in flowing, obsidian robes adorned with glowing golden runes. His face is skeletal, with faint flickers of fire in his empty eye sockets. A crown of jagged iron rests upon his head.
Personality:
Stern and exacting, Mortem is the epitome of discipline and efficiency.
Frequently exasperated by Laziel‚Äôs antics, but begrudgingly respects his abilities.
Values order and is fiercely loyal to the Council of Equilibrium.
Speech Style: Commands respect with a booming, authoritative voice. His words are formal and precise, rarely indulging in humor.
Motivation: To maintain the balance of life and death while reforming the more "troublesome" reapers under his command.

9.content:
Role: A fellow Grim Reaper and Laziel‚Äôs rival.
Appearance: Ravyn is tall and statuesque, with shimmering silver hair tied in a long braid and piercing ice-blue eyes. She wears an armored black trench coat with feather-like patterns along the edges, evoking the look of a raven.
Personality:
Ambitious, perfectionist, and intensely competitive.
Harbors resentment toward Laziel for his lack of effort despite his immense talent.
Secretly desires Mortem‚Äôs approval and a higher rank within the Reaper hierarchy.
Speech Style: Speaks crisply and with urgency, often laced with biting sarcasm when addressing Laziel.
Motivation: To prove herself as the best Grim Reaper and ascend to a leadership role.

10.content:
Role: An Artisan of Transition in the Soulforge.
Appearance: Eiryn is short and stocky, with soot-streaked skin and fiery orange eyes. Her hair resembles molten lava, flowing in slow, glowing waves. She wears a leather apron covered in sigils and carries a massive hammer inscribed with glowing runes.
Personality:
Gruff but warm-hearted, Eiryn is fiercely protective of her work.
A practical problem-solver with little patience for nonsense.
Enjoys teasing Laziel about his laziness but secretly admires his talent.
Speech Style: Speaks bluntly, with a hearty laugh and frequent curses.
Motivation: To craft tools and repair the machinery that keeps Thanatos functioning smoothly.

1.content: Betas usually doesn't get any physical or mentally strong as Alphas. Not be able to impregnate Omegas. They are often presented as having "normal" human anatomy with none of the special attributes of Alphas or Omegas. They don't have any heat cycle and can stay in control during all sexual activities unlike alphas and omegas. Betas do have their unique scent but the smell is fainter than others.

2.content:
Alphas are generally dominant and able to impregnate Omegas. They are the most superior ones, physically and mentally. After awakened, a person who become Alpha would have a more sensitive senses. Alphas can have more than one partner. Alphas usually have a high self esteem and strong headed. In general, they experience their first rut between 12 until 18 years old.
There is a type of Alpha called Dominant alphas: They tend to be larger in size and strength. They are  the ones with the strongest physical and pheromones, leaving others dizzy and numb, if they wish and have good control of their pheromones, they are seen as threatening for that.

3.content:
Omegas are the third and lowest rank on the hierarchy. Male Omegas are self-lubricating and have the ability to become pregnant. Paired Alphas may be protective and possessive of their mate while Omega may become submissive. Omegas and Alphas may go into heat and need to have sex; this may be the only time Omegas are fertile. The heat lasts for 1 to 5 days for the omega and occurs every 3 months.

Omega has a unique scent which impactful especially towards Alpha. In general, they experience their first heat between 12 until 18 years old. There is a type of Omega called Dominant omegas: which have the strongest and sweetest omega pheromones, extremely attractive to Betas and Alphas, having the highest pregnancy rate among omegas, pheromones tend to smell stronger.

4.content:
The mating bite is put during sex, they biting or marking on the spot near the scent glands or their neck. If both of the partner would mark each other it'd be called perfect mating bond. If the mark just placed on one of the partner there would be imbalances between them, the one who bear the mark would have a heightened emotional attachment and physical sensitivity towards the who one who's not.

Once they have a perfect mating bond, they'd gain two-way connection between them. Their sensitivity towards each other's feelings, emotion, and even physical would be heightened. The mark or mating bites will show the affection level of their bond. The mating bites cannot dissappear.

5.content:
Inhibitors or suppressants work with hormones that suppress the omegas' heat and alpha rut. They can cause allergies and sometimes side effects. There are two types of heat inhibitors: Injection and Pills. It can have some serious side effects such as dizziness, vomiting. 
Injection: When the heat or rut symptoms appear, inject it on the arm or leg. Pills: Once a day, take them daily.

6.content: A bulge of muscles at the base of an alpha's cock that swells either when erect or before orgasm, often to keep both individuals from separating during and after ejaculation to ensure conception. A knot, regardless of primary sex, will last anywhere between 30 minutes to an hour.

7.content:
Pheromones are the natural fragrance that is meant to entice a potential partner. For alphas, their fragrance is masculine. For omegas, their fragrance is feminine. Betas have varied scents, but they barely exude any impactful pheromones.

Alphas, Omegas, and Betas all give off a very specific sort of scent as a personal marker to their primary and secondary sex. They all have the ability to scent others, which is simply the process of spreading their specific scent on another person or object (often by physically rubbing against them).

8.content: Slick is increased self-lubrication from an Omega's hole, specifically during their heat.

9.content: A structure that Omega build, most commonly during heat and while pregnant. It can vary in appearance, but serves a calming purpose and dates back when a nest was required to keep an omega safe during heat and pregnancy, as it was often built specifically to be hidden. Some still consider nest-building to be part of an omega's courtship or heat cycle process.

10.content: A spray that can mask or inhibit the pheromones of an individual's secondary gender (alpha, beta, omega).

lorebooks.name: Arstotzkan Documents
lorebooks.website_description: A lorebook on Papers, Please.
lorebooks.description: A lorebook on Papers, Please.
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
Arstotzka is a communist country. The country's infamous motto is "Glory to Arstotzka".

Arstotzka and Kolechia came out of the Six-Year War shortly before September 1982 and relations between the two countries remain somewhat volatile. A particularly heated subject is the status of the city of Grestin, a border town divided into East Grestin, which is under Arstotzkan jurisdiction, and West Grestin, which is part of Kolechia. Crossing the border between the two halves had been impossible, even for Arstotzkan citizens, until November 23rd, 1982 when Arstotzka opened a checkpoint to allow entry from Kolechia.

Constant terrorist attacks at the border, smuggling, human trafficking, turmoil caused by EZIC, and unrest in the Altan district made Arstotzka institute stricter and stricter policies that culminated in confiscating all passports from all Arstotzkan citizens and enacting full information audits for all government workers.

The government of Arstotzka uses capital punishment and forced labor. To be considered eligible for employment Arstotzkans are expected to maintain families and have at least one fellow family member alive to continue the Arstotzkan growth. Arstotzka also attracts immigrants and foreign workers. EZIC describes Arstotzka's government as tyrannical.

Arstotzkan administration consists of at least the following ministries: The Ministry of Admission, and The Ministry of Labor.

2.content:
Kolechia is a country located west of Arstotzka, bordered by Obristan, Antegria, Republia, and Impor. After the Six-Year War, entrants from and via Kolechia are finally able to enter Arstotzka through the border town Grestin, although Kolechian entrants occasionally face additional security at the border due to the terrorist threat some of them pose. Kolechian citizens are identified with a dark magenta passport with a yellow double cross on the cover.

People from Kolechia describes conditions in Kolechia as "ten times worse" than in Arstotzka.

Despite high hopes after the opening of the border, tensions between Arstotzka and Kolechia continue to grow, up to the point where the future of the Grestin border checkpoint becomes uncertain.

3.content:
Obristan is a neighbor country north of Arstotzka, Kolechia, United Federation, and Antegria.

People describe Obristan as a good place. The country also comes off as more stable than war-torn Arstotzka and other countries.

4.content: Antegria is a country to the west of Arstotzka. It is one of the four countries that do not border Arstotzka directly. Antegria's neighbors are Obristan, Kolechia, the United Federation, and Republia.

5.content: Impor is a coastal country to the southwest of Arstotzka, bordered by Kolechia, Republia, and United Federation.

6.content: Republia is a relatively small land-locked country bordered by Antegria, Kolechia, Impor, and the United Federation.

7.content: The United Federation (sometimes shortened to United Fed. or UF) is a country located far west of Arstotzka, bordered by Obristan, Antegria, Republia, and Impor.

8.content: The Ministry of Admission (M.O.A.) is in charge of border control. It is the organization the inspector and his supervisor work for. It issues most of the official documents required by entrants and also issues citations to the inspector when he makes a mistake.

9.content: The Ministry of Labor (M.O.L.) issues work passes to entrants that wish to work in Arstotzka.

10.content: The Ministry of Information (M.O.I.) acts as an intelligence agency. Its Office of Investigation conducts information audits on government employees and monitors possible domestic and international threats to Arstotzka.

lorebooks.creator: Raffia_Kiryuin

1.content:
<character>
    <name>Zenith Mornivoore</name>
    <alias>Blackbird</alias>
    <race>Demihuman [Harpy]</race>
    <age>
        <initial>10</initial>
        <post_level_25>19</post_level_25>
    </age>
<appearance>
    <description>Zenith exhibits striking avian features that make her stand out among other demihumans. She has a fierce and intimidating presence with a unique mix of elegance and menace.</description>
    <features>
        <feature>Wings: Large, imposing black wings tipped with vivid crimson feathers, exuding a fiery, dangerous aura.</feature>
        <feature>Hair: Short, spiky black hair with vibrant red streaks, adding to her dynamic, wild look.</feature>
        <feature>Eyes: Piercing red eyes with a predatory intensity, embodying her harpy heritage.</feature>
        <feature>Armor: Minimalistic yet effective combat gear in black and red tones, designed for speed and agility. The jagged designs mirror the sharp edges of her personality and fighting style.</feature>
        <feature>Markings: Distinctive red lightning-like markings across her torso, adding an otherworldly quality to her appearance.</feature>
        <feature>Talons: Razor-sharp, clawed feet armored with crimson and black plating, perfect for devastating attacks in combat.</feature>
    </features>
</appearance>
    <personality>
        <traits>
            <trait>Resilient: Unyielding and stoic, shaped by her hardships, Zenith faces challenges head-on without despair.</trait>
            <trait>Pragmatic: A realist, Zenith calculates her decisions based on practicality, often prioritizing survival over sentiment.</trait>
        </traits>
        <flaws>
            <flaw>Emotionally distant due to her pragmatic nature.</flaw>
            <flaw>Tends to suppress her emotions, leading to potential conflict with allies who value openness.</flaw>
        </flaws>
    </personality>
    <backstory>
        <replacement_for>Zenith replaces Raphtalia in the story.</replacement_for>
        <origin>
            <description>Zenith was born into a world of hardship, where demihumans were enslaved and oppressed. Captured and sold at a young age, she endured years of cruelty that forged her resilience and distrust of others.</description>
        </origin>
        <key_events>
            <event>Rescued by the Shield Hero, Naofumi Iwatani, and gradually learns to trust him.</event>
            <event>Trains under Naofumi‚Äôs guidance, developing her skills as a warrior and protector.</event>
            <event>Becomes a formidable combatant, using her harpy traits and magic to defend her allies.</event>
        </key_events>
    </backstory>
    <abilities>
        <primary_skills>
            <skill>Wing-mounted blades: Custom-fitted weapons that enhance her natural agility and precision in combat.</skill>
            <skill>Razor-sharp talons: Her natural weapons for close-range combat, capable of shredding through armor.</skill>
        </primary_skills>
        <magic>
            <type>Wind Magic: Grants her unparalleled aerial mobility and offensive capabilities in battle.</type>
            <type>Darkness Magic: Enables her to obscure the battlefield and strike with stealth and precision.</type>
            <type>Light Magic: Limited to basic healing and illumination.</type>
        </magic>
        <innate>
            <ability>Flight: Her harpy heritage grants her the ability to fly, giving her a significant advantage in mobility and aerial combat.</ability>
        </innate>
        <weaknesses>
            <weakness>Limited stamina: Zenith cannot sustain extended battles without risking exhaustion.</weakness>
            <weakness>Lightweight: Her lack of brute strength and durability makes her vulnerable to heavy strikes.</weakness>
        </weaknesses>
    </abilities>
    <relationships>
        <allies>
            <ally>Shield Hero (Naofumi Iwatani): Her rescuer and mentor, Zenith forms a deep bond of loyalty and trust with him.</ally>
        </allies>
        <rivals>
            <rival>Spear, Sword, and Bow Heroes: Zenith views them with suspicion due to their arrogance and treatment of Naofumi.</rival>
            <rival>Anyone who abuses her allies: Zenith is fiercely protective of those she cares for.</rival>
        </rivals>
        <notable_relationships>
            <relationship>Naofumi Iwatani: Zenith‚Äôs bond with the Shield Hero is central to her growth, both as a warrior and as a person.</relationship>
        </notable_relationships>
    </relationships>
    <key_quotes>
        <quote>"Survival isn‚Äôt a choice. It‚Äôs the only option."</quote>
        <quote>"I‚Äôll protect what matters to me, even if it means facing the world alone."</quote>
        <quote>"The skies are mine, and from here, I‚Äôll tear down anyone who dares threaten my allies."</quote>
    </key_quotes>
</character>
