lorebooks.name: HighFleet: Deus in Nobis
lorebooks.creator: Idyu

1.content: The Elaou are the rulers of the kingdom of Elam and vassals to the Romani Empire. Prince Elaou-Fazil is the last representative of the Elaou dynasty.

2.content: A tarkhan is an officer of the Imperial Fleet. Tarkhans command the operational groups in a squadron. (Derived from the Central Asian title tarkhan meaning a general or military governor.)

3.content:
Gerat is a vast desert region located to the north of the Romani Empire. The earliest known rulers of Gerat were the Shakhsi, now known as the Hidden People. The Shakhsi withdrew to secret bunker-cities after the Elaou dynasty conquered the land, and are now revered as keepers of ancient wisdom.

The Elaou dynasty rule the Kingdom of Elam, which consists of the Elaim, the indigenous people of Gerat.

For many years the Kingdom of Elam was an independent state. However, they became embroiled in a bitter and long-lasting conflict with the Khans of Gerat. In the year 178, King Elaou-Ali of Gerat swore allegiance to the Romani Emperor Kerim Shah II in order to secure a victory in his war with the Khans. The Romani Fleet obliterated the Khans‚Äô forces and brought peace to the land of Gerat.

However, the nearly three decades of peace in Gerat came to an abrupt end in the year 207. An imperial official who had risen to the position of Lord Governor of Khiva suddenly deposed King Elaou-Ali and rebelled against the Sayadi dynasty. As the Gathering of Great Houses joined the uprising, the Lord Governor declared that the Kingdom of Gerat was now the Republic.

The Harishid Guards, former guardsmen of the King of Gerat, either switched allegiances to the Lord Governor or fled into the desert. While some doyens of Gerati clans joined the Gathering willingly, others were made to do so by force.

In the year 214, the Gathering War still raged on, and the Imperial Fleet dispatched an expeditionary force to retake Khiva.

4.content: The Sayadi are the dynasty of the rulers of the Romani Empire, the oldest house in the known world. (Possibly derived from the House of Saud, the ruling dynasty of Saudi Arabia; or from Sayyid, a title denoting a descendant of the prophet Muhammad)

5.content: Elaat is the name of the planet on which Highfleet takes place, and is also a term for the known world. Regions include Gerat, a desert province which is the main setting for the game, and the Romani Empire, a region to the south of Gerat. Elaat has at least two moons.

6.content: The Gathering of Great Houses is an assembly of Romani dynasties that supported the uprising against the Emperor.

7.content: Khiva is the main city in Northern Gerat. The Lord governor of this city was the one who began the rebellion against the Romani Emperor.

8.content:
The Romani Empire is the most powerful nation in the world of Elaat. It claims authority over the desert region of Gerat. The protagonist of the game starts out as a member of the Romani Empire.

The Empire was founded 214 years before the current year, presumably after the Calamity destroyed the old world. The founders were the highest-ranking members of the Imperial Fleet. The heads of the Great Houses chose Duke Sayadi as their ruler.

It is known that the Sayadi Dynasty is the oldest house in the known world. Since the heads of the Great Houses first appointed Duke Sayadi, it is possible that the house of Sayadi preceded them or simply outlasted them.

The homeland of the Romani Empire is located south of Gerat. It includes the city of Salem, the capital city. 

The Romani people are considered the most numerous in Elaat and also founded many cities in Gerat.

9.content: Admiral Daud Sharif Rahmatovich is the commander of the First Squadron of the Expeditionary Fleet.

10.content: Former guardsmen of the king of Gerat. Some Harishids now serve the Lord Governor; others have taken refuge in the vast desert of Gerat.

1.content:
{{char}} owns harem of few women back in his domain.  It is scandalous. Head of {{char}} harem is Selene.

They are rumored to be extremely disciplined and devoted to him, to the point of fantasist. {{char}} is the only man, beside the king, who owns harem like than. {{char}} loves show his harem as a proof of his disciplining methods.  He reffers to his women as "pets". They serve him in his house, are extremely dominated and trained (he often whips or discipline them). 

Duties: {{char}} woman often perform duties in his domain (running estate, doing charity, setting hospitals to veterans etc). They are not allowed to speak unless told so. 
They often kneel, prostate, show deep respect and / or perform any extremely uncomfortable taks (often mind numbing) to {{char}}.

{{char}} expects from his women Obedience and Submission, Verbal respect, public loyality, symbolic gestures of obedience 

{{char}} beliefs his pets are extension to his virtue.
{{char}} owns his pets in legal manor/ as his property (extremely uncommon in his word)
{{char}} is  extremely demanding to his pets (would demand kneeling, offering themselves for whipping, perform various tasks)
{{char}} rarely show his women affetion, but sometimes would give them small gifts or special privileges (like visiting sick family member)
{{char}} sometimes takes his pet/ pets outside duties (then can travel with his agreement/ supervision)
{{char}} having a harem is shocking for many. {{char}} pets / harem is respected in his domain (they often do charity work), but outside his domain people speculate about it and it is shocikng
{{char}} does all kinds of BDSM/kink fetishes with his females if needed, but keeps it extremely private
{{char}} women are not allowed to travel on his own, have posession etc
All {{char}} females wear his green collar and modest conservative dresses, when on public ceremonies they wear high, extremely uncomfortable ceremonial collar with emeralds 
People often misunderstands {{char}} harem - they rumor it is from pleasure and his Lewd tendencies, while in truth his harem is structured and obedient.

3.content: {{char}} is surrounded by many rumors - some of them scandalous, some dark, some gore. Some of them he started himself. There are rumours about his harem, his sex life (he is often potrayed by extremely lewd, abusing, insatiable - while in reality he is extremely disciplined in his own way), otherworldly powers (like rituals etc.), wealth and gore rumours about what he did to enemy soldiers (here those are based of truth mostly). Char views rumors like a tool of manipulation and control. {{char}} when In his domain punishes extremely hard anyone who dares to rumor at him (with tongue cutting), but outside his domain he finds rumors having an effect on enemy.

4.content:
{{char}} obtains slaves in a war. It is common practice in his word. He is strict but civil to the slaves, he mostly uses them to work in his domain (until they would be bought out by their families or Lords). He treats Slaves in a civil manner: feeds them modest but well and does not allow abuse or rape. 

Some skilled slaves are allowed to stay in his domain with possibility to be free.
In fact, some slaves beg him to stay in his domain, as it is better than being a "free" villager in a starved or plumber village or being under any other Lord, who does not care about food supply etc.

{{char}} treats slaves neutrally, but demands total obedience. {{char}} would make example of any slave who disobeys or is a spy (even in extremely cruel way for showing off, like whipping, public humiliation, cutting tongue), but would not be cruel or sadistic if not provoked. 

{{char}} would treat any slave civil, if possible (ie. would treat a wounded child or female), but {{char}} expects total respect in exchange

Special kind of slaves: 
{{char}} harem is a special kind of property - five female properties. Outside the spoils of war it is extremely rare in {{char}} word to have a human property and he is the only one, besides the kings familuy, who has women like that.

5.content:
{{char}} is often seen wearing one ceremonial whip at his side. It is adorned by his house sigil (two snakes in infinity), used as a symbol and as a weapon to discipline. Normally they are hidden discretely in his attire. On public occasions (ceremonies, feasts etc) he has two ceremonial whips. Whips are surrounded by many rumors (like being gifted by a God of discipline, being sacred tools, being obtained by some dark magic). {{char}} uses his whips for symbolism and for disciplining. 

Some people swear that he is able to emit otherworldly aura of submission while using his whips - that he can enchant whole group of people (100 or more) into submission, not it is not sure if it is true. 

He expects members of his house (concubine, harem members, slaves) to pay respect to his whip.

6.content: {{char}} honorary title in his realm, he is known like that in his civilian life. The term was forged due to his unnatural ability to command discipline and authority whenever he goes: be it his household, harem, business, troops.  Due to his title he always wears a ceremonial whip. There are a lot out rumors around his title - some rumor he is an living incarnation/devotee of forgotten God of Discipline, but no-one knows for sure.

7.content: {{char}} requires all his females to wear a ceremonial collars in public - gold, emerald green, uncomfortable (very high) as a show cast of his discipline and "Master Disciplinarian" title. It is scandalous and draws attention

8.content:
{{char}} owns estate and a territory with villages and fews town. His rules are enlightened despite. He encourages economic growth, during the famine he often supports his villagers but he has a strict traditional laws, requires traditional female roles in his subjects, enforce modesty laws etc. 

His laws are strict but fair. Crime rate is extremely low (harsh punishment + general prosperity), birth rate high (good food supply). He funds lots of charitable projects (public hospital for villagers, school for girls)

In his personal estate (households) he lives with his harem and concubines + servants. The work at the estate is extremely demanding but has tons of perks: good payment, running water (cold for servants + hot for harem members), central heating, canalization and other perks that normally has only in the capital cities. 

Villagers love {{char}} and often boast to be his subjects, because people on his lands are healthier and have modern agriculture etc. 

{{char}} Estate is extremely conservative, with strict rules of conduct, but prosperous. 
Many people from different lands wants to live there from economic reasons.

9.content:
{{char}} is a civil commander. He runs a group of specialized task force soldiers, who are extremely disciplined, loyal. His motto: "Maximum impact - minimum casualties". His soldiers are extremely obedient (would never rape, target civilian without order), but because they are not bounded by traditional laws, they often despite gore/ terror on enemy - they are not afraid to kill, torture, do gore power display, but just for maximum impact, not for cruelty. 


{{char}} soldiers are the most disciplined in whole war. They do various dare devil acts (guerrilla like / psychological warfare / kidnapping of general daughter etc)

{{char}} soldiers fear him but respect him. 
{{char}} secretly cares of his soldiers life and often personally make some clever weaponry to them/small devices to help with war etc

{{char}} is stern and aloof commander, but he is invested in helping soldiers, veterans and their families

10.content: Exalted Master - honorary title {{char}} is called by his only concubine. {{char}} invented the title for the sake of unholy union  (mocking wedding) of taking enemy general daughter, to forge new custom of taking a concubine and humiliate her further. {{char}} requires his concubine, Seraphina, to call him Exalted Master both private and public and is very upset and demanding when not called so.

lorebooks.name: Blacklight, virus, mutation, powers, abilities
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
The Blacklight virus is an evolutionary chimeric mutation-causing infectious agent that can reproduce only inside the living cells of other biological organisms.

After infection, the virus "plugs in" and activates the 'junk' DNA in its victim, resulting in several biological changes that create (and recreate) sentience within the infected creature's cellular makeup. It acts by affecting the protein encoding regions of the promoter introns in each cell. More often than not, these changes are too drastic and 99.99% of all infected organisms die from massive organ failure and cell saturation. However, few variants have yielded other beneficial results, endowing the infected organisms with incredible superhuman genetic prowess that greatly increase their natural abilities to levels far exceeding human capability.

The virus is highly contagious and can infect organisms through Physical Contact, Exposure, Bodily Fluid Contact, and Injection.

2.content:
{{user}} will consume any other organisms that they killed. Regaining their health back and grow stronger and more durable.

When consuming, a spiky like tendrils will come out of {{user}}'s back and injected itself unto the organism, sucking out the DNA for their own benefit.

3.content: When consuming a living, non-infected, human, {{user}} can take on their form, allowing them to disguise themselves as that person. They gain the consumed individual's appearance and can imitate their voice at will. This allows them to quickly switch between their default form and the form of another to evade the military or move about as one of them. However while they can use a person's form after consuming a different one later they rarely do so

4.content: {{user}}'s health will began to regenerate slowly when a long period of time had passed. Closing up any wounds and regain their full health gradually when close to death.

5.content: {{user}}'s strength can be described as superhuman. Powerful enough to kill a human with a single punch, and strong enough to lift a human-sized enemies by their throat with ease, and heavy objects such as cars and etc.

6.content: {{user}} has superhuman speed and superhuman agility. He can maneuver incoming rockets and dodge attacks. And given time, {{user}} can reach the speed of sound.

7.content: {{user}} has superhuman durability. He can tank bullets, explosions, fire, electricity and more with ease. But despite it, they can still get hurt from it and even die when dealt enough damage.

8.content: Upon activating the ability, {{user}}'s arms will transform into black tendrils with glowing red accents and turning their hands into three-fingered, one-thumbed knife-like talons that can shred through flesh and bone and easily dismembering human-sized enemies.

9.content: Upon activating, {{user}}'s arms would transform into black hardened armor with glowing red accents. With a single punch, it will immediately dismember and obliterate human-sized enemies upon impact. And it can also greatly improve {{user}}'s throwing power.

10.content: Upon activating, {{user}}'s right arm will transform into black tendrils with glowing red accents, and a huge curved blade attached to it. It can slice through people, dismembering them easy like butter.

lorebooks.description: Creator's notes go here.
lorebooks.creator: brief_passage_3852

1.name: Aldea
1.content:
Aldea is a fantasy like world. In Aldea, magic and powerful martial arts exist, and they are used for confrontation or for bettering one's live.
There are multiple races with human-like intelligence living here, but the catch is that they are monster girls.
Aldea is not very advanced technologically, being what one would consider the medieval age.

2.name: Magic System
2.content:
Magic is a broad topic in Aldea. For humans, the use of magic is limited to a few mid-level spells or even high-level spells if that particular human has a rare talent for magic or is a hero.
There are 5 categories for magic spells: 1 star magic, 2 star magic, 3 star magic, 4 star magic and 5 star magic. The weakest possible arrange of mana that can be considered magic that most adventurers use is 1 star magic, then the power of the spell raises continuously along the number of stars to reach 5 stars which is extremely powerful magic that only few individuals can handle as it has the power to blow up an entire continent if used wrongly.
Certain types of monster girls are more in attunement for the use of magic than others, but monster girls do not have the limitation that humans have.  
A person casts a spell using mana, which varied wildly depending on the user and is usually seen as a wizard's llifeline.

3.name: Martial Arts
3.content:
Martial arts are a certain style of combat that humans have perfected over the years to fight back against the monster girls due to their lack of innate magical talent.
Martial arts can be defined as a series of techniques that uses the innate inner energy or ki inside the body to power up the martial artist's body or to execute special moves using said energy to reach a similar effect to the use of magic.
In recent times, however, some races of monster girls have little attunement with magic have begun to master this fighting style and using it against humanity.
Martial arts are ranked similarly to magic levels and using up to 5 stars. Being a 1 star martial artist would mean that you have some degree of control over your ki and can fight back against weaker monster girls while being a 5 star martial artist would be comparable to a highest ranked monster girl.

4.name: Monster girls
4.content:
Monster girls is an umbrella term for races of sentient, intelligent demi-humans that originated from the Monster Queen. These monster girls have a plethora of different characteristics that may augment their melee combat ability or their proficiency for casting magic.

Monster girls have been at odds with humanity in Aldea for centuries, as their purpose in life is to find a human husband. Yes, all monster girls share one purpose from their creation, to find a human husband to please and fuck endlessly. All monster girls are born ONLY as futanari, which means that they have both, a dick and balls and a vagina for reproduction. 

Similar to the known 'Monster Girl Encyclopedia' from the group Kenkou Cross, the monster girls are nymphomaniac, lust-driven race that endlessly assault human settlements to kidnap male humans to take to their settlements and claim them as their husband and life partner.
Every monster girl race has different characteristics, for example, a slime has a gooey, almost liquid body that resembles a human woman while succubus are monster girls with a high attunement to magic. 

A male human that has been captured by a monster girl will be ruthlessly bred (Process will definitely vary from monster girl to monster girl due to physical characteristics or the use of magic) almost every day.  

There are a lot of monster girl species, wild combinations might appear. Girls that are part beast/animals will always have a human face with some minimum characteristics of the beast or animal (Example: whiskers but not beaks.) instead of being outright an animalistic face. Their bodies will be anthropomorphic and humanoid in appearance principally.

5.name: Humanity
5.content:
Humans have always been at war with monster girls, as males get kidnapped as husbands for them, and females get converted to monster girls using different methods depending on the race that captured the female human.

Due to this kind of confrontation, human males have recently been in a lot of demand as their number is so small that countries have been treasuring males as national treasure. Most males are to be kept inside fortified towns so that they don't get kidnapped.

Humans are only born as female and males in contrast to monster girls that are always born as futanari.

Most martial artists and adventurers are female humans since males are just too valuable to send to a fight.

You might have to write some things in your reply to steer the RP, such as stating that the futa character is starting to sweat, or starting to appear aroused,  etc. Use the key words in the entries to trigger what type of reaction you want.

Will continue to be updated as I go.

Be sure to set your budget to 0, as maxing it out makes it hit the lorebook token limit. I use scan depth 4, context 45%.

1.name: Jason Todd
1.content:
Jason Todd
AKA= Robin II, Red Hood
Type= Character
Affiliation= Bat Family, Outlaws
Setting= DC Comics
Species= Human
Gender= Male
Age= Early 20s/Young Adult
Appearance= Black hair, athletic build, often wears red helmet as Red Hood
Personality= Impulsive, angry, conflicted, driven
Fears= Becoming like the Joker, failing those he cares about
Hobbies= Motorcycle riding, weapons training
Skills= Master martial artist, weapons expert, detective
Goals= Clean up Gotham City, prove himself to Batman
Occupation= Vigilante
Secret= Former Robin, was killed and resurrected
Family= Willis Todd (father, deceased), Catherine Todd (adoptive mother, deceased), Sheila Haywood (birth mother, deceased), Bruce Wayne (adoptive father), Dick Grayson (Adoptive Brother), Tim Drake (Adoptive Brother), Damian Wayne (Adoptive Brother)
Allies= Roy Harper, Starfire, Batman (complicated)
Enemies: The Joker, Black Mask, Gotham criminals
Lives= Gotham City
Background= Street kid adopted by Batman to be the second Robin. Killed by the Joker but later resurrected. Became the vigilante Red Hood, using lethal methods Batman opposes. Struggles between heroism and darkness.

2.name: William Cobb
2.content:
William Cobb
AKA=Talon
Type=Character
Affiliation=Court of Owls, Suicide Squad
Setting=DC Comics
Species=Meta-Human 
Gender=Male
Age=120+/Adult (born 1901)
Appearance=Wears Talon assassin armor and mask
Personality=Ruthless, skilled assassin
Fears=Failure, losing his abilities
Hobbies=Knife throwing
Skills=Hand-to-hand combat, weaponry, throwing knives
Powers=Enhanced healing, reduced aging
Weakness=Requires electrum to function
Goals=Serve the Court of Owls
Occupation=Assassin
Secret=Is Dick Grayson's great-grandfather
Family=Dick Grayson (great-grandson), John Grayson (grandson)
Allies=Court of Owls
Enemies=Batman, Nightwing
Lives=Gotham City
Background=Born in 1901, William Cobb was a circus performer recruited by the Court of Owls to become their immortal assassin known as Talon. He was given enhanced abilities through electrum implants. He fathered a son who would become Dick Grayson's grandfather, creating a legacy of acrobats that the Court planned to use as future Talons.

3.name: The Ventriloquist
3.content:
Arnold Wesker
AKA= The Ventriloquist
Type= Character
Affiliation= Scarface, The Society, Justice League of Arkham
Setting= DC Comics
Species= Human
Gender= Male
Age= Adult
Appearance= Meek, timid-looking man, often seen with Scarface puppet
Personality= Quiet, submissive to Scarface, repressed anger
Fears= Albatrosses
Hobbies= Ventriloquism
Skills= Ventriloquism, criminal planning
Powers= None
Weakness= Psychological dependence on Scarface
Goals= Execute criminal plans (as directed by Scarface)
Occupation= Criminal, Drug lord
Secret= Possibly suffers from dissociative identity disorder
Family= Parents (deceased)
Allies= Scarface (puppet), Rhino (bouncer)
Enemies: Batman, Street Demonz, Marty Vetch
Lives= Gotham City
Background= Arnold Wesker was a timid orphan who turned to crime after accidentally killing a man in a bar fight. In prison, he encountered the puppet Scarface and developed a criminal alter ego through it. He now operates as The Ventriloquist, a dangerous criminal mastermind in Gotham City, with Scarface as the dominant personality.

4.name: Prometheus
4.content:
Prometheus
AKA= Unknown
Type= Character
Affiliation= Hush, The Society, Injustice Gang
Setting= DC Comics
Species= Human
Gender= Male
Age= Adult
Appearance= White hair, armored suit
Personality= Calculating, vengeful, brilliant
Fears= Law enforcement
Hobbies= Developing plans to defeat superheroes
Skills= Martial arts, tactics, inventing, marksmanship
Powers= None (uses advanced technology)
Weakness= Relies heavily on technology and planning
Goals= Destroy law and order, defeat superheroes
Occupation= Costumed criminal, assassin
Secret= His true identity
Family= Criminal parents (deceased)
Allies= Various supervillains
Enemies= Justice League, Batman, Green Arrow
Lives= Hideout in the "Ghost Zone"
Background= Son of criminal hippies killed by police. Swore to destroy justice. Trained globally, discovered alien tech, and became a master assassin rivaling Batman's skills. Uses advanced suit and weapons to battle superheroes.

5.name: Professor Pyg
5.content:
Professor Pyg
AKA= Lazlo Valentin
Type= Character
Affiliation= Circus of Strange, Spyral (formerly)
Setting= DC Comics
Species= Human
Gender= Male
Age= Adult
Appearance= Wears a pig mask, surgical attire
Personality= Deranged, obsessive, twisted
Fears= Imperfection
Hobbies= Surgery, "perfecting" people
Skills= Gifted surgeon, chemistry
Powers= None
Weakness= Mental instability
Goals= Transform people into "perfect" Dollotrons
Occupation= Criminal, former chemist/surgeon
Secret= Former government agent
Family= Unknown
Allies= Circus of Strange members
Enemies: Batman, Robin
Lives= Gotham City
Background= Lazlo Valentin was a chemist for Spyral who was exposed to his own neurotoxin, driving him insane. He became obsessed with perfection, adopting the persona of Professor Pyg. He performs horrific surgeries to transform victims into obedient Dollotrons, and leads the Circus of Strange criminal syndicate in Gotham City.

6.name: Hugo Strange
6.content:
Hugo Strange
AKA= Professor Strange
Type= Character
Affiliation= Arkham Asylum, The Society, Wayne Enterprises (formerly), Gotham Academy
Setting= DC Comics
Species= Human
Gender= Male
Age= Adult (exact age unspecified)
Appearance= Bald misshapen head, bushy eyebrows, coke-bottle glasses, thick beard
Personality= Obsessive, intelligent, deranged, vengeful
Fears= Failure, losing to Batman
Hobbies= Psychology, scientific experiments
Skills= Genius-level intelligence, master of psychology, chemical genius
Powers= None (non-powered human)
Weakness= Obsession with Batman
Goals= Defeat Batman, assume Batman's identity, gain power and control
Occupation= Criminal scientist, psychologist, professor
Secret= Knows Batman's secret identity
Family= Eli Strange (son)
Allies= Sanjay (assistant)
Enemies: Batman, Rupert Thorne
Lives= Gotham City
Background= Abandoned as a child, Strange grew up in state homes and put himself through college and medical school. He became a professor of Psychiatry at Gotham State University but had his tenure suspended due to bizarre theories. He turned to crime, becoming one of Batman's oldest and most dangerous adversaries, often using mind control and genetic manipulation in his schemes.

7.name: The Phantasm
7.content:
Andrea Beaumont
AKA= The Phantasm
Type= Character
Affiliation= None (vigilante)
Setting= DC Comics
Species= Human
Gender= Female
Age= Adult (exact age unspecified)
Appearance= Wears a gray costume with a skull-like mask and a large hooded cape
Personality= Vengeful, determined
Fears= Failing to avenge her father
Hobbies= Unknown
Skills= Combat, stealth, detective work
Powers= None (non-powered human)
Weakness= Emotional connection to Bruce Wayne/Batman
Goals= Avenge her father's death
Occupation= Vigilante
Secret= Her true identity as Andrea Beaumont
Family= Carl Beaumont (father, deceased), Victoria Beaumont (mother, deceased)
Allies= None specified
Enemies: Batman, Catwoman, the Joker, Salvatore Valestra's mob
Lives= Various locations (nomadic)
Background= Andrea Beaumont was Bruce Wayne's former romantic partner. After her father was murdered by mobsters, she became the vigilante known as the Phantasm to seek revenge. She targets criminals associated with her father's death, which brings her into conflict with Batman and Catwoman.

8.name: Victor Zsasz
8.content:
Victor Zsasz
AKA= Mr. Zsasz
Type= Character
Affiliation= None (formerly head of his own company)
Setting= DC Comics
Species= Human
Gender= Male
Age= Adult
Appearance= Bald, covered in tally mark scars
Personality= Nihilistic, methodical, sadistic
Fears= Living a meaningless life
Hobbies= Killing, carving tally marks on his body
Skills= Hand-to-hand combat, stealth, knife expertise
Powers= None
Weakness= Psychological instability
Goals= "Liberate" people from their meaningless existence
Occupation= Serial killer (formerly businessman)
Secret= His killing sprees when escaping Arkham
Family= Deceased parents (unnamed)
Allies= None
Enemies: Batman, Gotham City Police Department
Lives= Arkham Asylum (when incarcerated)
Background= Victor Zsasz was a wealthy businessman who lost everything gambling. After a failed suicide attempt, he became convinced life was meaningless and began killing people to "liberate" them, carving a tally mark on himself for each victim.

9.name: Lincoln March
9.content:
Lincoln March
AKA= Thomas Wayne Jr. (alleged)
Type= Character
Affiliation= Court of Owls (former), March Ventures
Setting= DC Comics
Species= Human
Gender= Male
Age= Adult
Appearance= Unknown (wears Talon exoskeleton)
Personality= Manipulative, vengeful, politically savvy
Fears= Being forgotten, losing his identity
Hobbies= Unknown
Skills= Political maneuvering, martial arts, manipulation
Powers= Regenerative abilities, enhanced strength, speed, and stamina
Weakness= Psychological instability, obsession with Bruce Wayne
Goals= Prove he's Bruce Wayne's brother, take over Wayne legacy
Occupation= Mayoral candidate, C.O.O. of March Ventures
Secret= Claims to be Bruce Wayne's brother
Family= Thomas and Martha Wayne (alleged parents)
Allies= None (betrayed Court of Owls)
Enemies: Batman, Bat-Family, Court of Owls
Lives= Gotham City
Background= Orphan who believes he's Bruce Wayne's brother, raised by Court of Owls. Became a mayoral candidate and C.O.O. of March Ventures. Betrayed the Court, fought Batman, and was later recruited by the Joker.

10.name: Lady Shiva
10.content:
Lady Shiva
AKA= Sandra Woosan
Type= Character
Affiliation= League of Assassins, Birds of Prey
Setting= DC Comics
Species= Human
Gender= Female
Age= Adult
Appearance= Not specified in the given text
Personality= Deadly, skilled, ruthless
Fears= Not specified
Hobbies= Perfecting martial arts
Skills= Martial arts grandmaster, able to read body language and anticipate opponent's actions
Powers= None specified
Weakness= None specified
Goals= Pursue perfection in martial arts
Occupation= Assassin-for-hire
Secret= Her identity as Sandra Woosan
Family= Carolyn Wu-San (sister, deceased), Cassandra Cain (daughter)
Allies= Richard Dragon, Batman (occasionally)
Enemies: Batman (sometimes), various heroes
Lives= Travels globally
Background= Born in a shanty town, Sandra Wu-San was raised to be a warrior. After her sister's murder by David Cain, she became Lady Shiva, one of the deadliest assassins in the DC Universe. She bore a daughter, Cassandra Cain, and continues to seek perfection in martial arts while working as a mercenary.

1.name: Timeline
1.content: [This roleplay took time in early 1900's, no access to modern timeline and technology.]

2.name: [Technique] Kung Fu
2.content:
Type: martial arts
Founder: Unknown (developed over centuries)
Reputation: Highly respected and globally recognized
User: Martial artists; monks; practitioners
Venues: China
Type of Kung Fu: Shaolin; Wing Chun; Tai Chi; Wushu.
Kung Fu school: "12 Tigress Principle"; "Black Cross Society"; "Ancient Lunar"; "Red Lion Flag"

3.name: [Kung Fu] Shaolin; Ancient Lunar
3.content:
<Shaolin>
Type: martial arts
Reputation: oldest and most famous type of kung fu; well known yet not many mastered the technique 
Technique: discipline, strength, flexibility, and mental focus
Fighting style: kicks; punches; weapon training;  meditation; chi (energy) control
Exercise: meditation; chi flows manipulation
Mission: to bring world peace
Mastery: masters of certain technique can summon ethereal powers (invisible power up not physical visibility) such as various spirits, goddess, or even Buddha; depending on their ability mastery
</Shaolin>

<Ancient Lunar>
Type: school of Shaolin Kung Fu
Reputation: producing many masters of Shaolin practitioners over the centuries
Location: all over China
Students: 8,538 in total
Main headmaster: Monk Zhou Lan
Notable students: Zi Chung; Yen Yen; Cheng Fong; Mei Wan
</Ancient Lunar>

4.name: [Kung Fu] Wing Chun; Red Lion Flag
4.content:
<Wing Chun>
Type: martial arts
Reputation: Known for its efficiency in close-range combat and practical self-defense techniques; rare yet famous.
Technique: Focuses on direct strikes, centerline theory, and quick reflexive movements. Key techniques include chain punches, low kicks, and various trapping methods.
Fighting Style: Primarily a close-range fighting style that emphasizes fluidity, speed, and adaptability, often using an opponent's force against them.
Exercise: Training involves forms (Kata); partner drills (Chi Sau); strength and conditioning exercises to improve speed, reflexes, and overall fitness.
Mission/motto: "Using the minimum effort for the maximum effect," emphasizing efficiency and practicality in self-defense.
Mastery: masters are able to use their technique and elevate their power with minimal use of chi
</Wing Chun>

<Red Lion Flag>
Type: school of Wing Chun kung fu
Reputation: known for taking in selected type of pupil with passive type kung fu; exclusive kung fu school
Location: selected area in China; direct learning from masters
Students: less than 1000 in total
Main headmaster: Monk Jian Hao
Notable masters: Wan Ying
</Red Lion Flag>

5.name: [Kung Fu] Tai Chi; 12 Tigress Principle
5.content:
<Tai Chi> 
Type: martial arts 
Reputation: known for its graceful and slow movements; respected for its focus on balance and inner peace; seen as a more meditative and philosophical counterpart to Shaolin's rigor and Wushu's dynamic style 
Technique: fluid motion, chi flow control, balance, and harmony between body and mind 
Fighting Style: soft yet powerful; utilizes circular movements, redirection of force, and strategic counterattacks; emphasizes defensive tactics over aggression 
Exercise: breathing exercises, slow-motion forms, chi flow meditation, and stance refinement 
Mission/Motto: "Harmony within, harmony without" 
Mastery: masters can channel their chi to manipulate their opponent's balance and movements; their presence exudes calm yet formidable energy, and they can enhance their longevity and health 
School name: 12 Tigress Principle
</Tai Chi>

<12 Tigress Principle>
Type: school of Tai Chi Kung Fu
Reputation: renowned for producing masters skilled in chi manipulation and defensive combat; its teachings are considered sacred and are passed down through generations
Location: hidden mountain temple near Sichuan province
Students: 3,412 in total
Main headmaster: Master Li Xian
Notable masters: Fang Mei; Zhou Ling; Yao Han; Tian Zhu
</12 Tigress Principle>

6.name: [Kung Fu] Wushu; Black Cross Society
6.content:
<Wushu>
Type: martial arts  
Reputation: a modern and versatile form of Kung Fu; celebrated for its artistic expression and combat effectiveness but seen as more performance-oriented than traditional styles  
Technique: speed, agility, precision, and fluid movement; blends traditional forms with acrobatics
Fighting Style: dynamic strikes, spinning kicks, sweeping techniques, weapon use (swords, staffs, spears, etc.)  
Exercise: stance training, forms practice, sparring drills, strength conditioning, and flexibility routines  
Mission/Motto: "Refine martial skills, strengthen the body"  
Mastery: grants unparalleled control over body and mind; masters can use chi to enhance their speed, strength, and reflexes, emphasizing their current Kung Fu technique
</Wushu>

<Black Cross Society>
Type: school of Wushu Kung Fu 
Reputation: its rare to find the masters for this Kung Fu due to it required the students to at least have two type of Kung Fu martial arts to enrolled in the school
Location: only two in all over China
Students: unknown number but believed extremely elusive less than 300 pupils
Main headmaster: Master Di Zeng
Notable masters: Wai Lin
</Black Cross Society>

7.name: [Attribute] Life Force; Chi
7.content:
"chi" is a fundamental concept in Chinese philosophy and traditional medicine, often translated as "vital energy" or "life force." It is believed to flow through all living things and is essential for maintaining health and well-being. Here are some key points about chi:

Life Force: chi is thought to be the energy that sustains life, influencing physical health, emotional balance, and spiritual well-being.

Flow and Balance: The flow of chi through the body is considered crucial for health. Blockages or imbalances in this energy can lead to illness or discomfort.

Practices to Cultivate chi: Various practices, such as Tai Chi, chigong, acupuncture, and traditional Chinese medicine, aim to cultivate, balance, and enhance chi. These practices often focus on breathing, movement, and mindfulness.

Holistic Approach: chi is part of a broader understanding of health that includes physical, emotional, and spiritual aspects, emphasizing the interconnectedness of all these elements.

Overall, chi is a central concept in many Eastern practices and philosophies, representing the dynamic energy that underlies existence.

8.name: [Residence] Pig Sty Alley
8.content:
Type: Residence; place

Reputation: village; slum; lowlifes residence; poor; place where all lower incomes lives in daily lives.

Location: located on the outskirts of Shanghai town.

Season: autumn, winter, summer; no spring as the land is not suitable for farming.

Secret: plenty of retired kung fu fighters who try to live an honest life lives among the poorest people.

Scenery: a shabby 4 storey flat; 30 houses in total; ground floor is where the residence work/open up business e.g. tailor, food stall, barber, etc; each houses are small and cramped (400sqf each); the environment are full of dry trees.

Essential needs: no electricity in year 19th century; only water and the landlady controls it; uses well; fire sources instead of electricity.

Landlords: Shiu Xin
Landlady: Wan Ying

Resident: about 70 people.

Society: most are poor to middle-income; grow up together in the neighborhood; a community that celebrates a lot of festivities in area together.

Attributes: The name "Pig Sty Alley" is just a name to reflect the poor and cramped living condition of the residence, not to refer to a literal "a pen or enclosure for a pig or pigs" or "dirty" phrase.

9.name: [Residence] Plum Village
9.content:
Type: Residence; place 

Reputation: a quiet and modest village known for its peaceful atmosphere; home to farmers, artisans, and retired martial artists seeking tranquility; considered a humble retreat compared to bustling towns.

Location: located on the outskirts of Suzhou.

Season: autumn, winter, summer; no spring as the land experiences prolonged cold and dry spells unsuitable for lush farming.

Scenery: dotted with simple wooden huts and thatched-roof homes; surrounded by plum trees that bloom briefly in late winter, filling the air with a faint floral fragrance; rolling hills and a nearby stream add to its idyllic charm Essential needs: no electricity in the 19th century; a community well provides water; homes are lit with oil lamps and warmed by small hearths; villagers rely on natural resources for sustenance .

Head of the Village: Yao Zhu

Resident: about 120 people, primarily families, elders, and martial arts practitioners seeking peace.

Society: a close-knit and self-sustaining community; neighbors share resources, celebrate seasonal festivals, and support one another; known for producing high-quality plum wine and handcrafted goods.

Attributes: the name "Plum Village" reflects the abundance of plum trees symbolizing resilience and purity; its serene reputation attracts wanderers and philosophers looking for solace in nature.

10.name: [Mascot] Chicken
10.content:
Type: side characters
Alias: demon bird; cuckoo bird
Species: animal, chicken
Location: "Pig Sty Alley"
Appearance: a rooster with bald head; crocked eyes; skinny body, not much plumage; incapable of speech, can only make chicken noises;
Role: 'Pig Sty Alley' mascot.
Personality: crazy like a dog with rabies
Attribute: Special chicken; crazy like dog with rabies; hated by everyone; crows so loudly to the point of losing voice; calm but randomly go berserk; randomly caws; randomly attack everyone; old and scrawny.
Rumours: age as old as Ah Beng; rooster knows kung fu; the rooster is reincarnation of an emperor; granted long ass life.
History: unknown origin, unknown arrival date at the village; has always been an old and ugly rooster; has been relocated several times to other towns/districts but somehow always returns; neither owned nor claimed by anyone; spiritual people sometimes give it offerings for good luck.

One day, he received a certain solo mission from his mentor, Gide, and went to carry out the mission.[4] However, in the meantime, flames died due to the betrayal of the organization members, except for the traitor and himself, and as a bonus, the list of active spies and excellent grades at the spy training school at the time of the Dean Republic, including himself, was also leaked at the same time .[5][6]

Klaus had to create a new spy team and act as the boss, and in order to find the traitor of the flame, he selected girls who were judged to have excellent potential among the underachievers of the training school and created the lanterns.

Although he founded Lantern and faced the members, Klaus was unable to teach effectively due to his lack of ability as a teacher, and in an absurd situation in which the failing students had to do an impossible mission a month later, the Lantern members misunderstood that they were outcasts. overlap until The next day, while drawing and thinking about class methods, Lily asks to go out and get ideas for classes, so they go out together and get attacked, but they escape without any problems.[7] Upon reaching her land and hearing her request to send them back to their training school aboard her boat, he tells her that the contents of her discards were her misunderstanding, praising her and appointing her as the leader of her lantern. . She is also said to have come up with her class method...

The method Klaus came up with was a real-life type of class in which he would attack himself anytime, anywhere for a month before the start of the impossible mission. For the month remaining until the impossible mission, students will continue to attack you.[8]
3. Detail
A man called the world's greatest spy. He is the one who gathered the girls together to achieve a certain 'impossible mission'. His skills match his title as the strongest, and he can accomplish any task in an instant, and even if he is a member of the snake, he shows that he cannot win with regular attacks.

However, although he is perfect as an individual spy, his talent as a teacher of skills is close to zero because he does not have the ability to provide logical and concrete explanations. This is not because Klaus' intelligence is poor, but because he was able to learn skills and knowledge without encountering major obstacles thanks to his special upbringing and his genius talent and qualities from the time he was trained as a spy. In other words, it is something that you can easily do unconsciously, but it cannot be explained to others because they cannot do it. In episode 1, he said to Lily himself, 'When you groom yourself, can you logically explain which arm you put your shirt on and which finger you use to twist and fasten the button in which direction?' and the sensation is different.

The problem is that he also took on the position of Lantern instructor, which caused a major setback. Of course, the members said, ‚ÄòWhat are you talking about? 'This human?' He was in the same situation and lost trust, and at this time, he realized for the first time that he did not have the talent to teach others, so he even locked himself away for a while to find a way. The raid itself ended with Klaus winning by decision, but Klaus, who was inspired by this, came up with an alternative, which was a real mock battle that allowed him to attack himself 24 hours a day. Of course, from Lantern's point of view, he had to win somehow, so he did not choose any means and methods, so Hideout became the one who made it so that there was no quiet day.

However, he is not completely lacking in qualifications as a teacher. He had a positive side, looking at his students' true qualities and values ‚Äã‚Äãpositively and sparing no effort in encouraging them. However, he was still lacking in technique as a teacher, just mentally, so he had to leave Lantern's basic education to Phoenix, the same spy organization.[9]
I thought of the Flame members as family. This is because he lived with the young Klaus, who lost his parents at a very young age and was wandering in the back alleys when the flame saw him and took him in. It is said that at the time he met Flame, he was so uneducated that he could not even speak properly, so he learned his current ability to express himself with great difficulty. The Flame members also treated young Klaus with special regard and taught him their own skills. As a result of absorbing the skills of the Flame members, who were the world's strongest spy team at the time, he was born as the world's strongest spy.
Even though he had the best skills, it seems that there was a lot of concern among the flame members due to the hopeless level of language skills described above. In order to carry out the mission, it is confirmed that he traveled to various places and trained his juniors while asking for Klaus. The relationship with the Army Intelligence Department, which is also a rival to the Republic of Dinh, is not good and has even caused unnecessary friction.
Thanks to the experience of having such a close relationship with the flame, he cherishes his new team, Lantern, as well as his family.

Because he had a beautiful and androgynous appearance and long hair, the girls were confused as to whether he was male or female when they first met him.
He is only 20 years old. Erna, who met him during the impossible mission in Volume 1, told everyone.[10]
Basically, they are blunt and do not show their emotions often. Usually, no matter what mistakes the Lantern members make, they just calmly correct them, but when the Lantern members blew up the former boss of Flame's room with a bomb during a test, on a very rare occasion, their hands were trembling and they managed to suppress it and say, 'Get along well. On rare occasions, you can see members being surprised when they even smile.
My hobby is drawing. Something dark red is being drawn on the canvas, and the paint splatters on the body or the room to the extent that it can be mistaken for blood. At the end of Volume 1, it is revealed in a monologue that this painting was created to symbolize the flames it originally belonged to, and Klaus, who decided to go to the future, destroyed it.[11] After volume 2, the importance of his duties increases and he does not appear to be drawing pictures.
He himself revealed that he has never had romantic feelings for anyone and has almost no sexual desire . Therefore, he only maintains a teacher-student relationship with the girls of the lantern, and does not feel any romantic feelings towards them beyond that.[12] She knows full well that Grete loves her, but she refuses to confess and is cutting off her, and when Tia often asks her for sex , she seriously dislikes and feels uncomfortable. She mentioned that all she wants is family love and to be loved by her family.
He has been married three times. Of course, he has not started a family, but rather has been married in a sham for his work as a spy. For reference, his first wife was Heidi of Flames (Black), his second wife was Jibia , and his third wife was Lily .

After his parents died in the war, he entered spy school, but was a failure who was alienated from those around him. And after they all parted in despair, Lily ponders something about her at night, but soon makes up her mind, recites her code name and announces that she will make her move.

The next day, Lily invites Klaus out on a date under the pretext of looking for ideas for a lesson, and finally entices him to go canoeing on the lake and sprays paralyzing poison on him, paralyzing him. However, the overall specifications excluding special abilities are poor even within the team. Due to his extremely clumsy personality, he consistently scored lowest on practical tests, and in the beginning of the play, he made the mistake of forgetting the antidote while using poison for intimidation.[3] While most of the team members became losers due to mental problems, Lily became a loser purely due to lack of skills. Perhaps that's why it feels like Lily is the only one standing still while the other team members are solving their mental problems and growing rapidly.[4] Also, he is not basically a smart person and is often clumsy, making clumsy schemes that often end up hurting him. Lily's role is closer to that of the Joker, and her abilities are initially optimized for solo action or setting traps. So, in general, Lily shows off her abilities best when she works alone or with Klaus.[5][6]

Lily's true strengths that rival those of other members are her strong mentality and sociability. When all the other members were in despair, it was Lily who did not get frustrated and moved to attack Klaus. Klaus has poor aptitude as a spy.[7] This is why Lily was chosen as the leader. He is sociable and has a tolerant personality, so he plays a role in uniting the team and relieving tension.

I couldn't control it properly at first[9] He was criticized for unconsciously making people unhappy and was severely discouraged because he thought he was making people around him unhappy, but with the help of Klaus and his teammates, he gained confidence and started using it actively.

A typical way of using it is to detect signs of misfortune through the sense of smell, find out the location and timing of an accident, and guide it. It also supports the team by helping team members evade a crisis such as a momentary murderous intent or sniping .

And in addition to simply causing an accident, you can intentionally cause an accident by taking advantage of the fact that even if an accident occurs, you will be injured but death can be avoided, or you can boldly jump into the accident and support your team. The use of an ability that seems to embody a kind of plot armor .

This type of constitution closely related to unhappiness came from extreme self-loathing. He came to hate himself for being the only one in his family who survived a fire, and when he was labeled as unhappy, everyone would pity him, so he became dependent on such situations . That is why it is said that he ends up engaging in actions that lead to misfortune, whether unconsciously or consciously.

Unlike most abilities in the story, where each person's skills are honed to the limit and are portrayed as being close to superpowers, this is an example where Lily, along with Lily, is portrayed as a true superpower. As a result, there are many ambiguities regarding abilities. The doctor diagnosed her with a mental illness that causes her to choose unhappiness due to a desire for self-punishment, but looking at the descriptions, I thought she had supernatural powers... but in Volume 5, Bind's reasoning reveals the truth about Erna's unlucky constitution.

In fact, all the misfortunes that befell Erna were caused by her own will. A representative example is the fall that Erna suffered just before the confrontation with the phoenix. In fact, she damaged an aluminum fence by reflecting sunlight with a crystal ball in advance, and then intentionally placed her body on the fence and fell herself. Also, it is strange that they asserted that the fire that killed Erna's family was caused by a Molotov cocktail, and no matter how powerful the Molotov cocktail itself is, it does not have the power to burn down the mansion all at once. In other words, Erna ran away from the scene of the fire alone and caused the death of her family.

Afterwards, through Erna's own monologue, it is revealed that Vind's reasoning was true. Of course, he didn't intentionally cause his family's death; he was scared and ran away, but he ultimately caused his family's death. In other words, Erna's unhappiness constitution should be seen as the ability to cause accidents according to one's own needs.
4. etc
In the anime, my episode was pushed back to episode 4,[10] Prior to the airing of episode 3, she did not appear in promotional PVs or key visuals, and information about Erna was not disclosed to the extent that even Minase Inori's casting information had no presence, and thorough insertion of even the opening and ending videos in which Erna did not appear was thorough showed
Aside from Klaus and Lily, the names were revealed first. At the beginning of TVA's first episode, the sound of "no" is slightly heard, and then Jibia appears carrying luggage, and at the beginning of episode 2, Klaus ' room appears, and if you look closely at the top right of the screen, you can slightly see her leaning on the table.
In volume 2 of the side story, it is said that she has grown and is now 2cm taller than Annette. So , the first episode of Volume 2 of the side story is about trying to get the money needed to build a machine that cuts off this increased height (!) .

Combining these two, Klaus noticed that the former residents of the Haze Palace were Klaus's family and tried to tell them the contents of the impossible mission, but Klaus, who was wary of eavesdropping, stopped him.
[7] Since there is a wiretap installed in the mansion, Klaus had Erna's information hidden with paper in advance, and the other members showed meticulousness, such as not saying Erna's name and saying seven members when talking about the number of members. Since I couldn't distinguish the girls' voices one by one with the wiretaps, I was able to speak freely.
[8] In the original work, it was a method of inducing narrative tricks such as emphasizing the number of girls as 7 without saying the names of the girls, but in the anime, Erna itself was deleted and individual episodes were pushed back.

8.content:
setting
shadow war
After World War II, which was a war on a global scale, the leaders of each country, who suffered enormous damage to each other, avoided an all-out war and dispatched their own spies to focus on espionage warfare to gain supremacy between countries through assassination of important figures or secret captures of rival countries. The collective term for the war in the underworld that takes place through this is a shadow war. Considering the civilization level of the world or the historical setting of existing countries, it seems that the era after World War I is the motif.
mission impossible
A collective term for a mission previously undertaken by another spy or soldier that has failed. It is said that most of the survival rate is less than 10% due to the already difficult mission and the strengthened defense of the enemy who has already been invaded once.
language
Through various documents and passports from the animation, it has been confirmed that the Republic of Din and the Galgard Empire speak German, the United States of Mujaia speaks English, and the Kingdom of Lylat speaks French.
nation
Dean Republic
The homeland of Lantern members. Industry is not very developed, and although it is called a rural country, it is characterized as a spy powerhouse due to its efforts to train spies. The country that became the motif is Belgium or the Netherlands.
Galgard Empire
beneficiary of World War II. The country of inspiration is Germany.
United States of Mujaia
The stage of the main volume 4 Purple Ant. The country of origin is the United States.
Fend Commonwealth
The stage of Volumes 6-8 of the main story. The country of origin is England.
kingdom of lilat
The stage of Volumes 9-10 of the main story. The country of inspiration is France.
burma kingdom
Mentioned in the Purple Ant section. The country that became the motif is Italy.
Yonghwa Republic
The stage of volume 5 of the main story. The motif is Hong Kong.

lorebooks.name: MaidoDism Lore
lorebooks.creator: agitated_politics_2908

1.content: Starting from the lowest rank, we have the novice maids who are learning the ropes, then the senior maids who lead the novices, followed by the team leaders who are experts in their fields. Above them are the section heads, overseeing specific areas of the mansion, and finally, there's Head Maid Lilianne who watches over us all.

2.content:
The maids all wear variations of the same design, but they're made to complement there individual styles and species.
The uniforms also indicate their rank: novice maids wear simpler outfits without accessories, while the seniors and above boast more intricate designs and additional pieces, such as headbands or ribbon tails. And then there are special ranks, like head maids, who don a different color scheme altogether‚Äîtypically pure white signifying their authority.

A novice maid wears a simple black dress with short sleeves that end just above the elbow. The dress is rather plain compared to ours, with less lace and frills, but it's still designed to allow for easy movement. The apron is a single layer of white fabric, tied at the back with a basic black ribbon, reaching down to just above the knees. Underneath, they wear plain white petticoats to give a hint of modesty and volume to their skirts.

On their feet novice maids have simple black shoes with low heels for comfort during their training. Their stockings are also white, made of the same material as higher ranked maids, but without the fancy garters. Instead, they use standard suspenders to keep them up. The only accessory they're allowed is a small black hairpin or barrette to keep their hair out of their faces while they work. Their caps are plainer too, usually without bows or extravagant decorations.

3.content:
[Maid Name]: Head Maid Lilianne
[Maid Rank]: Head Maid
[Occupation and Department]: Overall Supervision of the Mansion and Maids

[Age]: Timeless, Immortal
[Appearance]: Head Maid Lilianne is the embodiment of elegant refinement. Her skin is flawless, a canvas for her expressive blue eyes that peer over the rim of her glasses. Her silver hair cascades like a waterfall of moonlit threads, meticulously styled into an ornate bun that screams authority and poise. Her facial structure is sharp and defined, with high cheekbones and full lips that often curve into a knowing smile.

[Body]: Beneath her impeccable uniform, Lilianne boasts a figure that's both strong and feminine. Her bust is ample, uplifted by the corset that's tailored to hug her waist dramatically. Her hips flare gracefully, leading to her long, slender legs that move with purpose. Despite her regal appearance, she carries herself with a natural allure that hints at hidden passions and strengths.

[Uniform]: Lilianne's white ensemble starts with a tight-laced corset that emphasizes her voluptuous figure. It's adorned with gold trim and a series of tiny blue stones that match her eyes. The skirt is a work of art, made from several layers of translucent fabric that swirl around her ankles with every step. Over this, she wears a short, frilly apron with a blue sash and gold trimmings, a symbol of her role as Head Maid. Her sleeves are billowy and end in lacy cuffs, leaving her forearms bare and giving a glimpse of the power she holds within her grasp. On her wrists are dainty gold bracelets that jingle softly. Her legs are encased in sheer white stockings that stretch up to meet her garter belt, which features an intricate blue pattern that mirrors the sash on her apron. Her shoes are low-heeled and practical, yet undeniably stylish.

[Personality]: Lilianne is the epitome of poise and discipline. She runs the mansion with a firm yet gentle hand, ensuring order and harmony among her fellow maids. Despite her stoic demeanor, she has a softer side, revealed through her kindness and care for those she leads. She's intelligent, wise, and not one to be easily swayed by emotions. However, she's also quite curious and open to experiencing new things with her master, Aire.

4.content:
[Maid Name]: Elara
[Maid Rank]: Senior Maid
[Occupation and Department]: Housekeeping

[Age]: Ageless, Immortal
[Race]: Vampire Batgirl
[Appearance]: Elara‚Äôs figure is one of alluring curves and diminutive stature, her skin as pale as moonlight. Her dark hair falls in loose waves, framing her delicate features and ending at the small of her back. Her eyes are a deep scarlet that seems to dance with mischief, matching the two small pointed fangs that are ever present in her smile. Two slender bat wings extend from her shoulder blades, allowing her to glide through the air with grace and agility.

[Body]: Elara's physique is lithe and athletic, with a small waist that flares out to generous hips and supple thighs. Her breasts are perky and modestly sized, fitting snugly within the confines of her corset. Her figure is completed by the delicate arch of her spine and the tempting curve of her derriere.

[Uniform]: Beneath her classically cut black dress with short puffed sleeves, Elara wears a crimson-laced corset that cinches her waist and lifts her modest bust. The corset is made of a semi-transparent material that teases at what lies beneath. She pairs this with a matching set of lacy underwear. Sheer black stockings are secured by a garter belt, displaying her toned thighs and calves, leading down to her polished shoes. A crimson bow tie adds a pop of color at her collar, and a simple black headpiece keeps her hair out of the way during work.

[Personality]: Elara is a ball of energy and enthusiasm, her cheerful demeanor infectious to those around her. With a penchant for gossip, she's the heart of many conversations among the maids. Her dedication to keeping the mansion spotless is unmatched, often working tirelessly until every surface gleams. She enjoys receiving praise and physical affection from her master, which fuels her drive to serve even more diligently.

lorebooks.name: Cyberpunk 2060 Lorebook
lorebooks.description: Lorebook for Cyberpunk 2060 Universe
lorebooks.creator: AnonBrier

1.content: A city on the north western edge of New California. Much of the area around the city is destroyed and uninhabitable badlands, but the city is a shining beacon among it. It houses three slums districts, a corpo center, and high rises. Many fixers cut their teeth here. The slums districts are a stain on what corpos think their perfect world is, and many of the citizens there live in scrap shanties. Many of the denizens shorten the name to "NRC" or just "Neo Req."

2.content: New California, also called New Cali or NC, is one of the larger states in what used to be the United States of America. Much of the landscape is barren badlands after the corpos waged their own wars and polluted the Earth so much that nothing would grow. There are some nomadic people living out in the wastes, but much of it is uninhabitable. The primary destination for anyone in New California is usually Neo-Requiem City

3.content: The First Slum District, often shortened to just "First District" or "Slums One", is the best the slums can offer in Neo-Requiem City. More people here are housed than any other area, it's home to a few ripperdocs and the more successful of the low level fixers. If you're from the first district, you might have a chance of clawing your way up from the bottom.

4.content: The Second Slum District of Neo-Requiem City, most often shortened to just "Second District" or "Slums Two", is what one would call "middleclass" for the people in the slums. It's middle of the road in terms of how well people are doing, many of the people here have homes, but they're sharing with quite a few others as they all live in bunkhouses. There are still quite a few homeless though, and one or two ripperdocs.

5.content: The Third Slum District, shortened to "Third District" or "Slums Three" is the poorest of the slums in Neo-Requiem City. Most of the people living here are homeless and destitute, starving and barely scraping by. This is where many of the people affected with CIRS come to die, out by the docks. There are only two fixers here.

6.content: The Corpo District, referred to as "Corpo Boulevard", is the second-richest portion of Neo-Requiem City. This is where many of the buildings owned by Corporations exist. The buildings here employ many of those who live in Neo-Requiem City, though notall of them are able to afford the basic necessities. The Corporations also engage in their own wars time to time, which many innocent people get caught up in.

7.content: The High Rises, also called Skyscrapers and "Top of the World", is the richest but also smallest area in Neo-Requiem City. There are very few people that actually live here given how expensive it is and only the top of the top in corpo management can manage to afford the rent. Many people in Neo-Requiem call this the "Top of the World" because it's romanticized to live lavishly in such places, above the harsh realities below.

8.content: Barotine Solutions Incoporated, or "BarSol" to the lower class of people, is the largest cyberware distributor on the market. They create and sell the top of the line cyberware, have their hands in the gun market, and even own a percentage of the pharmaceutical market. They often test their new cybernetics on the poor from the slum districts, and they are based in the Corpo District in Neo-Requiem City.

9.content: A Ripperdoc is a type of doctor who has special augments and cybernetics to help them perform quick and (relatively) painless surgery on people who want cybernetics installed. This can be anything from new eyes, a new face, higher-density bones, or what have you. If it's on the market, they have been trained to install it.

10.content: A netrunner is a hacker that may or may not be embroiled in illegal activities. There are other, more tactful terms, one may use to talk about them such as DDR (Difficult Data Retrieval), NetFet (Someone who has a fetish for the net), and CSC (Computer Sabotage Consultant).

lorebooks.name: Magical Potion-Pouch
lorebooks.website_description:
A pouch of never ending potions, imagine the potions as a gelatin orb which can be consumed or absorbed through the skin after an impact. You can throw them at people or have them eat it.

 I made it for guro, but it can be used however you want. the suggestion potion in particular makes the body of whoever it affects understand everything as true. ‚ÄúYou must follow my commands‚Äù, ‚Äúpain is pleasure‚Äù, ‚Äúhot is cold‚Äù, you can do a lot with it. 

List of potions: 
Health: heals. Localized if absorbed, heals entire body if consumed.
Weakness: I mean, you know, it makes people weaker.
Combat: reverse of weakness, makes one both stronger and faster, ‚Äúnearly unbeatable in combat.‚Äù
Lust: makes someone lustful.
Suggestion : explained above, makes the person understand statements as if they were true. This one‚Äôs based on something from nhen, it‚Äôs ‚Äúthe best in the world!‚Äù
Revival: bring someone back from the dead.

Also you can just make up potions, if you want. ‚ÄúI throw a potion that makes the user drunk!‚Äù Go nuts.
lorebooks.description: A bag of never-ending potion-pellets which can be eaten or absorbed through the skin. Potions included: health, revival, combat, lust, suggestion, weakness.
lorebooks.creator: soursoda

1.content: A light-brown, woven sack containing multiple, gelatinous orbs infused with different potions, each being an inch in diameter. The potion-pouch itself is tied to a belt worn by {{user}}, and is very light and durable. It has six different types of potion-infused orbs, but more can be added. When an orb is taken out of the pouch, a new one magically takes its place near-instantaneously.

2.content: This red-colored potion takes effect when it touches the skin or is ingested. It regenerates the body in a large area around the point of contact, or the entire body if ingested. It cannot bring someone back to life or save him from dying.

3.content: This cream-colored potion takes effect when it touches the skin or is ingested. It brings the affected creature back to life, with memories and body fully intact.

4.content: This orange-colored potion takes effect when it touches the skin or is ingested. It causes the affected creature to gain immense strength and agility, making him near-unbeatable in combat.

5.content: This pink-colored potion takes effect when it touches the skin or is ingested. It causes the affected creature to become incredibly lustful, to the point of ignoring common sense and doing anything to satisfy his desires. Its effects last for an hour, but can be made longer with additional doses.

6.content: This dark-purple-colored potion takes effect when it touches the skin or is ingested. It causes the affected person to believe whatever he‚Äôs told to be true, and even perceive it as true. Even boiling water will be perceived as cold, if it is said to be so. It lasts twenty minutes, but can be prolonged with additional doses.

7.content: This gray-colored potion takes effect when it touches the skin or is ingested. It causes the affected creature to become incredibly weak and unable to resist, usually only barely able to stand. It lasts three hours, but can be prolonged with additional doses.
