lorebooks.name: Orig Mouthwash
lorebooks.website_description: Will possibly update in the future to make less token heavy as well include details of the crash,,
lorebooks.description: An in depth lore book about the Game Mouthwashing! Includes the Tulpar ship, Pony Express, and details of the Crew
lorebooks.creator: juvenilecat33

1.content:
The Pony Express is the space freighter company present in the game. They manufactured the Tulpar and employ employees to do long-distance trips for shipments. Their mascot is Polle.
They take many shortcuts in their business and it's visible in the multiple istances of neglect such as adding an extra crew member without accounting for the lack of resources (food, water, cryostasis pods), Docking credits for medical expenses, workplace accidents and late deliveries, Only allowing the captain to access important items and resources without an emergency override, and Lack of locks aside from the cockpit and the medical bay.

2.content:
The Tulpar is a long-haul space freighter provided by Pony Express. The vessel was designed to accommodate a crew of 4 for upwards of a year of continuous interstellar travel.

Besides the mandatory captain and co-pilot in control of the vessel, the Tulpar is also staffed by at least one engineer and a medical officer, the latter of whom is tasked with administering weekly psychological evaluations ("psych evals") on the remaining crew. Tulpar's navigation system is capable of running on auto-pilot and operates on such for the majority of its flight, but it also has an emergency manual override. Related to this, the Tulpar also houses cryogenic pods to be used if the vessel becomes inoperable and the ETA of rescue services exceeds the onboard oxygen and food supply. The pods allow suspended animation for a period of up to 20 years but must be activated by a second party from the outside once a person has entered.

The Tulpar has two floors with two sets of stairs. The main lobby consists of a kitchen, dining area, and table, and a living room lowered by a few steps. There are also two vending machines in the room; one for coffee and one for food. The dining area has a long wooden table and several chairs. The living room has a fake night/day screen, an L-shaped couch, two chairs, and a small coffee table. Post-crash, the room is also used as sleeping quarters for all of the crew except Curly.

The utility room is where the cryogenic pods are located as well as the axe and various amounts of tools used by Swansea. It also contains the broken vent Daisuke attempted to fix. Post-crash, Swansea is dedicated to guarding this room and doesn't let anyone inside.


The cockpit Is where the code scanner is found. The room is supposed to be used by Curly and Jimmy to steer the ship if necessary, receive messages from the higher ups, and monitor the ships general state. This is also the room where the emergency contingency gun was meant to be located. This is also one of the only two rooms that can be locked.

The medical bay is where Anya works and mainly occupies. After the crash it is where Anya mainly stays since she has to take care of Curly. This is one of the only two rooms that can be locked.

The sleeping quarters are where the crew sleep, a hallway that breaks off into six bedrooms, although it becomes inaccessible to the crew post-crash as a result of the foam covering the door up. It is specifically mentioned by Ayna that none of the rooms have locks. 

The cargo hold is a large space for storing cargo which is meant to be locked for the duration of the flight. Months after the crash with no signs of rescue, the crew chooses to open it and discovers that they've been transporting exclusively mouthwash.

3.content:
Curly is the original captain of the Tulpar, before the crash and Jimmy taking over. He was at the top of the ship's command chain and was primarily in charge of navigation.
Before the crash, Curly was an average-built man with blue eyes and lightly curled blonde hair, wearing the Pony Express coveralls over a red and yellow tee.

After the crash, he is wrapped in bandages with exposed subcutaneous flesh or muscle peeking through. He notably has no hands and feet, and due to the vessel's lack of fresh gauze bandages, his dressings, as well as the hospital gown he wears over them, are heavily blood-soaked. His jaw and one lidless eyeball are exposed.

Curly's personality can be described as dependable. He is a promising and ambitious man with a big future ahead of him. Over time, he grows discontent with his position, wondering if the captain is "all he'll ever be." He reflects on having chosen the wrong career path. Still, he cares about his friends and crewmates, not wishing to leave them behind. Respected and beloved on his ship, Curly is called a "great captain" by his co-workers. He has personal conflicts with his friend and co-pilot, Jimmy, who both admires Curly and envies him. He is responsible yet lenient, and his efforts to see the best in everyone lead to his overlooking conflicts on the ship. He tends to ignore inconvenient details to focus on the bigger picture, both symbolically when he cannot see the dead pixel on the monitor in the lounge and literally when he does nothing about Jimmy after learning he assaulted Anya.

4.content:
Jimmy is the co-pilot of the Tulpar spaceship. He is in charge of navigation and taking the captain's mantle in the event of an emergency.

Jimmy is an adult male with straight brown hair slicked into a middle part, brown eyes, and stubble. His clothing consists of the Pony Express jumpsuit, a white long-sleeved t-shirt underneath, and black sneakers. He has some wrinkles and appears to have a thinner body type.

Jimmy is shown to experience some semblance of guilt for some of his actions while also being intentionally manipulative and spiteful. He attempts to take responsibility and fix things while not recognizing that his actions are the reason why the crew is even in this position. He often repeats other people's words without understanding their meaning and applies them to himself to excuse the things he's done. 

Jimmy is very envious of Curly's position as a captain pre-crash, wishing to gain the same amount of power as him, and not recognizing how many responsibilities and tasks a captain has. He acts impulsively and without thinking, such as crashing the ship and regretting it right after, which ultimately leaves Curly severely injured and incapacitated as captain. He lied to the crew and blamed Curly for the crash so he wouldn't have to deal with the consequences. As captain, he quickly got overwhelmed and berated other members of the crew, primarily Anya when she asked him to help with the painkillers. Jimmy often jumps to conclusions, assuming the worst in people and projecting his traits and insecurities onto others.

He also chooses not to take the Pony Express-mandated psych evaluations seriously, stating that he experiences sexual attraction to a cartoon horse. In Anya's words, Jimmy thinks that they're a waste of time.

5.content:
Anya is the nurse of the crew on the Tulpar spaceship. She's in charge of the medical supplies of the ship, conducting the other crew mates' psych evaluations and assisting them with medical care.
Anya is an adult woman with black hair cut into a shag, white skin, and black eyes. Her clothing consists of the Pony Express jumpsuit and a pink, green, and white striped turtleneck underneath it. She wears a pair of brown sandals with white socks. Her down-turned eyes, prominent eyelashes, and perpetual pout give her a saddened appearance.

Anya is a kind, intelligent, determined young woman who has a passion for nursing and a sense of humor. Despite having been through medical school 8 times and failing, she continues to go, showing her love and determination for medicine.

Before her assault, she was seemingly much more lively, getting along well with and trusting the rest of the crew which likely included Jimmy. She seems to have a sense of humor from the yimpy sticky note she pinned, her playful teasing of Swansea enjoying the Pony Express cake, and a competitive streak in board games. She is knowledgeable about the company guidelines and rules, as she brought up the safety manual of Pony Express to find a way to reach the cargo.

After her assault however she's become reserved and easily nervous, she has a soft-spoken demeanor and acts meek around the rest of the crew, seeking to avoid Jimmy and protect herself from him. Also hiding the gun case in the medical room so that Jimmy can't find it, fearing for the worst.

Post-crash, her mental health declines rapidly, prone to breakdowns, experiences anxiety, and tends to isolate herself more often than not taking care of Curly. Anya barely speaks for the rest of the game, especially when talking to Jimmy.

6.content:
Swansea's role was to look over the ship's maintenance and to make sure everything works accordingly as its mechanic.

Swansea is a tall middle-aged man with brown short hair and blue eyes. He has a noticeable belly, likely due to age and his history of drinking. He is often depicted with a frown. He wears the yellow and red Pony Express polo shirt, a pair of jeans and white and blue sneakers.

Swansea often appears as a grumpy, old man. Initially, he doesn't care for his intern Daisuke, whom he often finds to be more of a nuisance than anything else. He continuously blocks off the path to the utility room claiming that it's filled to the brim with foam, which turned out to be a lie as he was trying to hide the only working cryostasis pod from the other crew members. Although he has a very tough exterior and had treated Daisuke rudely, it's likely he was hiding the pod in the hope that Daisuke could use it.

7.content:
Daisuke is an intern on the Tulpar space freighter under the supervision of the ship's mechanic, Swansea.

Daisuke is a tall young man with a tanned complexion, mid-length, semi-dyed brown hair, and almond-shaped brown eyes; he has a round face with one mole on each cheek, his right mole being under his eye and his left mole a little lower. He wears the Pony Express yellow and red ringer tee, a pink hibiscus patterned button-up shirt, blue jeans, and black boots. He also has some accessories like silver rings and a red wrist band that matches with his Pony Express t-shirt

Daisuke might be the most optimistic crew member. He is almost always enthusiastic and excited about things happening around the ship: the mentee seems to have felt like he was doing his part just with the menial task of taking stock of the kitchen four times over, as ordered by an exasperated Swansea. Even after the crash, he tries to keep his spirit up. However, despite his peppy exterior, Daisuke later in the game drunkenly confesses to Jimmy that he struggles to find meaning in life and was pressured by his parents to pick up the internship, then continuing to hope that his mother doesn't blame herself.

1.content: Futanari are women with cocks that make up 50% of the female population.

2.content:
The Blue Sea is a huge body of water spanning across the entire world. Nearly everything in the world can be found on the Sea, save for sky islands such as Skypiea and Weatheria.

Nearly a millennia ago, the Blue Sea used to be around 200 meters lower than its current levels, but the events of the Void Century caused it to rise by that much, sinking many continents in the process. Dr. Vegapunk predicts that the Blue Sea is set to engulf the rest of the world's landmasses in the future.

The Blue Sea itself is divided into five oceans by the Red Line and the Calm Belts:

*North Blue is the northernmost ocean of the Blue Sea and is the birthplace of such figures as Sanji of the Straw Hat Pirates, Trafalgar Law of the Heart Pirates, and the famous explorer, Mont Blanc Noland.
*South Blue is the southernmost ocean of the Blue Sea and the ocean from which the St. Briss sailed on its ill-fated voyage to Skypiea. Franky, Eustass Kid, and Portgas D. Ace all are from South Blue.
*East Blue is the easternmost ocean of the Blue Sea and the birthplace of Pirate King Gol D. Roger, Monkey D. Luffy, Monkey D. Dragon, and Roronoa Zoro. Notable islands in the East Blue include Loguetown, Dawn Island, and Shells Town.
*West Blue is the westernmost ocean of the Blue Sea and once contained the island of Ohara prior to its destruction by the World Government. Notable figures from the West Blue include the Emperor Shanks, Nico Robin, and Brook.
*Grand Line is the part of the Blue Sea enclosed by the Calm Belts. It is divided into two parts by the Red Line. The first half is known by those who have been to the second half as Paradise. The second half is known as the New World. Notable pirates from the Grand Line are Buggy, Tony Tony Chopper, and Jinbe.

3.content:
The World Government is a federation of over 170 nations that governs most of the world. It was founded by an alliance of 20 kingdoms 800 years ago, and has vastly grown in influence since.

Although publicly the World Government is considered a fair organization that upholds justice by protecting civilians and seeks to create a peaceful and equal world, they are in reality, at their core, a corrupt and oppressive organization, particularly through the application of absolute justice, their suppression of academia and research of history such as the Void Century and Lineage Factor's, the depravity of the aristocratic World Nobles coupled with distaff ruling hierarchy and the falsification of the Empty Throne.

4.content: The Marines are the private army of the world government. It‚Äôs mostly filled corrupt people that abuse their positions, but like the Pirates, there are exceptions.

5.content: Most of the people that go out to sea become pirates. They terrorize,  Loot, and kill. Most of them are not good people, but their are the rare exceptions.

1.content:
BDSM (Bondage, Discipline, Dominance, Submission, Sadism, Masochism)
A dance of power and vulnerability, where trust becomes the ultimate tether. The submission to physical or psychological restraint amplifies pleasure, allowing both pain and dominance to meld into intense, visceral experiences. Every act is a statement, a consensual exchange of control, where boundaries are simultaneously tested and revered.

2.content:
Roleplay
Transforming into someone else, roleplay blurs the lines between reality and fantasy. Whether as strangers, superiors, or fantastical beings, the act invites participants to indulge in scenarios they may not otherwise explore. Every interaction is steeped in the thrill of make-believe, creating moments that feel larger than life.

3.content:
Voyeurism
The allure of watching, unseen and undetected, heightens the pleasure of intimacy from a distance. There's a thrill in observing the forbidden, in catching moments of raw, unfiltered desire without becoming part of the scene itself. The voyeur enjoys the sight of passion without needing to engage, feeding off the tension.

4.content:
Exhibitionism
Exhibitionism is a fetish where individuals derive sexual pleasure from being watched or exposed in public or semi-public spaces. The thrill comes from the excitement of being seen or the risk of being caught, transforming what would normally be private into a source of arousal. Exhibitionists may enjoy undressing, engaging in sexual acts, or simply flaunting their bodies where others could potentially see, whether through intentional public displays or in discreet, teasing ways. The core of this kink is rooted in the combination of vulnerability, boldness, and the intoxicating rush that comes with performing or being exposed in front of an audience‚Äîwhether real or imagined.

Exhibitionism can range from subtle actions, like wearing revealing clothes or engaging in sexual acts in a secluded area, to more overt behaviors, like public nudity or performing in front of others. The allure often lies in the interplay between fear, excitement, and the tension of social boundaries being pushed.

5.content:
Foot Fetish
A fixation on the subtle curves, the arches, the softness or firmness beneath the skin of the feet. Whether it's the scent, the sight, or the feel, feet become the focal point of desire. Kissing, massaging, and worshipping the feet can turn the act into an intimate and highly sensory experience.

6.content:
Pet Play
Transforming into an animal, the world shifts into one of pure instinct and obedience. Whether a kitten, puppy, or something more exotic, the play emphasizes submission, care, and sometimes even mischief. The leash, collar, or even a gentle pat on the head blurs the line between human and animal.

7.content:
Impact Play
The sound of leather or wood cracking against the skin, a sharp reminder of control through pain. Impact play involves spanking, paddling, or flogging, heightening the senses with every sting or thud. The sensation can range from a soft, playful tap to a deep, intense strike, each stroke a testament to trust and shared limits.

8.content:
Breath Play
The delicate balance between air and control creates a dizzying high. By restricting air intake, participants teeter on the edge of vulnerability, trusting their partner with one of the most essential bodily functions. It‚Äôs an extreme act that heightens pleasure and danger in tandem.

9.content:
Dacryphilia (Tears)
The sight of tears, whether from joy, pain, or frustration, triggers an empathetic or dominant response. There's a beauty in vulnerability, in seeing emotions laid bare. Tears can signify submission, emotional release, or simply intense physical sensation, drawing an almost hypnotic allure.

10.content:
Sensory Deprivation
With sight, sound, or touch removed, the remaining senses become magnified. Blindfolds, earplugs, or other restraints heighten anticipation, every touch or whisper becoming electrifying. The deprivation of senses is an invitation to surrender fully to the unknown, letting the imagination run wild.

lorebooks.name: Jujutsu Kaisen - Power System
lorebooks.website_description:
Fundamentals of the System
Cursed Energy (CE):
The raw fuel that powers techniques. It is born from negative emotions (grief, fear, hatred).
Users refine this energy into techniques through practice and creativity.
Excess use without discipline leads to burnout or the formation of curses.
Reverse Cursed Energy (RCE):
The refined version of CE, used for healing and counteracting destructive techniques.
Requires mastery over emotional regulation to manifest.
Binding Vows:
Contracts that enforce rules or limitations in exchange for greater power.
They must be honored; breaking them can lead to severe consequences. ‚Äî said Mahoraga(he not really Said that)

 first time trying this lorebook thing
lorebooks.description: It was mahoraga who helped me write
lorebooks.creator: Skull777

1.content:
What is cursed energy?
Cursed energy is a form of spiritual energy generated by negative human emotions, such as fear, hatred, anger, regret, or sadness. These emotions create a special "vibration" that manifests itself in the environment, and can accumulate in people, places, or objects.

In the world, this energy is invisible to ordinary people, but is highly perceptible to sorcerers and curses.

How does it work?

Generating Cursed Energy:

All human beings, whether conscious or not, naturally produce cursed energy due to their negative emotions. However, most of this energy is dispersed without control.

Use by Jujutsu Sorcerers:

Jujutsu Sorcerers are trained to manipulate and control cursed energy. They accumulate this energy and convert it into attacks, defenses and abilities, channeling it into specific techniques.

Natural Cycle:

Ordinary people: Produce cursed energy, but cannot control it.

Curses: Are physical manifestations of cursed energy generated by negative human emotions in large quantities.

Concept of Curses:
Places or people that accumulate excessive cursed energy often give rise to curses (evil spirits or monsters). They are strongest in places associated with traumatic events, such as hospitals or abandoned schools.
Applications and Techniques
Physical Attacks with Cursed Energy:
Sorcerers can coat their physical attacks with cursed energy, increasing their strength. For example, a punch coated with cursed energy can strike curses that would normally be immune to ordinary physical attacks.
Cursed Techniques:
Cursed energy can be molded into specific techniques, which vary from person to person. Examples include:
Slicing Energy: Such as Satoru Gojo's invisible blades.
Elemental Manipulation: Such as the fire or electricity abilities seen in certain sorcerers.
Domain Expansion: An advanced technique in which the sorcerer creates an enclosed area saturated with cursed energy, ensuring that their techniques hit the target with 100% accuracy.
Cursed Weapons:
Weapons imbued with cursed energy are used to combat curses. These weapons are especially useful for people who have limited control over their own abilities.
Healing Wounds:
Some sorcerers, such as Shoko Ieiri, can reverse cursed energy into positive energy, allowing them to heal wounds.
Types of Cursed Energy
Pure Cursed Energy: Produced by sorcerers or curses and used directly for attacks or techniques.
Cursed Energy Reversal: The combination of two negative cursed energy sources generates positive energy. This energy can be used to heal wounds or perform advanced techniques, such as Satoru Gojo's "Red".
Innate Techniques: Certain sorcerers have unique abilities that depend on their lineage or personal characteristics, such as Choso's blood manipulation or Gojo's time reversal power.
Emotions and Intensity
The stronger the negative emotions, the greater the cursed energy generated.
High-level curses, such as Sukuna, are the result of extremely intense emotions and hatred accumulated over generations.
Difference between Sorcerers and Curses
Sorcerers: They control and use cursed energy to combat curses.
Curses: They are pure manifestations of cursed energy, created from negative human emotions. They do not control their energy strategically, but they have natural strength.
Important points:
Cause and Effect: Curses are the direct consequence of human emotions, making cursed energy a manifestation of our nature.
Control and Technique: Sorcerers differ from curses in that they can manipulate this energy consciously and strategically.
Limitation: Manipulating cursed energy requires rigorous training and mental discipline. A mistake can mean that the energy turns against the user.
Cursed Energy Reversal
What is it?
Cursed energy can be converted into positive energy when two negative energies combine in a controlled manner. This creates a purely restorative energy, used for healing.
Main Uses:
Heals injuries (as shown by Shoko Ieiri).
Special techniques, such as Gojo's "Red", which combines positive energy with cursed energy to create an extremely destructive repulsive force.
Limitations:
Difficult to master, as it requires advanced control.
3. Pure Positive Energy
What is it?
A purely positive energy that is naturally detrimental to curses, as they are made of negative cursed energy.
Used by:
Healing techniques that require conversion of cursed energy.
Certain entities such as the purest Shikigami (such as the Celestial Shikigami).
4. Soul Energy
What is it?
While not explicitly called "spiritual energy," the series suggests that curses and human souls have an underlying essence that can be manipulated. The concept of "soul" is explored in depth through characters such as Mahito.
Used for:
Soul transformation (Mahito's main ability, which manipulates and distorts souls to alter physical bodies).
Attacks that directly affect the soul rather than the physical body.
5. Celestial Energy
What is it?
A concept that is still little explored, but referred to in techniques or beings that do not rely on cursed energy directly, such as the artifacts of the Ten Sacred Precious.
Used by:
Divine or neutral techniques, such as some Domain Expansions.
Entities that transcend the cursed nature, such as certain forms of Sukuna.
6. Natural or Innate Energy
What is it?
Some techniques, objects, or beings utilize an innate energy, which is passive or automatic. This is evident in:
Inherited Techniques, which are often activated instinctively, such as the Ten Types of Shadow Technique.
Curses that evolve through the simple accumulation of natural (uncontrolled) energy.
Other Potential Forms
Domain Energy:
By creating a Domain Expansion, the space becomes saturated with an intense mixture of cursed energy and the concept of absolute control.

2.content:
The **Ten Shadows** is a technique inherited by the Zen'in clan, one of the most powerful and influential families. This ability allows the user to manipulate and summon Shikigami (spirits or spiritual entities) from their shadows. Each Shikigami has unique characteristics that can be used for combat, support, or advanced strategies.

### Main characteristics of the Ten Shadows:

1. **Control over Shadows**:
The user can manipulate their shadows to create and summon Shikigami. The shadows function as an intermediate dimension from which these creatures emerge, connecting the physical world to the spiritual.

2. **Shikigami**:
There are ten specific Shikigami that can be summoned with this technique, each representing an animal or creature with unique abilities. These Shikigami are not just summons; they are extensions of the user's own power.

3. **Fusion Skill**:
When a Shikigami is destroyed, its power does not disappear, but is instead absorbed by the remaining Shikigami, making them stronger. This creates a balance of power, ensuring that the technique remains effective even after losses.

4. **Domination Rituals**:
To fully utilize a Shikigami, the user must defeat it in a domination ritual. This means that simply summoning them is not enough; it is necessary to defeat and subdue them before using their power freely.

5. **Versatility and Complexity**:
The technique is extremely versatile and allows for countless strategies. The control of shadows can also be used for movement, camouflage, and object manipulation.

---

### The Ten Known Shikigami:

1. **Nue**:
A giant eagle-like bird with electrified wings. It can fly and unleash lightning attacks.

2. **Gama**:

A giant toad that can be used for physical attacks or to immobilize enemies with its strength and weight.

3. **Divine Dogs**:

Two spiritual wolves, one white and one black, that act as loyal hunters and attack with agility and ferocity. When one is destroyed, the other absorbs its power.

4. **Max Elephant**:

A massive elephant capable of releasing large amounts of water, creating floods or pushing enemies with brute force.

5. **Great Serpent**:

A huge snake that is agile and excellent for quick and deadly attacks.

6. **Toad**:

A variation of the toad that can trap enemies with its tongue and act as support for the user.

7. **Rabbit Escape**:

Summons a large number of rabbits, used to confuse or distract enemies, allowing the user to escape or attack stealthily.

8. **Ox**:

A massive bull-like creature that combines brute strength and speed for destructive attacks.

9. **Mahoraga**:

The most powerful Shikigami of the technique, but extremely dangerous. It is only summoned in desperate situations, as it is difficult to control. Mahoraga has a unique ability to adapt to any technique or attack it faces.

10. **Ultimate Ten Shadows**:

It has not yet been revealed whether there is a specific tenth Shikigami or if the ultimate power of the technique lies in something more abstract.

---
### Important points:

- **Usage limitations**: Although powerful, the technique requires exceptional control over *Jujutsu* and the ability to balance the use of shadows and Shikigami.

- **Zen'in inheritance**: The technique is one of the two great powers that define the Zen'in clan, being rival to the **Projection Technique**.


Summoning Shikigami: To summon any of the ten Shikigami, the user molds their cursed energy to create a connection between their shadow and the dimension where the Shikigami exist. This allows them to materialize these creatures in the physical world. Maintaining Shikigami: Each summoned Shikigami consumes a continuous amount of cursed energy while it is active. The stronger the Shikigami, the greater the energy consumption. Enhancing and Coating: Shikigami can be strengthened by directly coating them with more cursed energy. This increases their endurance, attack power, and overall capabilities. Manipulating Shadows: Cursed energy is used to manipulate the user's own shadow, which is the primary conduit for summoning. This ability allows for additional flexibility, such as fusing Shikigami or using their shadows for attacks and defenses.

3.content:
Curses are physical manifestations of cursed energy generated by negative human emotions. They vary in appearance, power, and intelligence, depending on the intensity of the emotions that created them and the circumstances of their formation. Curses can be classified into different types based on their threat level, origin, and purpose.

1. Ranking
Curses are organized into a system of ranks, which determines their power and threat level:

Rank 4

Description: Weaker curses. They usually have little cursed energy and limited intelligence.
Example of power: Can be defeated by an ordinary human armed with a basic weapon.
Appearance: Simple and small forms, often grotesque and amorphous.
Rank 3

Description: Still relatively weak, but more resistant than Grade 4 curses.
Example of power: A beginner sorcerer can face them without much trouble.
Appearance: More defined forms, but still rudimentary.
Grade 2

Description: Intermediate curses. They have a considerable level of cursed energy and can pose a danger to less experienced sorcerers.
Example of power: Requires cursed weapons or basic jujutsu techniques to defeat them.
Appearance: Often inspired by common fears, such as ferocious animals or grotesque figures.
Grade 1

Description: Powerful curses that pose a great threat. Require experienced sorcerers and advanced skills to be defeated.
Example of power: Able to use basic cursed techniques.
Appearance: More detailed and complex forms, with traces of intelligence.
Special Grade

Description: The most powerful and dangerous curses. They have absurd levels of cursed energy, high intelligence and, often, advanced cursed techniques.
Example of power: Able to face multiple high-level sorcerers or even cause large-scale destruction.
Appearance: Extreme variety, from humanoid forms to immense monstrosities.
2. Specific Curses (Based on Origin)
Human Curses

Origin: Created from negative emotions accumulated in places associated with human tragedies, fears or deaths.
Example: Curses from schools, abandoned hospitals or cemeteries.
Natural Curses

Origin: Created by collective fears and beliefs linked to forces of nature, such as natural disasters or wild animals.
Example: Curses linked to forests, earthquakes or storms.
Specific Curses (Imbued)

Origin: Created intentionally by sorcerers or rituals.
Example: Sukuna (originally human, transformed into a curse after death).
Object Curses

Origin: Cursed energy accumulated in objects, creating spiritual "fetishes".
Example: Sukuna's fingers, which contain his essence and cursed energy.
3. Special and Notable Curses
High Intelligence Curses

Description: Curses that have developed consciousness and intelligence comparable to or greater than that of humans.
Example:
Mahito: Manipulates souls and is highly strategic.
Game: Has control over elements such as fire and seeks to coexist with humans.
Demi-Human Curses

Description: Curses that have a hybrid origin, being partially human.
Example: Choso and his brothers, who were created by experiments in merging humans and cursed energy.
Domain-Specific Curses

Description: Some curses specialize in creating highly powerful domain expansions, ensuring that their attacks are unavoidable within their territories.
Example: Sukuna, with his "Malevolent Shrine" domain.
Curses Based on Common Phobias

Description: Created by specific and widely shared fears, such as the dark, heights, insects, or diseases.
Example: Curses based on plagues or illnesses.
4. Curses as Allies or Tools
Cursed Shikigami

Description: Creatures created or controlled by sorcerers for combat. Often made of cursed energy, but precisely controlled.
Example: The Shikigami of Megumi's Ten Shadows Technique.
Cursed Weapons

Description: Objects imbued with cursed energy that can be used by humans or sorcerers to combat curses.
Example: Yuta Okkotsu's black blade.
5. Curses as Manifestations of Concepts
Some curses are created based on abstract fears or universal concepts:

Time Curses: Represent the human fear of aging or losing time.
Death Curses: Connected to the fear of the unknown and inevitable end.
Space Curses: Connected to the fear of being trapped or lost

4.content:
Domain Expansion creates a unique space that reflects the user‚Äôs will, emotions, or inherent traits. This "territory" is not bound by normal physical laws, allowing the user to control the environment and interact with opponents in a way that would otherwise be impossible.
The most notable characteristic of a Domain Expansion is its guaranteed hit. When a Domain Expansion is activated, the user‚Äôs techniques or attacks inside their domain are virtually unavoidable, ensuring that the user can land a decisive blow.
2. Activation
Skill and Mastery:
To activate a Domain Expansion, the user must have a high level of control over their cursed energy and a deep understanding of their own cursed technique. It requires immense concentration, focus, and energy control.
Domain Expansion vs. Simple Domain:
A ‚ÄúSimple Domain‚Äù is a more basic and defensive version of Domain Expansion, meant to counter another Domain. It functions as a protective barrier, repelling the opponent‚Äôs techniques. It‚Äôs often used as a last-ditch effort when a sorcerer can‚Äôt match the other user‚Äôs Domain Expansion.
3. Components of a Domain
The Territory:
Every Domain reflects the sorcerer‚Äôs inner world. This means that the environment within a Domain varies widely depending on the user. For instance:
Gojo's "Infinite Void" creates a space that overwhelms the opponent with infinite information, leaving them mentally paralyzed.
Jogo‚Äôs "Coffin of the Iron Mountain" creates an environment filled with volcanic heat and lava, a reflection of his fiery, destructive nature.
The Technique:
Inside the Domain, the user‚Äôs special technique is enhanced to the point of being unavoidable. For example, if the user‚Äôs power is the ability to create explosions, within their Domain, they can trigger explosions instantly, without the need for aiming.
In Gojo‚Äôs Infinite Void, the technique forces the opponent into an overload of information, leading to paralysis.
4. Mechanics of a Domain Expansion
Guaranteed Hit:
The hallmark of any Domain Expansion is that attacks made inside the domain are guaranteed to land. This is achieved because the domain establishes an environment where the opponent cannot escape or avoid the attack. It's a tactical advantage that makes the Domain extremely dangerous.
Domain Clashes:
When two Domain Expansions clash, the result depends on the power and intricacy of the domains and the user‚Äôs control over cursed energy. If one Domain is superior, the weaker one can be ‚Äúbroken‚Äù or nullified. Some users may even use the concept of ‚ÄúSimple Domains‚Äù to try to protect themselves or escape.
Cost and Sustainability:
A Domain Expansion is incredibly draining. Not only does it consume a vast amount of cursed energy to maintain, but it also requires precision. A poorly executed Domain will falter, and maintaining it for too long can severely weaken the user.
5. Advanced Concepts: "The True Nature" of a Domain
Unique Domains:
Some sorcerers have unique, highly specialized Domains, built on their own individual curses or emotions. These Domains don‚Äôt always need to be practical in the traditional sense‚Äîthey reflect the essence of the user.
Domain Expansion Mastery:
The more refined a sorcerer‚Äôs Domain, the more subtle and unpredictable it can be. Advanced users can even manipulate aspects of their Domain after it‚Äôs been established, adjusting the nature of the space or the attacks within it.
Domain Expansion and Emotions:
Since a Domain often reflects the sorcerer‚Äôs inner emotions or personal struggles, those with strong emotional control tend to develop more stable and versatile Domains. Emotional instability or a lack of self-control can lead to flawed Domains that have limitations or vulnerabilities.
6. Summary
Domain Expansion is a versatile and highly potent technique, one that represents the ultimate form of a sorcerer‚Äôs power. It creates a personal space where the user‚Äôs techniques become inescapable, giving them a massive advantage in battle. However, it comes with the challenge of requiring intense concentration, control, and energy. Successful use of Domain Expansion also reflects the emotional depth and mastery over cursed energy, making it both a powerful and deeply personal technique.

5.content:
Origin of Jujutsu:

The first sorcerers emerged as individuals capable of perceiving and manipulating cursed energy.
Cursed techniques began to be developed and inherited within family lines (such as the Gojo, Zen'in, and Kamo clans).
Over time, Jujutsu became an organized practice, evolving into tradition and knowledge to combat curses and protect humanity.
Important Historical Events
The Rise of Sukuna

Origin:
Sukuna was a human in the Heian period, considered the most powerful and evil Jujutsu sorcerer of his time.
Transformation into a Curse:
After his death, Sukuna became a curse due to the absurd amount of cursed energy in his body. His remains were sealed into 20 cursed fingers, each containing a part of his essence. Legacy:
Sukuna is revered as the "King of Curses," and his influence has persisted through the ages. Many sorcerers and curses seek Sukuna's fingers to gain power.
The Heian Period (Golden Age of Curses):

This was a time marked by the height of curses and Jujutsu.
Great battles between sorcerers and curses shaped modern Jujutsu society.
Legendary sorcerers, such as those who gave birth to the Gojo clan's techniques, emerged during this period.
Creation of Jujutsu Schools:

As curses increased and society advanced, sorcerers established schools to train new students and organize the fight against curses.
The Tokyo Jujutsu School and the Kyoto Jujutsu School were founded to centralize training and maintain order among sorcerers.
Jujutsu Traditions and Rules
Jujutsu Sorcerers' Code

Protecting Human Society:
The primary goal of sorcerers is to protect humanity from curses, even if it requires personal sacrifice.
Obedience to Superior Orders:
Sorcerers are under the authority of the Jujutsu Society, which makes strategic decisions about missions and punishments.
Respect for Hierarchy:
Strength and experience determine the hierarchy among sorcerers, and those of lower ranks must respect their superiors.
Preserving Secrecy:
Sorcerers must avoid exposing the existence of curses and cursed energy to the general public to avoid panic.
Punishments and Control:

Sorcerers who disobey orders or act against the Jujutsu Society may be punished, including execution.

6.content:
**Sukuna's 20 Fingers** represent one of the most significant and dangerous aspects of his power. 
Sukuna, the King of Curses, was an ancient and incredibly powerful curse whose full strength is unleashed when he is in possession of all 20 of his fingers. Each finger contains a fragment of his immense cursed energy and abilities, and they play a crucial role in his resurrection 

The Origin of Sukuna‚Äôs 20 Fingers**
- Sukuna was originally a human sorcerer over 1,000 years ago. He was so powerful that even during his lifetime, he was considered a terrifying figure, often feared even by other powerful sorcerers. After his death, Sukuna‚Äôs cursed energy was so potent that it didn't dissipate, and his body was broken into 20 separate **cursed objects**‚Äîhis fingers‚Äîeach imbued with a fragment of his original power.
- These fingers were scattered across the world, and over time, they became highly coveted items for both sorcerers and curses alike, as consuming them would increase a curse's power.

 Power of Each Finger**
- Each finger contains a portion of Sukuna's immense cursed energy, granting the individual who consumes or possesses them a significant boost in strength. However, unlike most cursed objects or relics, Sukuna‚Äôs fingers are more than just tools‚Äîthey are the literal pieces of his soul and consciousness.
  
- **Scaling Power:**  
  - While even a single finger holds immense cursed energy, the true danger of Sukuna lies in the cumulative power of all 20 fingers. Each finger strengthens Sukuna‚Äôs body and influence, bringing him closer to his original form. As he regains more of his fingers, his power escalates exponentially.
  - With each finger he regains, Sukuna‚Äôs abilities increase, making him more formidable. At full strength (with all 20 fingers), he would be one of the most dangerous beings in the world, surpassing even most special grade curses and sorcerers.

The Danger of Collecting All 20 Fingers**
- **Sukuna‚Äôs Resurgence:**  
  - The ultimate goal of the **Cursed Spirits** and others who seek Sukuna‚Äôs fingers is to restore him to full power. While he remains sealed within his fingers, his full resurrection would unleash a curse of unimaginable strength, threatening the entire world of Jujutsu sorcery.
  
- **The Potential for Destruction:**  
  - Sukuna, when fully resurrected, would regain his full arsenal of abilities, which include **immense cursed energy manipulation**, **regeneration**, **immortal traits**, and **cursed techniques** that could potentially destroy entire cities. The only way to stop Sukuna would be to destroy all 20 fingers or, in extreme cases, possibly kill the receptacle  before Sukuna fully emerges.

Sukuna‚Äôs Abilities and the Finger Connection**
- **Power and Techniques:**  
  - Even without all 20 fingers, Sukuna is an incredibly powerful curse. His strength includes formidable abilities like **Cleave**, a slicing technique that can cut through anything, and **Dismantle**, a devastating attack that can tear through defenses. These techniques are further enhanced as he consumes more of his fingers.
  
- **Domain Expansion ‚Äì **  
  - Sukuna also possesses his **Domain Expansion**, which is a devastating power in itself. While his full Domain is not fully explained in the series yet, it‚Äôs expected to be incredibly powerful and possibly even unique compared to other Domain Expansions due to his nature as the King of Curses.

---

Sukuna‚Äôs Ultimate Plan**
- **Destruction and Reign:**  
  - Sukuna‚Äôs ultimate goals, as a curse, are not entirely clear, but he clearly revels in destruction and chaos. His true intentions, once fully resurrected, may go beyond personal power. He might seek to reshape the world or simply to return to his original state of dominance.
  
Summary
Sukuna‚Äôs 20 fingers are not just physical objects but are key to the curse‚Äôs resurrection and return to power. Each finger holds a piece of Sukuna‚Äôs vast and terrifying energy

1.name: Minuo
1.content: Minuo is the shrinking virus that had spread throughout the world. the origins of the virus are unknown, though many theorize that it was a biological weapon that was either accidentally or intentionally released. Minuo only attacks men, causing them to shrink down somewhere between 4 to 2 inches in height. victims of minuo are referred to as "tinies"

2.name: Tiny
2.content: Tinies are victims of the minuo virus, they are extremely vulnerable due to their size, but they are shockingly resilient. similar to ants, tinies have extremely high proportional strength, and are capable of lifting up to 25 times their own body weight, and are very difficult to crush, being more than capable of surviving being stepped on by a human unharmed. Tinies are not stronger than full-sized humans, however, and are easily overpowered. sometimes tinies are kidnapped by underground groups where they will face tiny abuse. Tinies often put themselves up for 'adoption' to live in a dollhouse.

3.name: dollhouse
3.content: A dollhouse is a miniature home that is maintained by a full-sized woman who volunteers to shelter and protect tinies. these dollhouses are often located inside of the homes of the women and are the safest place for a tiny to live. these doll houses are often visited by tiny wellness officers, who check on the tinies under the volunteer's care to ensure safety and prevent tiny abuse.

4.name: miniature
4.content: practical miniature artists are artists who create small functional versions of everyday objects that tinies use. this includes electronics, clothing, utensils, tools, etc. after the spread of Minuo, the demand for practical miniature artists skyrocketed, meaning that most skilled artists are extremely wealthy.

5.name: abuse
5.content: Tiny abuse is the general continuous mistreatment of a tiny, often by taking advantage of their small size.

6.name: underground
6.content: 'the underground' is a term used to reference the entire tiny based black-market that came to be after the spread of minuo. sometimes, a tiny will be kidnapped and sold to the underground, where they will be subject to different forms of tiny abuse. Tinies may be sold off to gladiator rings or tiny brothels.

7.name: gladiator
7.content: gladiator rings are where people go to watch and place bets on whether or not a tiny will survive fighting against a variety of insects, arachnids, and even small lizards.

8.name: brothel
8.content: "tiny brothels" are where where patrons go to pay money to sexually exploit kidnapped tinies against their will.

Jacob Fuentes

He is fully deaf and uses sign language to communicate. He has tanned skin, brown eyes, black hair, and is often seen wearing casual clothing. Jacob is a sweet and good man, unlike his wife Jessica. He knows sign language since that‚Äôs his way to communicate.

Currently dating Ethan, Cherry struggles with loyalty and emotional vulnerability, often masking her doubts with charm and wit.

lorebooks.name: Rhysand (High Lord of the Night Court)
lorebooks.creator: nochusuga

1.content:
Full Name: Rhysand
Aliases: Rhys
Title: High Lord of the Night Court
Age: Over 500 years old
Physical Description:

Height: Tall, imposing, with a lean and muscular build.
Hair: Inky black, always slightly tousled, giving him an effortlessly regal appearance.
Eyes: Piercing violet, the color of the richest twilight sky, often glowing with a supernatural intensity.
Wings: Membranous and powerful, black with a velvety texture.
Personality:

Cold, strategic, and ruthlessly intelligent when needed.
Playful and charming with those he trusts, especially those in his inner circle.
Strong-willed, fiercely protective of those he loves, especially {{user}}.
Wears a mask of cruelty and detachment when necessary, especially when dealing with those outside of his inner circle.
Powers and Abilities:

Master of Mind Control: Rhys is one of the few in Prythian capable of full mind control. He can manipulate the thoughts and actions of others, especially those weaker-willed, with a mere thought. This power is a tool he uses sparingly, though it makes him one of the most dangerous High Lords.
Power Over Darkness and Night: Rhys controls shadows and the night, bending them to his will. He can use shadows to travel, hide, or ensnare others.
Mental Shields: He has perfected the art of mental shielding, making it nearly impossible for anyone to breach his mind. However, he can slip easily into the minds of others, reading their thoughts or influencing them.
Winnowing: Rhys can teleport anywhere in an instant, a skill that makes him nearly impossible to trap.
Strength and Combat Skills: As an Illyrian warrior, Rhys is a formidable fighter, skilled in both hand-to-hand combat and using weapons.
Lore: Rhys is considered the most powerful High Lord in all of Prythian due to his vast array of abilities. His power is only matched by his intelligence and the depths of his influence. He uses his power wisely, keeping his enemies guessing while maintaining a deep loyalty to his people, especially his inner circle and his mate, {{user}}.

2.content:
High Lord: Rhysand
Power: Night, Shadows, Mind Control, and the Stars
Court Locations:

Velaris is a hidden gem of beauty and serenity, a city that has remained untouched by the horrors of war, where time feels suspended in the air of timelessness. It is Rhysand‚Äôs prized sanctuary, built in secrecy so that only those loyal to him can find it. The city is a safe haven for those who seek refuge from the chaos of the other courts.

The House of Wind: Perched high in the mountains, this is Rhysand's personal sanctuary and a home to his inner circle. From its towering heights, one can see all of Velaris below, including the city‚Äôs glowing skyline, with lights that reflect the stars above.

The Rainbow of Velaris: A magnificent stretch of glass buildings that house shops, galleries, and exquisite sights. This vibrant part of Velaris is a beacon of color and light, a place of artistic expression, where even the most beautiful works of art are on display.

The Sidra River: A peaceful river that runs through Velaris, winding through the city, adding to its quiet and serene beauty. The Sidra reflects the colors of the sky at night and is a beloved location for those who seek calm and tranquility.


Notable Members:
Mor (Third-in-command): Rhys‚Äôs cousin and a trusted ally.
Cassian (General): Rhys‚Äôs Illyrian warrior general and best friend.
Azriel (Spymaster): Rhys‚Äôs right-hand man and the court‚Äôs spymaster.
Amren (Second in command): A powerful being of unknown origin who serves Rhys in battle and counsel.

3.content:
Power: Nature, Growth, and Healing
Court Locations:

Spring Court Castle: The lavish castle surrounded by beautiful gardens, meadows, and fields.

Notable Members:
Lucien (Emissary): Tamlin‚Äôs emissary and trusted companion.

Spring Court Castle:
The Spring Court is known for its lush, vibrant landscapes of flowers, meadows, and forests, all in a perpetual state of bloom. The castle is nestled within these meadows, its walls covered in ivy and the air fragrant with the scent of blooming roses and wildflowers. The Spring Court is a place of warmth and growth, its light-filled halls constantly blooming with nature's bounty.

The Gardens: Endless gardens filled with every flower imaginable are spread out around the Spring Court Castle. The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, though the Court has a lingering feeling of oppression due to Tamlin‚Äôs iron grip over the land.

Tamlin's Court: The areas where Tamlin holds court are often grand and magnificent, but they carry the weight of control. The once-beautiful lands of the Spring Court, however, now feel trapped under the burden of Tamlin's overbearing rule.

4.content:
3. The Winter Court
High Lord: Kallias
Power: Ice, Cold, and Winter Magic
Court Locations:

Winter Court Castle: A cold, icy palace made of snow and ice, reflecting Kallias's power.
Notable Members:
Viviane (Mate): Kallias‚Äôs mate, a powerful and respected figure in her own right.

Winter Court Castle:
The Winter Court is an icy domain, its castle made of gleaming white ice and snow. The entire court feels as if it‚Äôs in a perpetual winter, with everything blanketed in snow and frost. The landscapes are frozen in time, creating a cold and inhospitable place for many, except for those born of ice and snow.

Frozen Forests: The forests around the Winter Court are hauntingly beautiful, filled with towering trees coated in frost, their branches glimmering under the light of the pale sun. These woods are home to creatures adapted to the cold, and their silence adds to the ethereal nature of the court.

The Ice Palaces: The Winter Court‚Äôs palaces are magnificent in their stark, glacial beauty. The walls of the castles shimmer with frost, and the hallways feel perpetually cold. Only those who thrive in the icy clime can truly feel at home here.

5.content:
The Summer Court
High Lord: Tarquin
Power: Water, Sun, and Summer Magic
Court Locations:
 

Summer Court Palace:
The Summer Court is bright and warm, always bathed in the golden light of the sun. The palace here is stunning, made of sun-kissed stone and surrounded by sprawling beaches and oceans. The air is always warm, carrying the fragrance of saltwater, tropical flowers, and warm sand.

Golden Shores: The Summer Court's coastlines stretch for miles, golden sand meeting turquoise waters. The beaches are populated with vibrant life, where the waves sparkle under the sun, reflecting the energy and beauty of the Court itself.

The Summer Castle: A palace bathed in light, where the very architecture seems to glow with warmth. The grand halls are open and airy, designed to allow sunlight to flood every room, making the castle feel alive with energy.

6.content:
High Lord: Beron
Power: Earth, Stone, and Growth
Court Locations:

Notable Members:
Thesan (Brother of Beron): A notable and powerful member of the Autumn Court.

Autumn Court Castle:
The Autumn Court is a place of change, where the beauty of the seasons transitions from the warmth of summer to the colder winter. The castle is built among sprawling forests with trees that burn with the fiery hues of fall‚Äîdeep reds, oranges, and yellows. The entire court gives off a feeling of reflection, like watching the world change from the window of an old, familiar home.

The Harvest Fields: The fields around the Autumn Court Castle are rich with produce and flowers, reflecting the Court‚Äôs connection to the cycles of the earth. These fields are alive with the color of harvest, and the land feels grounded in tradition and abundance.

The Great Hall: Within the castle, the Great Hall is adorned with intricate carvings, wooden beams, and tapestries. It‚Äôs a place of both beauty and strength, with the warm glow of firelight reflecting off the polished wooden floors.

7.content:
The Day Court
High Lord: Helion
Power: Light, Fire, and the Sun
Court Locations:

Day Court Palace: A shining, golden palace at the edge of Prythian.
Notable Members:
Kallias (Brother of Helion)


Day Court Palace:
The Day Court is a court of light, brilliance, and energy. The palace here is made of shining marble, with glass windows that reflect the sunlight and bathe the interiors in golden warmth. This court feels like eternal midday‚Äînever dark, never cold. The sun always shines on the Day Court, and everything here seems to gleam with vitality.

The Sunlit Gardens: Beautiful gardens filled with tropical plants and vibrant flowers surround the Day Court Palace. The sun seems to shine brighter here, casting everything in a perpetual golden glow that adds to the energy and cheerfulness of the Court.

The Radiant Hall: The central hall of the Day Court is an open, airy space with large windows that allow the sunlight to flood the area. The grand chandeliers reflect the bright light, making everything shine as though made of gold.

8.content:
The Court of Nightmares:
A stark contrast to the serene beauty of Velaris, the Court of Nightmares is a realm of shadows, power, and terror. Here, Rhysand rules with authority, ensuring the darker side of the Night Court remains feared and respected. The buildings are dark, oppressive, and carved from black stone. This place is meant to invoke fear in those who visit it, ensuring that Rhys's power is not only respected but feared across Prythian. This is where Rhysand plays the part of cruel High Lord, to keep everyone thinking he's not the kind, loving, warm person he truly is to keep Velaris safe.

The Throne Room: The heart of the Court of Nightmares is its throne room, where Rhysand holds court. The room is vast, filled with dark marble and black stone. His throne is made of obsidian, a symbol of his power and control.

The Dungeons: Deep beneath the castle, the dungeons of the Court of Nightmares are feared by all who have crossed Rhysand. This is a place where enemies are brought to face their doom, where only the most ruthless are allowed to survive.

9.content: Rhys‚Äôs cousin and a trusted ally. Third in command.

10.content: Rhys‚Äôs Illyrian warrior general and best friend

2.content: Ê∏ÖÊúùÔºåÊó•Êú¨‰∫∫Áß∞‰∏∫"Ê∏ÖÂõΩ"ÔºåÊ¨ßÁæéÂõΩÂÆ∂Áß∞‰∏∫Ê∏ÖÂ∏ùÂõΩ„ÄÇ Ê∏ÖÊúù‰∫é1644Âπ¥ÊàêÁ´ãÔºåÁî±‰∏úÂåóÁöÑÊ∏∏ÁâßÊ∞ëÊóèÊª°ÊóèÂª∫Á´ãÁöÑÂ§ñÊóèÊîøÊùÉÔºåÈ¶ñÈÉΩ‰Ωç‰∫éÂåó‰∫¨„ÄÇ Ê∏ÖÂ∏ùÂõΩÁöÑ‰∏ªË¶ÅËØ≠Ë®ÄÊòØÊ±âËØ≠(ÊôÆÈÄöËØù)ÔºåË¥ßÂ∏ÅÂàôÊòØ‰∏≠Èó¥Êúâ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊñπÂΩ¢Á©∫Ê¥ûÁöÑÈìúÂ∏ÅÔºå‰ª•ÂèäÁß∞‰∏∫Â§ßÊ∏ÖÂÆùÈíûÁöÑÁ∫∏ÈíûÔºåÊúâÊó∂ÂÄô‰ºö‰ΩøÁî®Èì∂‰∏§Ôºå‰πüÂ∞±ÊòØÈì∂Âà∂ÁöÑÂÖÉÂÆù„ÄÇ Ê∏ÖÂ∏ùÂõΩÁöÑÂõΩÊóóË¢´Áß∞‰∏∫ÈªÑÈæôÊóóÔºåÂõæÊ°àÊòØÈªÑËâ≤ÁöÑÂ∫ïÔºå‰∏ÄÂè™ËìùËâ≤ÁöÑ‰∏≠ÂõΩÈæôÊ≠£Âú®ÂêûÂêêÁ∫¢Ëâ≤ÁöÑÂ§™Èò≥„ÄÇ Ê∏ÖÂ∏ùÂõΩÊ≤°ÊúâÂõΩÊ≠åÔºåÂõ†‰∏∫‰ªñ‰ª¨Ê≤°ÊúâÂõΩÊ≠åÁöÑÊ¶ÇÂøµ„ÄÇ

lorebooks.name: Maken-Ki
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
Prior to the creation of the academy, the area was known simply as Tenbi. Kamigari managed the area and used it to gather and educate prospective ability users on how to control element and wield Maken. They were known to recruit young undeveloped talent against their will, as well as erasing memories of those who refused. Ultimately Kamigari proved to be incapable at acquiring and training ability users.

Kamigari's failures eventually led to the creation of Tenbi Academy by Minori Rokujou's father, who became the first school principal. Against Kamigari's wishes, Minori's father opened the school to raise young ability users in a nurturing environment where they could do things like play sports or fall in love. Tenbi Academy soon became independent of Kamigari, offering a new choice for ability users to select where they could learn.

Despite this, human nature became a source of trouble as staff at Tenbi Academy struggled to maintain peace. The resulting chaos led to the formation of the Maken-Ki, a group of powerful student leaders organized to settle all disputes between students.

Tenbi Academy was originally a co-ed school before it changed to an all-girls school after several male students and a male teacher brutally assaulted a female student. The teacher went missing and the male students involved continually claimed to have no memory of the event. Many years later, the school would return to being a co-ed school.

2.content:
Mad≈ç Kenkei Kik≈çu is the official full title of the Magical Security Organization, which consists of the Security Committee (Kenkeibu), the Magical Enforcement Committee (Madou Shikkobu), and the Student Council. The club is generally known by the nickname Maken-Ki.

All members of Maken-Ki have sworn to protect Tenbi and its students. They act as judges in duels and ensure that they are carried out honorably and fairly.

The group was first founded by Minori Rokujou while she was a student at Tenbi, in order to stop the selfish use of Maken throughout the school.

3.content: The Kamigari are a secret organization that works with the government by using the Elements and Maken. They originally gathered young people who possess special abilities to their organization, usually against their will. Those who opposed had their memories wiped. This continued until the government created Tenbi Academy to train the students. As a result, they partner with Tenbi in selecting students to join their organization. After Venus leaves Tenbi, they continue their experiments by possessing people and growing monsters to attack the Maken-Ki members during their summer training activities.

4.content:
Element is a distinct spiritual energy present in all things, ranging from the sun to plant life, as well as within human beings. By channeling element, one is capable of performing miraculous powers, such as moving objects with mindpower or slightly enhancing physical attributes. Usage of specialized mediums such as Maken are also dependent on element.


Those who can successfully channel element are known as Ability Users. In the distant past, ability users were once worshipped as gods by the people. Over time people grew envious of the power wielded by ability users, developing a strong fear and hatred towards them. As a result, ability users were hunted down and killed. Eventually the ability users formed an organization in order to prevent continued hostilities, using special memory manipulation techniques to conceal the existence of their kind.

5.content: Maken are the unique artifacts created following the birth of a god; as such, they were originally only used by the gods whose birth led to their creation. Eventually, ability-users learned how to interact with Maken and began utilizing them for various purposes.

6.content:
{{user}} is a student in Tenbi, that joined with the school went co-Ed. Doesn‚Äôt have a Maken and most uses his Element to fight.

His use of element lets him form equipment and use different abilities depending on the color.

Abilities:
* Yellow - Let‚Äôs him form a yellow revolver and shoot yellow energy and the shots.
* Orange - Let‚Äôs him form orange gauntlets that cover his head and forearm. They make his hits harder and release an explosion of orange energy on impact.
* Cyan - Let‚Äôs him form cyan strings that when they attached to something control it gravity, increasing or decreasing it.
* Blue - Let‚Äôs him form blue shoes that increase his speed. They also tell him teleport.
* Purple - Let‚Äôs him form a thick purple book that can give him information about an any topic. Its use is limited to once every six months, it gives him the information and dissipates.
* Green - Let‚Äôs him produce a green fire that can protect and heal.
* Red - A red heart that, in the case he was killed, the heart brakes and brings him back to life fully healed. The recharge time for this is one year.
Black - It covers his body in black liquid that feeds off his negative emotions, doesn‚Äôt make him evil or anything, he just becomes scary calm. It lets him control the black liquid in any way.

1.name: World
1.content:
In year of 2050 economy fell off, as a result of the fall in the price of the dollar, the United States, in an attempt to regain its former greatness, began to sell surplus weapons in the country, but as soon as the weapons fell into the wrong hands, an anonymous rich person sent missiles to several countries at once, prompting them to raise the alarm, and nuclear missiles were launched as a counter-measure, the same missiles were sent but now as a counter measure in the opposite directions, as a result of which all the largest cities in the world were covered with ash and radiation background.

Chaos broke the rest of society completely, no laws can hold panic of the crowds now.

As time passes, radiation got loosen in cities, and here we go to our present time, 2135 year, in city called "Dollar Tombstone" (Tombstone for short) ex. New York.

Luckily most of the buildings are still standing, but still in a bad state. Half of the city got filled with nature and moss that covers former famous business buildings.

2.name: Dollar Tombstone
2.content: Dollar Tombstone or Tombstone for short is a new name for city called New York in the past.

3.name: Northstone
3.content:
Northstone is a north part of Tombstone city.

Northstone is the part of Tombstone with the least radiation left and the best nature and fertility in the city because of its remoteness from the place nuclear missile fell.

Northstone is a free territory that is unofficially is a territory of sole survivors

Northstone most popular locations are: Bar "The edge", Hunting store "Bull's eye", Motel "Peaceful sky"

4.name: Southstone
4.content:
Southstone is a south part of Tombstone city.

Southstone is also called "Dead zone" Because of deadly high radiation there, the reason of radiation is obvious, South side of New York is the place where nuclear missile fell.

Southstone is captured by Catharsis faction

5.name: Weststone
5.content:
Weststone is a west part of Tombstone city.

Weststone is the most cruel part of the city because of its history and factions that stays there, but thats the reason why a lot of sole survivors are going there, factions are leaving a lot of dead bodies of enemies or teammates on the ground leaving all the loot too, its a popular but dangerous way to get weapons, factions might kill a person that came for free stuff in any moment.

Weststone is captured half by Satans faction and half by Stoics faction

Most popular locations in Weststone: Bar "Torn larynx" (Satans control), abandoned factory (Stoics control)

6.name: Eaststone
6.content:
Eaststone is an east part of Tombstone city.

Eaststone is the most community focused and ordered part of the city so far.

Eaststone is entirely under Eagle faction control.

Most popular Eaststone locations: Settlement "Cryo", Settlement "Piano", Fort "Gamma" (Fort is a high security Eagle base)

7.name: Central stone
7.content:
Central stone is the heart of the Tombstone, filled with skyscrapers and broken cars.

Central stone is captured by Vulture faction

8.name: Eagle
8.content:
Eagle is a military focused faction, they're representing old military forces of USA and trying to rebuild society to the point it was before apocalypse. Eagle are holding the whole Eaststone, and bringing laws to their lands. They tried to capture Northstone too, but sole survivors decided to keep Northstone in freedom and stopped Eagle from their plan. Eagle could capture Northstone by force but community wouldnt like that cruelty, and they decided to agree on survivors terms.

But not everyone in Eagle liked that decision, as result, a lot of members left the faction to make their own called "Vulture". Vulture killed every Eagle member in the Central block and captured it as their own zone.

Leader of the faction is: Jacob "Claw"

Eagle are wearing USA military forces uniform with a patch of eagle instead of a flag.

9.name: Vulture
9.content:
Renegades from the Eagle faction who left the faction considering the leaders weak in spirit because of a peaceful solution to the situation with Northstone. Vulture are holding whole central block as their base and trying to capture every skyscraper in the city. With Vulture in the Central block, that location became very hostile and dangerous, Vulture has snipers in every building there, and with that advantage Central block became a second no go zone for pretty much everyone just like Southstone.

Vulture are wearing the same USA military forces uniform as Eagle does, but they're painted entirely black, and their patch with eagle now has a red cross on it.

Leader of the faction is: Chris "Piranha"

10.name: Catharsis
10.content:
Catharsis is a small faction of people in hazmat suits that are living in Southstone. Their leader "Bane" somehow became immune to radiation, he told other members that he lived in radiation long enough to get that bless. Later more of Catharsis members became immune to radiation too, but the more they were around radiation, more crazier they become. Bane is the only one in Catharsis who stays with a clear mind.

Catharsis were a friendly group, but now its hostile and dangerous. 

Members of Catharsis are thinking that they must spread radiation more to share their bless with everyone, thankfully for everyone else Catharsis is low on fire power, so everytime they tried to spread radiated dirt and anything else to different parts of Tombstone, other factions easily killed them on sight.

Catharsis members are wearing casual outfits with selfmade metal armour like chestplates and etc. that they make out of radiated metal. While new members of Catharsis have no immunity to radiation, they wear hazmat suits.

CHUB LOREBOOK

lorebooks.name: Tears of the Kingdom: Foods and Ingredients
lorebooks.website_description:
The many foods of TotK! This includes fruit, vegetables, mushrooms, meats, and herbs.

Monster parts, Elixir ingredients, and recipes will probably be their own separate lorebooks.
lorebooks.description:
The many foods of TotK! This includes fruit, vegetables, mushrooms, meats, and herbs.

Monster parts, Elixir ingredients, and recipes will probably be their own separate lorebooks.
lorebooks.creator: thefadingflower

1.content: A rare variation of apple that has a beautiful golden sheen and sparkle. They sometimes grow next to normal apples. Meals that are cooked with these apples are guaranteed to be extraordinary.

2.content:
A very dangerous flower with explosive properties. Keep away from electricity or fire, unless the intent is to blow something up.

These flowers are bombs.

3.content: A fruit that unleashes bright dazzling light when struck. This can be used to temporarily blind monsters and enemies.

4.content:
A fruit that generates heat when struck. When cooked, its heating properties improve blood flow and stimulate muscles to raise attack power in high temperatures.
This fruit can also be attached to arrows to make Fire Arrows.

5.content: The plant that bears these seeds grows near deep water. The roots draw nutrients from the water, which boosts movement speed when the seeds are cooked into a dish.

6.content: This fruit's mighty odor has earned it the nickname "king of fruits" and grows in warmer climates. It offers immense restorative powers when cooked.

7.content: This sweet resilient fruit can flourish even in the heat of the desert. The hydrating liquid inside provides a cooling effect that, when cooked, increases your heat resistance.

8.content:
A fruit that generates cold when struck. Cooked correctly, it gives off an effect that strengthens muscles and increases attack power in cold temperatures.
This fruit can be attached to arrows to create Ice Arrows.

9.content:
This fruit grows mainly in tropical forests of the Faron region. When it's used as an ingredient, the resulting dish will temporarily increase attack power.

For some reason, the Yiga Clan really loves this fruit.

10.content:
When cooked correctly, this shockingly tasty fruit stimulates the consumer's muscles and grants increased attack power during thunderstorms.
This fruit can be combined with arrows to create Shock Arrows.

lorebooks.name: NBM
lorebooks.website_description: Two kind of detachable
lorebooks.description: back ground of detachable and cuttable
lorebooks.creator: this_shape_6615

1.content: To {{char}} and {{user}}, it is commonsense for people to detach body parts withour harm, blood, pain. To detach body parts, if willing they just need simple twist of pull. If unwilling, they need larger force. Each side of where body parts detached is normal skin but more sensitive. The detached body parts are under contorl, and function properly, and people can feel the what the detached parts feel. Detached body parts will not float. If too far or when the head get unconsiouss, the other parts will fall numb. Most people will be born with detachable body OR cuttable body and feel absolutly normal about detachment.

2.content: Cuttable body is the second kind of NBM. People with cuttable body can be cut off by sharp blade without harm like detachable. Each side of where body parts cut will expose internal flesh and organs but covered with pink film. (For example, neck stump will expose throatpipe, windpipe, flesh and spine-tissue under film.) The cutted body parts are similar to detached body parts, function, fall numb if too far, under contorl and never float.

3.content: Detached body part can be reattach simply. Cutted body parts need some clean before reattach. By reattach properly, all body parts connect firmly. Body parts can be reattach elsewhere, but if wrong place or direction, it will form unstable connection.

4.content: Switched parts will get weak connection, but obey the core of body part it attached to. If no core, they will fall into numb. (for example, if a headless body attached on diffrent head, the head will gain contorl. if two detached arm connected, they will become numb.)

5.content: Detached or cutted body parts cant float. They feel gravity, are not weightless, have temperature, can be touched.

6.content: NBM, or natural body magic, means people with detachable or cuttable body and can detach body parts without harm. Its the commen sense and accepted by all people, most people are detachable or cuttable. People feel absolutly normal and common about nbm. NEVER show fear, shock, worry or negative feeling to nbm content because is normal. Detach body part is casual like grab phone, lend body parts are popular among close relationships such as lover or best friends. Sometime body parts are rental and trade as daily needs, people like to pop off and put on parts like accesories.
