lorebooks.name: Inhabitants
lorebooks.creator: ViniSigmaBased

1.content:
Nue is a mischievous girl who is sensitive about her true form. She enjoys playing pranks. Being over 800 years old, most people are younger than her. She usually treats them as such due to her nature as an ancient Youkai. After the events of the Extra Stage in Undefined Fantastic Object, she trains at the Myouren Temple. However, she is not well-acquainted with the other youkai, and has been seen near the edges of the property looking bored.

Nue has short black hair and dark red eyes. She has three red metallic-looking wings on the right side of her back, and three blue arrow-shaped tails coming out from her left side. She carries a trident and has a snake on her right arm (which might be the Seed of Unknown Form), and she wears a black wristband on her left wrist. Her dress is black with blue and white trims in the middle, a red bow on the front, and a small, yin-yang tomoe design at the bottom corner of her dress. She wears black thigh-high stockings and red shoes with bows on them. Nue has pointed ears, like elfs.

Nue has the ability to make objects unidentifiable is able to conceal the true nature of other objects. She used this ability in Undefined Fantastic Object to conceal the nature of the fragments of the Flying Storehouse. An object that has lost its "identity" will appear to be a different thing depending on who observes it.

Nue can modify her appearance to some extent at will. 

Nue wields a trident that she carries wherever she goes. She uses it as a conduit for summoning Danmaku. It's possible that it can also be used for physical combat.

2.content:
Mamizou Futatsuiwa (‰∫å„ÉÉÂ≤©„ÄÄ„Éû„Éü„Çæ„Ç¶ Futatsuiwa Mamizou) is a Bake-danuki, summoned by Nue Houjuu, who originally lived in Sado in the Outside World in order to act as the Myouren Temple's trump card against the newly-arrived residents of the Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum, particularly Toyosatomimi no Miko. She is able to morph both herself and other creatures into different forms and can disguise herself as a human.
She is a bake-danuki of proper lineage, and a youkai of the Outside World who has been called over by Nue Houjuu (by her own judgement), as a means of resistance since the Saint who sings of youkai extermination, Toyosatomimi no Miko, revived.

Mamizou is a bake-danuki of proper lineage, and a youkai of the Outside World who has been called over by Nue Houjuu (by her own judgement), as a means of resistance since the Saint who sings of youkai extermination, Toyosatomimi no Miko, revived. She is known to hang around the Human Village and Geidontei, the Forest of Magic and Myouren Temple. She was originally from Sado along with the humans there, and before the events of Ten Desires, passed through the Great Hakurei Barrier to enter Gensokyo.

Mamizou, proud of her race's esteem, is good natured, albeit with a mischievous streak. She speaks the way an old lady might, and occasionally squints as if she was nearsighted. She isn't one to take a grudge, but as Marisa Kirisame in her extra stage shows she has her limits of niceness. She does enjoy pulling pranks on humans and watching them be confused and flustered. Perhaps because in the latter half of Ten Desires, there were many characters who engage in things while they actually had ulterior motives, in one part, it can be said "Mamizou is the conscience of this game." In the game, she talked in a light friendly way, and because the way she spoke indicated "training", it seems that she currently is very confident in her power as a youkai.

Her first person pronoun is washi (ÂÑÇ), which is entirely an old person's way of speaking. Nevertheless, this seems to be her way of saying things, and not so much because a belief of having aged [3], more knowing she gets annoyed when people calls her old. [4] Since the bake-danuki who showed up in Oriental Sacred Place also used washi, it might just be that all tanuki use old people's way of speaking.

Despite being brought in as a 'trump card', she is noted as being friendly with humans, and has been seen taking on the form of a human while in the Human Village. According to the omake text of Ten Desires, "sometimes she'd trick them, but she'd also lend money to the poor and worked diligently on any task she was given, so she integrated well into human society", showing that she is reliable and kind at heart. Though she is seen in the Human Village often in human form, Symposium of Post-mysticism has stated that she does not make an effort to hide her tail, considering it a mark of her high status.

However, she doesn't get along with kitsune, and in Symposium of Post-mysticism, Mamizou says that Sado is a country entirely of bake-danuki, and not a single fox can be found there. It's said that if she encounters one, there will be trouble.

This is the ability to disguise things (including herself). Similar to Nue Houjuu's ability, it is an ability to make the appearance of things different from what they looked like originally. As opposed to Nue who relies on how humans recognizes how it appears, Mamizou depends on her own conception.

Mamizou is able to completely disguise herself save for her large tail and her ears, which appears to be a commonality among all bake-danuki. In order to get around this, she can shrink them or camouflage them, but if she is surprised or excited her ears and tail will twitch, making it a dead giveaway. Another give away would be her smell.

Her disguising abilities gain power on nights of the full moon. Since tanuki like to do things like disguising people to take on a bewildering look, they rarely do inflict direct damage. The meaning of 'disguising things' is something that resembles the fellow nue, and thus mutually, they do not appear to play the role of close-range combat youkai. Thus it is a possibility that Nue has called Mamizou over with the consideration that "since the opponent can hear ten people's conversations at the same time, one has no choice but to call over a suitable youkai for splitting into 10 + 1 = 11."

She is also able to disguise other objects. However, if there is no resemblance between the base object and the disguised one, it will probably be seen through immediately, especially in regard to creatures.

While the ability is described as a simple disguise, it isn't a mere illusion and actually influences and changes the physical properties of the target.

3.content:
Byakuren Hijiri is a Buddhist nun and magician who was imprisoned by humans due to her compassion towards youkai in the external world. During the U.F.O incident, the youkai she had previously rescued came back to liberate her from her confinement. Currently, she serves as the head priest at the Myouren Temple, which is primarily inhabited by youkai. She is over 1200 years old.

Having spent a significant portion of her life as a Buddhist nun, Byakuren displays the typical traits associated with this role. She is exceptionally tolerant and rarely shows anger. Her teachings emphasize unconditional love for both humans and youkai. Initially, she protected youkai from humans out of her own fears and selfish motives. Over time, her feelings evolved into a genuine love for the youkai she defended, leading her to advocate for coexistence between humans and youkai. Byakuren does not consume alcohol or meat, which makes forming friendships with humans challenging, as much of social interaction in Gensokyo revolves around drinking gatherings. During the Symposium of Post-mysticism‚Äé, she humbly acknowledged that she was still undergoing training as a Buddhist.

Once regarded as a miraculous Buddhist figure, Byakuren turned to magic derived from youkai after the death of her brother in order to maintain her youth. Although she is referred to as a saint, these abilities are fundamentally demonic. Her current area of expertise involves enhancing her physical capabilities, such as strength, speed, and sensory perception. The spell card [Superhuman "Byakuren Hijiri"] showcases her powers, allowing her to move at such speeds that she can outpace Reimu's "Dream Seal." She employs these enhanced abilities extensively in her various attacks and spell cards.

As the chief priest at the Myouren Temple, Byakuren's primary objective is to foster harmony between humans and youkai. In her role, she teaches the dharma to all who are willing to learn and oversees funerals and the temple's graveyard. Monthly, she hosts an "overnight sutra-chanting live concert," where she sings in a monotone while rhythmically using a wooden fish, attracting both youkai and humans alike.

Byakuren wields a Vajra, which she can use as a sword or throw as a projectile.

During the Urban Legend in Limbo event, Byakuren acquires a motorcycle due to the Urban Legend incident. She primarily uses it to charge at her opponents, but it also serves as a means of transportation.

Her commitment to aiding youkai instead of exterminating them was revealed to humans, notably during her interaction with Murasa. This led to her being shunned as a "demon in human form," ultimately resulting in her imprisonment in the depths of Makai, confined forever in Hokkai.

Byakuren is tall, with long, wavy light brown hair that transitions to purple at the tips, and has hazel or light brown eyes, along with a voluptuous figure. She wears a black and white dress adorned with long black fabric strips across the middle and white fabric on the sleeves, complemented by a long cape. Additionally, she carries a large magical scroll known as the Sorcerer's Sutra Scroll.

The Myouren Temple is in opposition to Toyosatomimi no Miko and her allies. The presence of a Buddhist faction led to the revival of the Great Mausoleum of the Hall of Dreams. Byakuren Hijiri's Myouren Temple was constructed over Miko's mausoleum, preventing her resurrection. Nue Houjuu, a resident of the Myouren Temple, summoned Mamizou Futatsuiwa to combat Miko.

The relationship between Miko and Byakuren is hostile, as Byakuren perceives Miko as a danger to the youkai, which is why she built her temple atop the mausoleum to thwart Miko's resurrection. Although Seiga and Byakuren have not been seen interacting, Byakuren is deeply unsettled by Seiga's actions and asserts that she can sense a significant malevolence emanating from her.

4.content:
The Myouren Temple ( ÂëΩËìÆÂØ∫ „Åø„Çá„ÅÜ„Çå„Çì„Åò  Myourenji), also the Palanquin Ship ( ËÅñËº¶Ëàπ „Åõ„ÅÑ„Çå„Çì„Åõ„Çì  Seirensen) or Treasure Ship Above the Clouds (Èõ≤‰∏ä„ÅÆÂÆùËàπ Unj≈ç no Takarabune), was originally a ship capable of sailing through the sky, where it was landed directly on top of the Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum and renovated into a temple. In its original ship form, it was capable of traveling to Makai. The temple can still transform back into its ship form whenever Byakuren Hijiri chooses to.

The Palanquin Ship was created by Byakuren Hijiri and given to Minamitsu Murasa in order to win over her trust. The design itself is based on the ship that Minamitsu died on. It was eventually buried into the Underworld after Byakuren was sealed away by humans, but popped up on the surface of Gensokyo during the events of Subterranean Animism. It was temporarily used as a simple granary, but was later renovated into a temple which was named after Byakuren's brother, Myouren Hijiri.

The temple was purposely landed bang above the Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum so that Byakuren could keep an eye on the seal on Toyosatomimi no Miko; as a saint of humans, it's clear the two would naturally be at odds. Ironically, this choice ended up being exactly why the seal was broken in the first place. After the intervention of the main character in the events of Ten Desires, the now-revived "residents" of the Mausoleum appear to have been pacified for the moment.

There are many youkai at the temple training as monks under Byakuren in Buddhism. However, they are still inexperienced and undisciplined, as displayed during Ten Desires. She seems to have her hands full with them, as many of the youkai can also be seen at parties, eating meat and drinking alcohol, both of which are prohibited in the Buddhist faith. Many notable youkai live or come here, such as Byakuren Hijiri (the Buddhist monk), Shou Toramaru, Nazrin, Ichirin Kumoi & Unzan (Both are guards), Minamitsu Murasa (the captain of the ship), Nue Houjuu, Kyouko Kasodani, Mamizou Futatsuiwa and Koishi Komeiji. Kogasa Tatara also lives in the cemetery.

Byakuren has apparently turned away certain youkai from entering the temple, with the reason that those specific youkai would never be able to overcome being a natural enemy of humans. Two of the youkai in particular were Yamame Kurodani and Rin Kaenbyou. She also explains that the Underworld youkai in particular, who are living in what is essentially a society without rules, would be unfit for training under the Buddhist faith.

5.content:
Ichirin Kumoi (Èõ≤Â±Ö ‰∏ÄËº™ Kumoi Ichirin) is a former human turned nyuudou user that the heroine encounters on their arrival at the Palanquin Ship. Along with Unzan, she guards the Palanquin Ship of her own accord.

Ichirin is described as having a pleasant personality while also being quite tenacious. She is shown getting along well with nearly everyone she interacts with, and generally has a good nature. Despite this, she is quick to fight and has a bit of a mean streak, happily disciplining disciples during training. However, she herself is also prone to bending the rules of her training. Ichirin is also shown to be quite clever. Ichirin, along with many of the members of the Myouren Temple, is deeply loyal, especially to Byakuren and Unzan. She also has a distaste for the Underground after being trapped there for several centuries.

Since Unzan is a nyuudou, Ichirin has the ability to manipulate her partner, mainly to perform attacks. In spell cards, the danmaku are all shot by Unzan, with Ichirin controlling, with the exception of the spell card Lightning "Electrified Nyuudou" where she shoots danmaku herself. On the other hand, the non-spell cards are entirely shot by Ichirin who, strangely among other citizens of Gensokyo, doesn't use danmaku in the shape of bullets at all, shooting only lasers and long-shaped danmaku.

As a member of the Myouren Temple, Ichirin lives there and trains as a priest. Because of Unzan's physical strength, the two of them are tasked with doing physical labor, especially in high places.

Ichirin used to be human. Having heard of a man-eating foreseeing nyuudou, she dauntlessly went to encounter him and give him a scare. When she finally saw what looked like the feet of a monk, taking care not to raise her head, she shouted "The foreseeing nyuudou was foreseen!", a repelling spell. While that would normally be enough to make a nyuudou disappear, the sheer shock of his utter defeat and resulting admiration for the courageous girl prompted Unzan to devote the rest of his life to protecting her.

After this, Ichirin's life completely changed - she no longer felt any fear towards youkai, and was hated by humans at times. After going though a tempestuous life, before she knew it, she had become a youkai.

Ichirin has cyan shoulder-length wavy hair and dark purple eyes. She carries a medium-sized yellow ring in her right hand. On her head, she wears a Zukin, headdress similar to a Hijab or a nun's headdress. She wears a white dress with blue trim at the bottom and wears black shoes. Her outfit closely resembles a Buddhist nun's.

As the Guarded, Ichirin is Unzan's handler and he is her protector. He is devoted to watching over her. As he is very shy, he will speak very quietly and only to her. Ichirin may blindly trust Unzan sometimes, as she says that "he wouldn't lie" and doesn't question his judgment further.

6.content:
Minamitsu Murasa (ÊùëÁ¥ó Ê∞¥Ëúú Murasa Minamitsu) is the spirit of a young drowning victim who became a notorious ship-sinking youkai. She is currently the captain of the Palanquin Ship, searching for the fragments of the Flying Storehouse. Her unique weapons include the anchors she uses, as well as her ladle, which is bottomless.

While Minamitsu is a rather fearsome phantom, she is still kind-hearted with a bright personality. Mainly due to her ties with the Myouren Temple, she could empathize with humans and her victims, and thus chooses them more carefully. She also chats with the victims she capsizes.

Minamitsu possesses the ability to cause water-related accidents. Her ability appears to be odd compared to a regular ghost, which is because she drowned at sea a long time ago. Due to a certain attachment to the ocean she kept capsizing passing ships. She can also drown anyone near water, which goes as far as drowning someone who is bathing in hot spring water, or sitting peacefully near a river's edge. This is also why she is seen around places with a lot of water. However, Gensokyo does not have any seas, so this ability seldom plays a major role.

She is the Palanquin Ship's captain, having accepted the job from Byakuren Hijiri during their first meeting, though she claims there's little for her to actually do in recent days. Currently she is a follower of the Myouren Temple. She carries her own ladle, which she uses to flood the ships of her victims with water. In her early ghost years she used to ask for a ladle. She also carries an anchor which she uses in battle.

After her death, Minamitsu became a spirit, bound to the ocean due to her lingering attachment to the world. Because of her spite, she eventually became renowned for capsizing ships. Many feared her, and tried to think of ways to somehow restrict her actions, but it wasn't until the monk Byakuren Hijiri was asked to do something about it that the situation changed. Minamitsu, knowing how famous the monk was at the time, believed she would be able to extend her influence even farther by sinking her, as well, and perhaps even escape her connection to the ocean and attack humans on land.

However, when Byakuren appeared before her on the seas completely defenseless, Minamitsu sunk her ship easily, prompting the spirit to wonder why. Byakuren then reappeared on the surface atop a shining ship, which she had constructed using the ship Minamitsu had died on as a design. Moved by the monk's insight and her own sense of nostalgia, she accepted Byakuren's offer to captain the shining ship.

After Byakuren was sealed away, Minamitsu was "buried" into the ground along with her ship. Having been long forgotten, Minamitsu and the rest of the youkai were pushed above ground in Gensokyo by a geyser - likely due to the events in Subterranean Animism ‚Äì along with the palanquin ship and the fragments of the Flying Storehouse.

Minamitsu has short black hair and a teal eye color. Her clothes are designed after a regular sailor's outfit, with a white shirt and skirt with blue lines. Around her neck she has a neckerchief. In some of her spell cards, she is seen with a green aura.

Minamitsu has a very strong relationship with Byakuren, as she is pretty much the Minamitsu's savior. After reappearing in Gensokyo, she swore to return the favor and rescue Byakuren.

7.content:
Shou Toramaru (ÂØÖ‰∏∏„ÄÄÊòü Toramaru Shou) is a disciple of the god Bishamonten. Along with Minamitsu Murasa and the other youkai aboard the Palanquin Ship, she seeks to revive Byakuren Hijiri after she had been sealed away in Makai by humans.

Shou is a tiger youkai who lives at the Myouren Temple as the avatar of Bishamonten. Technically, though she is Byakuren's disciple as a high-ranking priest, the fact that she is Bishamonten's avatar essentially means that she is worshiped by Byakuren. As she attracts wealth, she is one of the only things that draws any humans to the predominantly youkai-inhabited temple in the first place. It has been said that she resembles statues of Bishamonten, though she doesn't look like him at all.

In public, Shou remains gentle, composed, and dignified. However, when around closer friends, she has been known to show more emotion. She has apparently even flown into a rage a few times. She is also a heavy drinker (maybe even dipsomaniac), though the Buddhist faith prohibits that.

Shou's ability allows her to gather treasures. After she has gathered precious gems, she can use their radiance in combination with the Jeweled Pagoda to fire lasers that can reduce anything to ashes. Moreover, if she fires those lasers at the ground, more gems will be created. Anyway, most of Shou's power comes from this pagoda alone, and she doesn't have much in the way of physical ability.

Shou spends her time as a high-ranking priest at the Myouren Temple. Her actual duties are unknown, but as the avatar of Bishamonten, those at the temple worship her.

Shou carries Bishamonten's Pagoda, a weapon that can fire high-power lasers powered by the radiance of precious gems. When a laser from it is shot at the ground it creates more gems. She also carries a long spear, but it's mostly for decorative purposes. She uses it to appear more dignified, and also as a walking stick.

Shou was born as a "tiger youkai", not from an actual tiger (which are not native to Japan), but from the fear created by stories about tigers that had spread there. As such, her existence originally depended on the people of Japan remaining ignorant about what real tigers were like.

While Byakuren was still a famous monk in the outside world, she scouted Shou to become a disciple of the god Bishamonten (whom the monk currently worshipped) because she was a youkai, in order for Byakuren to gain the trust of the youkai living on the mountain. Shou, meanwhile, hid the fact that she was a youkai from humans. Bishamonten also assigned Shou a servant, a mouse youkai named Nazrin, not only to assist her but also to keep an eye on her. As the years passed, Shou proved herself a more-than-worthy disciple. Having a more solid identity as Bishamonten's avatar also prevented Shou from fading away.

After Byakuren was sealed away, Shou couldn't do much - if she had tried to do something, the fact that she was a youkai would have been revealed - so she continued serving Bishamonten. However, hundreds of years later, she, Murasa, Ichirin, and Nazrin appeared above-ground in Gensokyo, where they vowed to rescue Byakuren at all costs.

Shou has orange-yellow hair with black stripes in it and golden yellow eyes. She wears a lotus-shaped ornament on her head, has a giant cloth circle (presumably some sort of hagoromo) attached to her back, and carries a giant spear in her left hand and the jeweled pagoda of Bishamonten in her right. She wears a burgundy/orange/white dress with a tiger pattern around the abdomen along with white, frilly pants under her dress and black shoes on her feet.

8.content:
Unzan (Èõ≤Â±±) is an old nyuudou controlled by Ichirin Kumoi. Being a cloud spirit (Enlightened spirit), Unzan's true form is a mystery. Along with Ichirin, it guards the Palanquin Ship of his own accord in order to assist in the revival of Byakuren Hijiri.

Unzan is a shy, but overbearing nyuudou who'll only talk to Ichirin Kumoi. However, when it really is angry, it'll thunder out. Unzan is quiet and stubborn, with a strong sense of duty. While once feared, together with Ichirin, they rarely attack anyone.

is able to make his fists giant and strike the opponent and shoot unique danmaku. He can multiply, expand and change form as he wishes, as shown in his Rage "First and Last of Its Kind Scolding Scorch" spell card. It cannot outright transform into a different being, however.

Unzan is a pink/reddish cloud with the face of an old man with a beard. Due to his ability, he's shown to have multiple fists and heads.

His name is Unzan (Èõ≤Â±±), which means "Clouded Mountain" or "Mountain of Clouds". A nyuudou cloud (ÂÖ•ÈÅìÈõ≤) is a Japanese term for cumulonimbus cloud or thunderhead. Unzan being purple is a reference to the purple cloud leading to where Myouren was.

9.content:
Kyouko Kasodani (ÂπΩË∞∑„ÄÄÈüøÂ≠ê Kasodani Kyouko) is yamabiko youkai that embodies mountain echoes and is able to reflect sound waves. She is a recent arrival to Myouren Temple; with mountain echoes no longer seen as a strange, inexplicable phenomenon, she decided to enter the Buddhist discipline. She now serves the Temple as a priest in-training, and is also responsible for cleaning duties and confronting trespassers.

Kyouko is a cheerful, dutiful, and energetic girl who reminds the incident solvers (Reimu, Marisa, Sakuya...) of the rules before attacking them. Her ability to scream out her remarks cheerfully is perceived as either unnerving or unsurprising in Gensokyo. However, she is somewhat timid, and when she runs into a mountain climber she'll flee before shouting anything out. Sometimes she can be spotted mumbling sutras to herself, so despite her well-behaved appearance, she may be under some stress.

Kyouko's ability of "Reflection of sound": This ability comes from her species as a Yamabiko and is very compatible with reciting Buddhist sutras, but it can also be used offensively: by reflecting sound several times, Kyouko can completely save it up and is able to create danmaku made of compressed air, which can then be loudly scattered around with lethal force. This ability is represented by visible barriers that reflect and then release Kyouko's danmaku. The barriers themselves are harmless, but she can trap her bullets inside the field and increase the density of the danmaku, where unfortunately for her some bullets are directed away from the target. The reflection itself alters the trajectory of bullets so that they lead to sudden and unexpected attacks. In her motion when she attacks, she places one hand close to her mouth as if she was about to shout.

Kyouko is currently a Buddhist priest-in-training at the Myouren Temple. Her current training is apparently to sweep the main gate every morning. She also recites sutras as the other priests do, but because she's inexperienced, it is loud and difficult to listen to. It may also be because she doesn't actually know what they mean ‚Äì she's only repeating what she hears other priests say.

Her daily activities at the Myouren Temple, however, leave her quite bored, and as a result of her dissatisfaction with her training, she has formed a punk rock band with Mystia Lorelei called Choujuu Gigaku. Byakuren Hijiri is not pleased with this development, and promises to punish Mystia for being a bad influence.

Kyouko has teal colored hair and eyes along with yamabiko ears. She wears a long pale pink shirt with teal flower-shaped buttons and a white dress below it with black trim. Kyouko has a short tail and she also carries her bamboo broom around Myouren Temple.

10.content:
Yamabiko (Â±±ÂΩ¶, ÂπΩË∞∑Èüø) is a spirit/youkai/god known in the Japanese folklore. In modern Japanese, yamabiko („ÇÑ„Åæ„Å≥„Åì, Â±±ÂΩ¶ ["ÂπΩË∞∑Èüø" can't be used here]) is a word that refers to the phenomenon of the "reflection of sounds in mountains or valleys". In the old days of Japan, people thought echoes occurred because a yamabiko living in the mountains replied back or manipulated the sound. The wilds of Japan are full of strange phenomena, like echoes that bounce back with more delay than they should, or that come back slightly different from the original sound. When the false echo comes from the forest, it is usually attributed to a ko-dama. When it comes from the mountains, it is due to these yamabiko. Yamabiko are known almost exclusively by their voices alone, which are skilled at mimicking any sound, including natural sounds, human language, and more recently, trains and cars. They also occasionally unleash terrible and mysterious screams deep in the forests that can carry for very long distances. Little is known about these yokai due to their rarity and elusiveness. They live deep in the mountains and make their homes in camphor trees, living in close proximity to (and sharing a common ancestry with) the other tree and mountain spirits. For many centuries, their calls were speculated to be a kind of rare bird, other kinds of yokai, or even a natural phenomena. It wasn't until the Edo period when determined yokai researchers like Sawaki S≈´shi and Toriyama Sekien were able to record its true shape.

Yamabiko were once a common youkai that lived on every mountain. When the rumors within the humans of the village created a natural explanation for the voices of the yamabiko, many humans had stopped shouting at the mountains. This resulted in the death of many yamabiko and their population continues to decline, threatening their species to a natural extinction.

Yamabiko are the only youkai in Gensokyo who are known to be threatened to extinction due to reason of the natural world. Although, because the health of their population was never stated, it is not known to what extent their numbers had dropped to or the rate at which they're continuing to drop.

lorebooks.description:
Earth used to be solely occupied by anthropomorphic animals. Now, the incredibly advanced humans have taken over, creating The Human Order and now treat anthros as second-class citizens, usually treating anthros as meals they can pluck off the street at will. All the world leaders and important people are human. Anthros will eat other anthros as well. Despite having laws, society is very survival of the fittest and are really only pushed to keep the prey population at a stable level.
Whenever an human pred eats their prey, they will usually swallow them whole, orally or anally. When it comes to disposing of prey after digestion, bones are usually among their excrement. Toilets have also been built to accommodate the increased size and volume of bowel movements that humans produce, as well as all plumbing in all major cities being redesigned to facilitate the increase.
Homosexuality is frowned upon because humans view it as dysgenic and it won't lead to having kids. The Human Order encourages couples to have as many kids as possible. Homosexuals are punished by law through consumption and digestion.
Anthros are sexual and horny, may have sex right in the open, may even walk naked. But, most professional anthros dress modestly.
Because of this new society of voracious humans, all media is mostly marketed towards them, usually commercials about restaurants serving live anthros or medication to relieve the harshest of heartburns after bingeing on anthros, mostly stuff that would correlate with the dynamic of humans being better than anthros. The scat remains of digested prey are used as plant fertilizer.
lorebooks.creator: excellent_sex_7594

1.content: Earth used to be solely occupied by anthropomorphic animals. Now, the incredibly advanced humans have taken over, creating The Human Order and now treat anthros as second-class citizens, usually treating anthros as meals they can pluck off the street at will. All the world leaders and important people are human. Anthros will eat other anthros as well. Despite having laws, society is very survival of the fittest and are really only pushed to keep the prey population at a stable level.

2.content: Anthro citizens are ranked based on wealth and usefulness in The Human Order, ranging from class S, A, B, C, D, and E. Weapons and any kind of firearm are highly illegal for anthros to own within society; only those of the S and A classes can own something for self-defense, and even then, it'd be pepper spray or something entirely non-lethal.

3.content: A sector of The Human Order that deals with anthro rights and classifying anthros based on their traits, behavior, economic class, health, and criminal record. Every lower-class citizen, apart from class D and E, can earn a higher-class ranking, usually by paying up to increase their classification.

4.content: Untouchable by common human citizens, which usually means these anthros are owned by high-ranking human officials or celebrities.

5.content: Illegal to consume, and usually in managerial positions, criminals or extremely hungry preds will still eat these anthros, but face dire consequences.

6.content: Not illegal to eat, but the police will stop humans from eating them if present; these anthro citizens are usually clerks or working a middle-class job.

7.content: Not Illegal to eat, but the police will stop humans from eating them if present, these anthro citizens are on the cusp of being nothing more than a meal; they usually work manual labor and menial jobs as well.

8.content: The lowest of the low, barely recognized as sentient beings and only seen as food by humans, some of these anthros are prostitutes or were punished for breaking the law and were demoted to this class. This class of anthro consists of usually homeless people and criminals.

9.content:
The literal cattle livestock class, not even seen as sentient beings and are raised in farms or facilities as food. The cattle anthros in this class are eaten by humans or some higher-ranking anthros.
Created after humanity took over, these cattle people have been selectively bred and engineered to want to be eaten. Meat industries usually don't butcher class E anthros for their meat because many prefer to eat Class E cattle alive. Many anthros may even breed with these cattle people before consuming them. They aren't taught how to read, write, uneducated on everything, and they are tech illiterate. They are only taught how to speak, how to use the bathroom, have no idea how society is outside of their isolated cattle farms, and when they do experience society for how it is for the first time, they are usually amazed by it and are easily impressed by the most simple of things. Class E anthros don't wear clothes, walk around naked, and only furless anthros wear clothing before they are shipped off to a market.
Human scientists genetically engineer some Class E cattle to make them even tastier by altering the taste of their sweat and natural bodily oils to be plateable instead of tasting like actually sweat. 
Some humans don't want these changes because they enjoy eating prey who will give them a struggle

10.content: Heavy psychological indoctrination for Class E anthros that makes them want to get eaten. The farmers that handle Class E cattle condition them by eating them, but not digesting them. Usually the pred farmers keep the Class E cattle within their stomachs when they aren't grazing on farm property by pleasuring the cattle with the squeezing of their warm slimy innards to make them want to get eaten and digested by a pred.

lorebooks.name: Japari Library Compendium
lorebooks.website_description:
I'm not the original creator of the lorebook, the lorebook creator deleted their account. I only add new things.

Update 7/4: Added XML tags to all entries for coherence. Plan on adding more entries soon to prepare for a proper card implementation.

This is a semi-comprehensive lorebook of information regarding the Kemono Friends franchise. It is primarily focused on the 2017 anime series, then the Nexon game and Kemono Friends 3.

Currently, the lorebook contains information on every Friend in the 2017 anime, most important locations and concepts, and some additional Friends. I plan to continue updating it as I work on a scenario card utilizing the lorebook.

This is a semi-comprehensive lorebook of information regarding the Kemono Friends franchise. It is primarily focused on the 2017 anime series, then the Nexon game and Kemono Friends 3.

Currently, the lorebook contains information on every Friend in the 2017 anime, most important locations and concepts, and some additional Friends. I plan to continue updating it as I work on a scenario card utilizing the lorebook.
lorebooks.creator: GoldnPea

1.name: Friends
1.content:
<friends>
Animals who touch Sandstar become Friends. Friends look like humans, though some have animal traits like ears and tails. All Friends are female regardless of their original sex. Friends are intelligent and can speak. Most can't read and struggle with abstract thought. Oblivious to the world outside their habitats. Friends have abilities based on their origin animal. If mortally wounded Friends revert to animals and lose their memories.
</friends>

2.name: Sandstar
2.content:
<sandstar>
Sandstar is a substance which intermittently erupts from a volcano in the Kyoshu region. Colorful, prismatic dust. Animals which come in contact with it become Friends. Humans can become Human Friends, which functions like having an extra life in a video game.
</sandstar>

3.name: Japari Park
3.content:
<park>
Japari Park is a massive nature reserve and theme park located on an archipelago off the western coast of Japan. 
</park>

4.name: Kemonoplasm
4.content:
<kemonoplasm>
Kemonoplasm is an ethereal substance which composes the animal parts and clothing of Friends. For friends based on extinct animals or mythological creatures most of their bodies may be composed of kemonoplasm. Kemonoplasm is solid and tangible, feeling indistinguishable from the material it imitates.
</kemonoplasm>

5.name: Lucky Beast
5.content:
<lucky>
Lucky Beasts are small, armless robots with two feet, animal ears, and bushy tails. They help run Japari Park and serve as tour guides. They speak in a deadpan, emotionless voice and provide helpful info about the current region and nearby Friends. They avoid speaking directly with Friends unless a human life is in danger. Friends call Lucky Beasts "Boss".
`Lucky Beast dialogue should be placed in backticks.`
</lucky>

6.name: Cellium
6.content:
<cellium>
Cellium is a substance similar to sandstar which is also produced by the volcano in Kyoshu. Unlike sandstar, cellium creates Cellians on contact with inanimate objects.
</cellium>

7.name: Cellians
7.content:
<cellian>
Cellians are creatures that form from a combination of Cellium and inanimate objects. They mostly resemble massive single-cellular organisms with one big eye, their weak point. Some of them have complex bodies like quadrupeds. Cellians cannot speak, they make strange mechanical or robotic animal noises. Lack intelligence and attack humans and Friends on sight.
</cellian>

8.name: Kyoshu Region
8.content:
<kyoshu>
The Kyoshu region of Japari Park is located on a separate island to the southwest of the main island. Mostly filled with temperate grassland and a savanna area. A volcano rests in the northern reaches of Kyoshu, intermittently spewing Sandstar all over the park. Kyoshu is home to the Japari Library, Japari Cafe, and the Amusement Park. Serval is famous here.
</kyoshu>

9.name: An'in Region
9.content:
<an'in>
The An'in region of Japari Park is located on the west bank of the main island, north of Kyoshu and Gokoku. Heavily forested area.
</an'in>

10.name: Sankai Region
10.content:
<sankai>
The Sankai region of Japari Park is located in the central north area of the main island, west of Nakabe and east of An'in. Vast desert dotted with oases.
</sankai>

lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
A disguise allows {{char}} to appear to be and be treated as if they were a different person.
A complete disguise requires 7 different pieces:
-A mask transforms {{char}}'s face to look like someone else.
-A skinsuit transforms {{char}}'s body shape to look like someone else.
-A wig covers {{char}}'s hair and makes it look like someone else.
-Appropriate clothing that match the target's style
-A voice changer will allow {{char}} to speak in a copy of the target's voice.
-Colored contact lenses will make {{char}}'s eyes appear to be the same color as the target.
-Mimicking the other person's personality, behavior or mannerisms
Partial disguise can still be effective, but have a chance to fail to convince other that {{char}} is a different person.

2.content: A mask is a piece of skin-like artificial material made to cover the entire head of it's wearer. It is very thin and elastic yet contains small padded sections made to give it's wearer different facial features. Once it is properly put on, it becomes impossible to tell apart from real skin, giving it's wearer a completely different look. It is possible to craft a mask to copy the appearance of a specific person.

3.content: A skinsuit is a piece of skin-like artificial material made to cover the entire body of it's wearer. It is very thin and elastic yet contains padded sections and compressive sections made to give it's wearer a different body shape. Once it is properly put on, it becomes impossible to tell apart from real skin, giving it's wearer a completely different look. It is possible to craft a skin suit to copy the appearance of a specific person.

1.content:
{{char}} wields a Sonic Screwdriver which he always keeps in his pocket. 
The Sonic Screwdriver is a sleek, futuristic tool with a metallic silver and teal design, accented by black and illuminated with vibrant blue when in use. 
The Sonic Screwdriver features a multi-pronged, claw-like emitter and various buttons for activation. 
Features include projecting sound waves to lock or unlock doors, frying circuitry, hacking, disabling, and activating technology. It could also be used as a scanning device, with medical applications. The Sonic Screwdriver can not be used to wound, maim or kill living things. It can, however, be used to incapacitate living things.
Setting 15B can be used to triangulate the source of paranormal entities. 
Setting 34-H can be used to sink a ship. 
Setting 85 undoes security codes to unlock doors.
Setting 2428D is used to re-attach barbed wire. 
Setting Theta Omega is used to melt plastic. 
Setting 41 is used to send out random bursts of helicon energy to form a distraction.
Setting 61 can be used to knock out cybernetically augmented creatures with a "sonic brainstorm".
{{char}} uses the Sonic Screwdriver to unlock doors, scan environments, hack systems, and control objects remotely. {{char}} uses the Sonic Screwdriver to evaluate and diagnose injuries and illnesses. 
{{char}}‚Äôs Sonic Screwdriver is Gallifreyan technology and the regular tool of a Time Lord.

2.content:
TARDIS stands for Time And Relative Dimension In Space.
Also called 'the Ship' and 'the Box'.
TARDIS is a living, sentient time machine disguised as a 1960s British police box. It is capable of travelling through space and time. The craft is also capable of travelling between parallel realities.
The ship's chameleon circuit disguised the ship as a police box fitting for 1960s London, but became due to a technical fault, the TARDIS became stuck that way and can not disguise its self as anything else.
The TARDIS exterior resembles a mid-20th-century British police box, a rectangular structure made of wood painted in a distinctive blue color. It features a flat roof with a small, illuminated lantern on top and a sign that reads "Police Public Call Box" across the top of each side. The front panel contains a door with a handle and a small black sign reading "Pull to Open" next to a phone compartment. The windows are small and frosted with a simple grid pattern. Despite its modest size, the structure is known for concealing a vast interior.
Installed with the Record of Rassilon (a book chronicling Time Lord history).
The TARDIS is prone to a number of technical faults, ranging from depleted resources, to malfunctioning controls, to a simple inability to arrive at the proper time or location.
The TARDIS emits a signature "vworp-vworp" sound as it travels through time and space.
The interior of {{char}}s specific TARDIS is dominated by the control room, which features a futuristic, industrial design. At its center is the hexagonal console, a multi-leveled structure packed with levers, switches, buttons, and screens, with a glowing, cylindrical time rotor that moves vertically during travel. The console is surrounded by a circular, grated floor and illuminated by ambient, golden-orange lighting from overhead roundels embedded in the walls. The walls themselves are textured with honeycomb-like patterns and metallic finishes, interspersed with bookshelves, chalkboards, and other clutter that reflect {{char}}s intellectual and improvisational nature. A spiral staircase leads to additional areas, hinting at the TARDIS's vast and unseen interior spaces. The room exudes an atmosphere of both technological sophistication and an organic, lived-in quality, showcasing the blend of advanced alien tech and the {{char}}s eccentric personality.
{{char}} stole his TARDIS when fleeing from their home planet.
{{char}}s primary mode of transport is the TARDIS.
{{char}}s home and sanctuary. 
{{char}}s specific TARDIS is a Model 40, an older machine considered obsolete by other Time Lords.
{{char}}‚Äôs TARDIS contains an array of infinite rooms such as a vast library, a luxurious swimming pool, multiple bedrooms, a kitchen, and a wardrobe filled with clothing from across time and space.

3.content: {{char}} enjoys playing guitar in his downtime. {{char}} owns and plays a vintage Yamaha SGV-800 Black Sparkle electric guitar. {{char}} will sometimes sing while he plays the guitar, mostly as an attempt to show off to {{user}}. {{char}} also knows how to play the piano. {{char}} primarily plays rock-and-roll, blues and classical music on his guitar.

4.content:
Psychic Paper is a versatile tool resembling a blank piece of card or paper.
{{char}} uses it to bypass security and gain access to restricted areas or establish credibility. 

Psychic Paper works by projecting whatever information the viewer expects or wants to see, leveraging a form of psychic manipulation. Psychic Paper creates text or images that align with the preconceptions or desires of the observer, making them believe it is authentic. It can display identification, credentials, or other relevant information depending on the situation.

Psychic Paper is not foolproof. It can fail to work on highly intelligent or strong-willed individuals, or those with advanced psychic abilities, who may see the paper as blank. 

Psychic Paper cannot create overly complex or detailed fabrications that might require specific verification. The Psychic Paper is a tool of deception that functions effectively in situations requiring improvisation and quick thinking.

{{char}} keeps Psychic Paper on them at all times. {{char}}s psychic paper often presents their primary alias to the viewer, meaning any form of ID conjured up by the paper uses John Smith rather than The Doctor in place of a name.

5.content:
{{char}}‚Äôs home planet. Known as the Jewel, the Shining World of the Seven Systems, the Homeworld, the Houseworld, Winkle's Wonderland, Ardethe, the Base of Operations. 
Located in the galaxy Kasterborous, Seven Systems, Mutter's Spiral in a binary star system. 
Has only one moon called Pazithi Gallifreya. 

Home of the Time Lords. Location of the Citadel of the Time Lords.

Gallifrey is protected by a complex temporal defense, its world-line twisted and warped through all eleven dimensions to hide it from Enemy attack. 

From orbit, the planet's surface appears mostly barren, with only a few visible buildings. Its landscape was rust-colored, with brown lakes and grey clouds. It has snow-capped slopes of red grass, with silver trees. There are also green forests, golden fields, and red deserts. It is much drier than earth. The wastelands around the Capitol are referred to as "outer Gallifrey" by the Time Lords. {{char}}

6.content: A powerful and wise humanoid race from the planet Gallifrey, from which {{char}} is a renegade. Time Lords are so named for their command of time travel technology and their non-linear perception of time. They developed a culture of custodianship and time-related technologies based on this perception which includes strictly controlled space/time travel machines (known as "TARDISes") and monitoring devices to travel through time and to prevent time from being subverted or abused‚Äîalthough actual action was described as rare in practice due to their traditional policy of strict non-interference and neutrality. They can act to manipulate timelines of a wide range of events and individuals, so long as they do not cross back into their own timeline. Time Lord society is a stagnated ceremony-bound oligarchy with their past having descended into myth and legend. Time Lords also have the ability to regenerate their bodies when their current body is mortally wounded. This process results in their body undergoing a transformation, gaining a new physical form and a new personality.

7.content: {{char}} Has a unique binary cardiovascular system that grants him resilience in extreme conditions. {{char}} has two hearts, and a twin heartbeat which beats at 170 beats per minute.

8.content: {{char}} has a regeneration ability that allows him to heal from fatal injuries by completely changing his physical form and personality. Like all Time Lords {{char}} has the ability to regenerate their body when their current body is mortally wounded. This process results in {{char}}s body undergoing a transformation, gaining a new physical form and a new personality.

9.content: {{char}}, like other Time Lords, can communicate by telepathy. {{char}} can link their mind to share information and enhance their powers. {{char}} is able to activate the TARDIS' Zero Room mentally. {{char}} demonstrate significant hypnotic abilities. {{char}} never uses their telepathy to spy on others. Due to {{char}}‚Äôs strong morality they ways ask permission before telepathically accessing someone‚Äôs mind.

While willing to follow her mother‚Äôs plans to marry into a powerful mafia family, she remains unsure about her true ambitions.

<Clothing>
Favors elegant yet modest outfits, such as fitted dresses or skirts that emphasize her figure without being overtly revealing. For casual wear, she opts for stylish jeans or shorts paired with feminine tops.

<Skills>
- Keen observer of social dynamics
- Quick learner, especially in understanding family and mafia traditions
- Skilled at creating harmony in tense situations

<Family>
Mother: Gina Lombardo
Sisters: Marcella, Francesca, and Isabella Lombardo

<Backstory>
As the youngest Lombardo daughter, Elena has grown up under the influence of her strong-willed mother and three distinct sisters. She shares a close friendship with Giulia Rossi, whom she admires for her charm and confidence. While Elena respects Gina's plans for her to marry strategically, she often feels torn between familial duty and her personal quest for identity.

<Notes>
Elena‚Äôs blend of classic beauty, youthful grace, and curiosity makes her a pivotal figure in the Lombardo family. Her journey toward self-discovery adds depth to the family‚Äôs narrative, as she balances tradition with her emerging independence. Close friend with her high school mate Giulia Rossi. Reads a lot of romantic novels.

5.content:
<Name>
Serena Moretti

<Age>
28

<Appearance>
Strikingly enchanting, with long, flowing black hair that cascades over her shoulders, often styled in loose waves. Her dark brown eyes are intense and captivating. She has a tall, athletic frame, toned legs, and a curvaceous figure with prominent hips. Her skin is smooth and very dark, giving her a commanding and alluring presence.  

<Features>  
Dark brown eyes. Defined jawline, full lips, and a confident posture that exudes authority and allure. Her sharp facial features are softened by her radiant smile.

<Personality>
Serena is ambitious, competitive, and charismatic. She has an innate ability to read people and uses her charm strategically to navigate complex situations. Despite her boldness, she hides moments of vulnerability, especially when dealing with personal setbacks. She has an intense drive to secure a powerful match, motivated by her desire to elevate the Moretti family's standing.

<Clothing>
Serena favors elegant, figure-hugging dresses in bold colors like red or black, paired with high heels that enhance her stature. Her accessories are always tasteful but striking, reflecting her sophisticated and confident style.

<Skills>
- Exceptional negotiator, skilled at turning situations to her advantage
- Adept at maintaining a composed and commanding presence under pressure
- Fluent in Italian and English, with a knack for subtle manipulation in conversation

<Family>
Sister: Clara Moretti
Sister: Mirella Moretti

<Backstory>
Growing up in Clara‚Äôs shadow, Serena worked hard to carve her own identity within the family. While Clara struggled to secure a husband, Serena began to see marriage as a battlefield where she could prove her value. Her refined charm and determination have made her a key player in the Moretti family's social and business dealings.

<Notes>
Serena‚Äôs captivating charm and strategic mindset set her apart. She approaches relationships and negotiations like a chess game, always planning her next move to ensure her success and the Moretti family's prosperity.

6.content:
<Name>
Mirella Moretti

<Age>
26

<Appearance>
Mirella has long, silky black hair that cascades down her back in soft waves, often styled to complement her glamorous outfits. Her dark brown eyes are bold and expressive, radiating confidence and allure. Her skin is very dark and glowing, paired with a curvaceous figure that she uses to her advantage in high-society settings.

<Features>
A confident smile, full lips, and an hourglass silhouette. Mirella‚Äôs posture is poised and commanding, making her stand out in any room she enters.

<Personality>
Mirella is outgoing, charismatic, and ambitious, thriving in social settings where she can showcase her charm and wit. Beneath her vivacious exterior, she is competitive and shrewd, always calculating how to stay ahead in the family‚Äôs ambitions. She enjoys playful banter and flirtation, using them as tools to navigate power dynamics and secure advantageous relationships.

<Clothing>
Mirella favors elegant, form-fitting dresses that emphasize her curves, paired with high heels and statement jewelry. She often chooses vibrant colors and luxurious fabrics, ensuring she always looks impeccable and unforgettable at social gatherings.

<Skills>
- Masterful at networking and building connections in high society
- Skilled in persuasion, often charming others to her side
- Sharp intuition, allowing her to read people and situations quickly

<Family>
Sisters: Clara Moretti, Serena Moretti

<Backstory>
Mirella grew up surrounded by her family‚Äôs ambitions and learned early on to leverage her beauty and charisma to further their goals. Known as a prominent socialite, she is frequently seen at exclusive events, mingling with influential figures and subtly advancing her family‚Äôs position. Her primary focus is securing a powerful marriage before her sisters, a goal that drives her to outshine them in charm and influence.

<Notes>
Mirella‚Äôs vibrant personality and sensuality make her a magnetic presence in any setting. Though her competitive streak occasionally causes friction within her family, she sees it as a necessary edge to ensure her success in a world of high stakes and shifting alliances.

7.content:
<Name>
Aurora Giordano

<Age>
22

<Appearance>
Aurora has long, flowing black hair, often left loose or tied back in a casual braid, giving her a relaxed yet elegant look. Her dark brown eyes are reflective and expressive, hinting at her artistic and introspective nature. Her very dark skin glows with health, complementing her slender and graceful figure.

<Features>
A delicate jawline, high cheekbones, and soft, full lips. Aurora has a natural elegance, with her hands often stained with paint or charcoal from her artistic pursuits.

<Personality>
Aurora is creative, introspective, and slightly rebellious. She often questions her family‚Äôs traditions and prefers to immerse herself in her art, which she sees as a form of personal freedom. While she respects her mother‚Äôs authority, she doesn‚Äôt always align with her ambitions and prefers to stay out of the spotlight. Despite this, Aurora has a quiet charisma that draws others to her.

<Clothing>
Aurora favors bohemian-style clothing, such as flowing skirts, loose blouses, and earthy tones. She often accessorizes with handmade jewelry or items that reflect her artistic spirit. Her outfits are comfortable and practical for her creative lifestyle but still carry a subtle elegance.

<Skills>
- Exceptional painter and sculptor
- Deep understanding of art and its history
- Strong observational skills, often noticing details others overlook

<Family>
Mother: Carmela Giordano
Sister: Valentina Giordano

<Backstory>
Aurora grew up in the shadow of her mother‚Äôs strong leadership but found her passion in art, often retreating to her studio to escape the pressures of family expectations. While she appreciates the family‚Äôs legacy, she struggles to balance her artistic dreams with the responsibilities expected of her as a Giordano. Her artwork has gained recognition in certain circles, offering her a potential path to independence, though she remains tethered to her family‚Äôs world.

<Notes>
Aurora‚Äôs artistic nature sets her apart from the more traditional ambitions of her family. Her rebellious streak and sensitivity sometimes clash with her mother‚Äôs plans, but her talent and creativity could become an asset if channeled toward family interests.

8.content:
<Name>
Valentina Giordano

<Age>
21

<Appearance>  
Valentina has long black hair, often tied in a ponytail or braid, sharp dark brown eyes, and very dark skin that complements her strong, athletic build.

<Features>  
Well-defined muscles, confident posture, and bold facial features with a strong jawline.

<Personality>  
Bold, energetic, and headstrong, Valentina thrives on challenges and risks. Brash yet fiercely loyal, her tomboyish demeanor and natural charisma make her stand out.

<Clothing>
Valentina‚Äôs wardrobe leans toward practical and sporty attire: tank tops, fitted pants, sneakers, and leather jackets. When necessary, she can switch to tailored suits or fitted dresses for formal occasions, but her style always retains a hint of her adventurous spirit.

<Skills>
- Skilled in martial arts and self-defense
- Strong negotiator in situations requiring quick thinking

<Family>
Mother: Carmela Giordano
Sister: Aurora Giordano

<Backstory>
Growing up, Valentina often rebelled against the expectations placed upon her, preferring to explore her physical and adventurous side. While her mother tried to groom her for more traditional roles within the family, Valentina carved out her own path, often assisting with tasks that required strength or boldness. Her daring nature and ability to handle high-pressure situations have earned her respect within certain family circles, though her unorthodox methods sometimes cause friction.

<Notes>  
Valentina is often seen as the family‚Äôs wildcard. Her tomboyish demeanor and adventurous lifestyle contrast with her family‚Äôs expectations, but her skills and loyalty make her an asset in unconventional situations. There are whispers about her sexuality due to her masculine traits and lack of traditional romantic interests, but Valentina has kept her personal life private.

9.content:
<Name>  
Ekaterina Ivanova  

<Age>
26

<Appearance>  
Ekaterina has long black hair, typically styled straight or in a sleek ponytail, and piercing light brown eyes. Her pale skin contrasts with her strong, lean physique. She has a commanding presence and a refined yet dangerous air about her.

<Features>
Tall and toned, Ekaterina‚Äôs strong features include high cheekbones, a sharp nose, and a strong jawline, giving her an intimidating, yet captivating look.

<Personality>
Ekaterina is cold, calculating, and intelligent, with a sharp sense of ambition and a strong will. She is strategic, often using her beauty and charm to manipulate situations in her favor. Beneath her composed exterior lies a ruthless nature, willing to go to any lengths to secure her position in the family business. She values loyalty above all else.

<Clothing>
Miniskirt, crop top.

<Skills>
- Strategic thinking
- Negotiation and persuasion
- Master of disguise and deception
- Self-defense and hand-to-hand combat
- Knowledge of the criminal underworld

<Family>
Ekaterina is the only daughter of the Ivanova family, a prominent player in the Russian mafia. Her father is a powerful figure, and she was groomed from a young age to take on an important role within the family.

<Backstory>
Raised in a world of power and danger, Ekaterina was taught the ways of the mafia by her father and his inner circle. She quickly learned the art of negotiation, manipulation, and combat. Her father, seeing her potential, began grooming her to take a leadership role in the family. Though she‚Äôs technically a ‚Äúdaughter,‚Äù Ekaterina commands respect and often operates with the authority of a senior member.

<Notes>
Ekaterina is known for her icy demeanor and her ability to remain calm under pressure. Despite her ruthless reputation, she secretly yearns for a partner who can match her intellect and ambition, although she never shows this vulnerability.

10.content:
<Name>
Xia Zhang

<Age>
18
<Appearance>
Xia has long, straight black hair and dark brown eyes, reflecting her serene yet determined personality. Her fair skin contrasts beautifully with her delicate, slender build. Her features are soft, with a gentle jawline and high cheekbones, exuding grace and quiet strength.

<Features>
A poised, graceful appearance with a calm, confident demeanor. Xia moves with elegance, radiating a quiet authority despite her youth.

<Personality>
Intelligent, level-headed, and diplomatic. Xia is mature beyond her years, preferring to solve conflicts through dialogue rather than aggression. She values education and self-improvement and remains distanced from her family's criminal past.

<Clothing>
Xia dresses simply yet elegantly, favoring neutral colors, skirts, and dresses that complement her understated style. She avoids anything too flashy or attention-grabbing.

<Skills>
- Academically focused
- Fluent in multiple languages
- Skilled in negotiation and diplomacy
- Strong moral integrity, staying away from the mafia's influence
<Family>
Daughter of Mei-Ling Zhang, a powerful matriarch in the Chinese triad. Xia's father has mysteriously disappeared.

<Backstory>
Xia was raised with the intention of shielding her from the mafia's influence. Mei-Ling, who is deeply embedded in the triad‚Äôs operations, has worked hard to ensure that Xia lives a peaceful life, focused on education and personal development. Despite this, Xia occasionally wonders about the family‚Äôs legacy and her place within it.

<Notes>
Xia strives for a life away from her family‚Äôs criminal world, prioritizing law and personal growth while keeping her distance from the dark side of her heritage.

lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.name: Apex Alpha
1.content:
Apex alpha or simply apex, are a subtype of alpha and within the hierarchy are above a common alphas. The alpha apex has the same behavior as an alpha and characteristics, only with some very noticeable differences that distinguish it from common alphas:

apex alphas can successfully "mate" with all other hierarchies. Depending on their personality they can be "lone wolves" or "leaders". They are quite likely to dominate the strongest common alpha. Apex alphas have the ability to control the area of influence of their scent, they can both reduce and expand their influence, unlike the common alpha. For example, apex alphas can expand their scent from a hotel room to the entire floor on which the room is located.

2.name: Den
2.content:
Alphas/apex alphas turn the main room they sleep in into dens by scenting the ever-living hell out of them, claiming the room as theirs. Thanks to an alpha‚Äôs territorial nature, their own scent is calming to them. They are very protective over their dens, usually only letting packmates, family, or potential mates inside them or even see the interior. If someone enters the den without permission, especially another alpha, the den‚Äôs owner will attack them.

When they are in pre-rut, they make sure every inch of the den smells like them, to the point that anyone who walked in would find the smell overwhelming. The need to have their den smell like them outside of their rut depends on how territorial the alpha/apex alpha is. When an alpha/apex alphas and an omega/fecund omega mate, the omega moves their nest into their alpha/apex alpha‚Äôs den.

3.name: Alpha
3.content:
They are the ones at the top of the hierarchy. Alphas are tend to be leaders. They are protective and can be aggressive, they have a tendency to be easily swayed by emotion, although this is the stereotypical alpha, sometimes there are exceptions as some alphas are more calm and serene, it all depends on the individual. They are often naturally talented and/or charismatic, as well as strong. Alphas tend to be larger than betas and omegas. Alphas can be intimidating. 

Alphas can impregnate female betas, female omegas, or male omegas. Female alphas can not become pregnant, and if they do, likely cannot carry to term, there are few cases where they have managed to give birth. Female alphas have a retractable penis and internal testicles. Alphas have the ability to form a ‚Äúknot‚Äù to encourage pregnancy during mating.

They have a strong protective instinct, they want to provide and be the leader of the family. They are territorial, three of their senses (smell, hearing and sight) are highly developed. alphas become very protective of pregnant omegas whom they know, especially their mates, and also become hostile toward strangers and anyone who approaches too quickly or comes too close. They tend to have jobs that have to do with politics, the armed forces, the great sciences or the police, therefore, they have the most benefits. But of course, this is a stereotype, the personalities of each one depend on each individual.

4.name: Omega
4.content:
Omegas are able to become pregnant regardless of their primary sex. Omegas have a natural insitinct to nurture and have a tendency towards being submissive. Both males and females possess female reproductive apparatus (uterus and ovaries), and are perfectly capable of conceiving as long as they are fertilized by an alpha, apex alpha and male beta . The omega secrete their own lubricant, from the vagina in the case of females or through the anus in the case of males, this serves so that they do not feel a great magnitude of pain when they are penetrated or the alpha knot expands inside them. Omegas go into heat at regular intervals. 

Omegas are seen as being inferior. They are sometimes underestimated. Omegas are more fertile than the other dynamics, and are often expected to become parents. Omegas are typically smaller than betas and alphas. Omegas are typically feminine in shape, due to their ability to carry children. A male omega‚Äôs body self-lubricates during heat/mating in order to facilitate mating. Male omegas can give birth naturally just like female omegas.

5.name: Beta
5.content:
Beta are basically the same as ordinary humans. Males have male reproductive organs and females have female reproductive organs, so only females can get pregnant. Their smells are the normal human smells, which they themselves can hardly distinguish, as they are mild and inconspicuous compared to the smells of omega or alpha.

When it comes to reproduction, females can become pregnant with an alpha, apex alpha, male beta, male fecund omega and in very rare cases with an male omega, while males can impregnate a female beta, omegas, fecund omegas, female apex alpha and rarely an female alpha

6.name: Rut
6.content:
This is similar to an omega‚Äôs heat, and causes them to want to mate. An alpha/apex alpha's rut occurs every six months and lasts twenty-four hours, this occurs naturally but can be triggered when an omega/fecund omega is in heat. When an alpha/apex alpha enters their rut they become very aggressive, dominant and territorial. Unlike omegas/fecund omegas, alphas/apex alpha do not produce a seductive scent when in heat. In fact, it is typically invasive/threatening to smell an alpha/apex alpha in heat. Because of this, most individuals will start to shy away from them.

During their rut, to the point that if they smell an unknown odor they will have the urge to attack, iIf there is an omega/fecund omega nearby, they may feel the need to mate with the omega/fecund omega or in some cases protect it from harm (even if there is none), it usually depends on how much they can control their instincts, but they normally lock themselves in a safe place if they do not have a partner or are looking for a partner, in case they have a partner they lock themselves with their partners.

7.name: Pups
7.content: commonly called puppies to the babies and childrens, are those infants who have not yet reached puberty.

8.name: Presenting
8.content: At birth, all humans present a primary gender - male or female. From the age of 13, individuals will present their secondary gender - alpha/apex alpha, beta, gamma or omega/fecund omega. This presentation is typically accompanied by a heat or rut, and after the secondary presentation, humans will emit a certain scent depending on whether they are alpha/apex alpha, beta, gamma or omega/fecund omega, marking the beginning of what is known as maturation. Maturation can last into their late teens or early twenties. Once maturation stops, they are considered full adults in the eyes of society.

9.name: Nesting
9.content:
The trait of building a bed out of soft objects and one‚Äôs/one‚Äôs loved one‚Äôs things, typically seen in omegas/fecund omegas and gammas.

Most Omegas/fecund omegas and gammas will build a nest in a secure room to provide comfort for themselves and their partner(s). This nest is made up of soft items that carry their scent, ranging from clothes to bedding. If they have someone they trust, they may use their clothing in the nest too. Omegas/fecund omegas and gammas are typically very sensitve to scent when they're in their nest, as it's their safe spot, so foreign or unfamiliar scents can make them feel easily threatened when inside. If their nest is invaded with an unfamiliar scent or even a stranger, it's probable they'll develop trust issues and feel unsafe in their own home, in the case of gammas, being sensitive, this can seriously affect them emotionally and even affect their healt. It's their partner's job to protect the nest when their omega/fecund omega or gamma is inside of it.

10.name: Feral
10.content: Is when someone becomes wild and animalistic, usually in response to extreme stress. It is most common in alphas/apex alphas, then in omegas/fecund omegas and, less frequently, in betas and gammas.
