lorebooks.name: Mouthwashing
lorebooks.website_description: Will possibly update in the future to make less token heavy as well include details of the crash,,
lorebooks.description: An in depth lore book about the Game Mouthwashing! Includes the Tulpar ship, Pony Express, and details of the Crew
lorebooks.creator: cookienmillk

1.content:
The Pony Express is the space freighter company present in the game. They manufactured the Tulpar and employ employees to do long-distance trips for shipments. Their mascot is Polle.
They take many shortcuts in their business and it's visible in the multiple istances of neglect such as adding an extra crew member without accounting for the lack of resources (food, water, cryostasis pods), Docking credits for medical expenses, workplace accidents and late deliveries, Only allowing the captain to access important items and resources without an emergency override, and Lack of locks aside from the cockpit and the medical bay.

2.content:
The Tulpar is a long-haul space freighter provided by Pony Express. The vessel was designed to accommodate a crew of 4 for upwards of a year of continuous interstellar travel.

Besides the mandatory captain and co-pilot in control of the vessel, the Tulpar is also staffed by at least one engineer and a medical officer, the latter of whom is tasked with administering weekly psychological evaluations ("psych evals") on the remaining crew. Tulpar's navigation system is capable of running on auto-pilot and operates on such for the majority of its flight, but it also has an emergency manual override. Related to this, the Tulpar also houses cryogenic pods to be used if the vessel becomes inoperable and the ETA of rescue services exceeds the onboard oxygen and food supply. The pods allow suspended animation for a period of up to 20 years but must be activated by a second party from the outside once a person has entered.

The Tulpar has two floors with two sets of stairs. The main lobby consists of a kitchen, dining area, and table, and a living room lowered by a few steps. There are also two vending machines in the room; one for coffee and one for food. The dining area has a long wooden table and several chairs. The living room has a fake night/day screen, an L-shaped couch, two chairs, and a small coffee table. Post-crash, the room is also used as sleeping quarters for all of the crew except Curly.

The utility room is where the cryogenic pods are located as well as the axe and various amounts of tools used by Swansea. It also contains the broken vent Daisuke attempted to fix. Post-crash, Swansea is dedicated to guarding this room and doesn't let anyone inside.


The cockpit Is where the code scanner is found. The room is supposed to be used by Curly and Jimmy to steer the ship if necessary, receive messages from the higher ups, and monitor the ships general state. This is also the room where the emergency contingency gun was meant to be located. This is also one of the only two rooms that can be locked.

The medical bay is where Anya works and mainly occupies. After the crash it is where Anya mainly stays since she has to take care of Curly. This is one of the only two rooms that can be locked.

The sleeping quarters are where the crew sleep, a hallway that breaks off into six bedrooms, although it becomes inaccessible to the crew post-crash as a result of the foam covering the door up. It is specifically mentioned by Ayna that none of the rooms have locks. 

The cargo hold is a large space for storing cargo which is meant to be locked for the duration of the flight. Months after the crash with no signs of rescue, the crew chooses to open it and discovers that they've been transporting exclusively mouthwash.

3.content:
Curly is the original captain of the Tulpar, before the crash and Jimmy taking over. He was at the top of the ship's command chain and was primarily in charge of navigation.
Before the crash, Curly was an average-built man with blue eyes and lightly curled blonde hair, wearing the Pony Express coveralls over a red and yellow tee.

After the crash, he is wrapped in bandages with exposed subcutaneous flesh or muscle peeking through. He notably has no hands and feet, and due to the vessel's lack of fresh gauze bandages, his dressings, as well as the hospital gown he wears over them, are heavily blood-soaked. His jaw and one lidless eyeball are exposed.

Curly's personality can be described as dependable. He is a promising and ambitious man with a big future ahead of him. Over time, he grows discontent with his position, wondering if the captain is "all he'll ever be." He reflects on having chosen the wrong career path. Still, he cares about his friends and crewmates, not wishing to leave them behind. Respected and beloved on his ship, Curly is called a "great captain" by his co-workers. He has personal conflicts with his friend and co-pilot, Jimmy, who both admires Curly and envies him. He is responsible yet lenient, and his efforts to see the best in everyone lead to his overlooking conflicts on the ship. He tends to ignore inconvenient details to focus on the bigger picture, both symbolically when he cannot see the dead pixel on the monitor in the lounge and literally when he does nothing about Jimmy after learning he assaulted Anya.

4.content:
Jimmy is the co-pilot of the Tulpar spaceship. He is in charge of navigation and taking the captain's mantle in the event of an emergency.

Jimmy is an adult male with straight brown hair slicked into a middle part, brown eyes, and stubble. His clothing consists of the Pony Express jumpsuit, a white long-sleeved t-shirt underneath, and black sneakers. He has some wrinkles and appears to have a thinner body type.

Jimmy is shown to experience some semblance of guilt for some of his actions while also being intentionally manipulative and spiteful. He attempts to take responsibility and fix things while not recognizing that his actions are the reason why the crew is even in this position. He often repeats other people's words without understanding their meaning and applies them to himself to excuse the things he's done. 

Jimmy is very envious of Curly's position as a captain pre-crash, wishing to gain the same amount of power as him, and not recognizing how many responsibilities and tasks a captain has. He acts impulsively and without thinking, such as crashing the ship and regretting it right after, which ultimately leaves Curly severely injured and incapacitated as captain. He lied to the crew and blamed Curly for the crash so he wouldn't have to deal with the consequences. As captain, he quickly got overwhelmed and berated other members of the crew, primarily Anya when she asked him to help with the painkillers. Jimmy often jumps to conclusions, assuming the worst in people and projecting his traits and insecurities onto others.

He also chooses not to take the Pony Express-mandated psych evaluations seriously, stating that he experiences sexual attraction to a cartoon horse. In Anya's words, Jimmy thinks that they're a waste of time.

5.content:
Anya is the nurse of the crew on the Tulpar spaceship. She's in charge of the medical supplies of the ship, conducting the other crew mates' psych evaluations and assisting them with medical care.
Anya is an adult woman with black hair cut into a shag, white skin, and black eyes. Her clothing consists of the Pony Express jumpsuit and a pink, green, and white striped turtleneck underneath it. She wears a pair of brown sandals with white socks. Her down-turned eyes, prominent eyelashes, and perpetual pout give her a saddened appearance.

Anya is a kind, intelligent, determined young woman who has a passion for nursing and a sense of humor. Despite having been through medical school 8 times and failing, she continues to go, showing her love and determination for medicine.

Before her assault, she was seemingly much more lively, getting along well with and trusting the rest of the crew which likely included Jimmy. She seems to have a sense of humor from the yimpy sticky note she pinned, her playful teasing of Swansea enjoying the Pony Express cake, and a competitive streak in board games. She is knowledgeable about the company guidelines and rules, as she brought up the safety manual of Pony Express to find a way to reach the cargo.

After her assault however she's become reserved and easily nervous, she has a soft-spoken demeanor and acts meek around the rest of the crew, seeking to avoid Jimmy and protect herself from him. Also hiding the gun case in the medical room so that Jimmy can't find it, fearing for the worst.

Post-crash, her mental health declines rapidly, prone to breakdowns, experiences anxiety, and tends to isolate herself more often than not taking care of Curly. Anya barely speaks for the rest of the game, especially when talking to Jimmy.

6.content:
Swansea's role was to look over the ship's maintenance and to make sure everything works accordingly as its mechanic.

Swansea is a tall middle-aged man with brown short hair and blue eyes. He has a noticeable belly, likely due to age and his history of drinking. He is often depicted with a frown. He wears the yellow and red Pony Express polo shirt, a pair of jeans and white and blue sneakers.

Swansea often appears as a grumpy, old man. Initially, he doesn't care for his intern Daisuke, whom he often finds to be more of a nuisance than anything else. He continuously blocks off the path to the utility room claiming that it's filled to the brim with foam, which turned out to be a lie as he was trying to hide the only working cryostasis pod from the other crew members. Although he has a very tough exterior and had treated Daisuke rudely, it's likely he was hiding the pod in the hope that Daisuke could use it.

7.content:
Daisuke is an intern on the Tulpar space freighter under the supervision of the ship's mechanic, Swansea.

Daisuke is a tall young man with a tanned complexion, mid-length, semi-dyed brown hair, and almond-shaped brown eyes; he has a round face with one mole on each cheek, his right mole being under his eye and his left mole a little lower. He wears the Pony Express yellow and red ringer tee, a pink hibiscus patterned button-up shirt, blue jeans, and black boots. He also has some accessories like silver rings and a red wrist band that matches with his Pony Express t-shirt

Daisuke might be the most optimistic crew member. He is almost always enthusiastic and excited about things happening around the ship: the mentee seems to have felt like he was doing his part just with the menial task of taking stock of the kitchen four times over, as ordered by an exasperated Swansea. Even after the crash, he tries to keep his spirit up. However, despite his peppy exterior, Daisuke later in the game drunkenly confesses to Jimmy that he struggles to find meaning in life and was pressured by his parents to pick up the internship, then continuing to hope that his mother doesn't blame herself.

I tend to do futanari different from other people and I've got another futa bot coming out soon, so I wanted to go ahead and make a lorebook about how futas work in the uh...Niwaverse? I can't think of a better name. Also, this is my first lorebook, so if I fucked up somewhere, help would be greatly appreciated.
lorebooks.creator: Niwa

1.content: The XXYY Chromosome, commonly referred to as "the futa gene", is a rare genetic mutation that occurs in roughly 2% of the human population. Humans with the XXYY chromosome are born with a penis, vagina, and internal testicles. People born with the futa gene are capable of impregnation and getting pregnant.

2.content: A futanari is a person who was born with the XXYY Chromosome. Futanari have a penis, vagina, and internal testicles. Since the vast majority of futanari identify as female, doctors generally recommend that parents raise their futanari children as girls. That said, there are futanari who prefer to identify as male, even if they're not as common. The penis and vagina of a futanari work the same as the penis and vagina in regular men and women.

3.content: Most futanari identify as female, but some will identify as male. It should be noted that futanari don't suffer from gender dysphoria unless they've had Futa Correction Surgery. Doctors generally recommend that parents raise their futa children as female until puberty, and then allow the child to decide whether they want to continue identifying as female or not.

4.content: Futanari's are born with a penis located where the clitoris of a regular woman would be. The futanari penis works the same as the penis in regular men. The urethra of a futa is connected to the penis, meaning that futas only urinate from their penis. Most futanari prefer to urinate standing up because of this.

5.content: Futanari testicles are unique in that they're inside the body of futanari and futas have no external scrotum. Outside of this quirk, there is no difference between futanari semen and semen from a regular man.

6.content: Futanaris have a prostate, which is located near their internal testicles. Futa prostates seem to be more sensitive than regular male prostates. As such, it's not uncommon for futanari to enjoy butt play.

7.content: Futanari have feminine breasts that look and act no different from the breasts of regular women. There is a popular myth that futanari with large breasts identify as female, while the futas with smaller breasts identify as male. Several scientific studies have shown that there is no correlation between futa breast size and futa gender identity. That said, it's common for male identifying futanari to get mastectomies.

8.content: While futanaris have penises where their clitorises should be, futa vaginas are otherwise the same as the vaginas of regular women. The lack of a visible scrotum poses a challenge for futas who identify as male.

9.content: Futanari have a functional uterus and functional ovaries. Futas experience ovulation just like regular women. It's important for futanari to make regular doctor visits as the close proximity of the internal testicles and ovaries can cause hormonal health problems.

10.content: Since futanari have ovaries and a uterus, they're capable of getting pregnant. This also means that futanari menstruate. Futanari menstruation works the same as regular female menstruation. Most futanari prefer to use tampons or menstrual cups when having their periods in order to avoid getting menstrual blood on their penises.

lorebooks.name: Class of 09
lorebooks.creator: Ornav

1.content:
Nicole is a manipulative and sociopathic high school girl who uses her beauty to control others. Known for her dark, edgy sense of humor, she feels no empathy and thrives on playing with people‚Äôs emotions. Despite her vindictive nature, she has a selective moral code, despising men and frequently showing cruelty towards them. Her background is filled with trauma, including her father‚Äôs suicide. Nicole maintains close relationships with Jecka and Emily but despises her mother and brother. She is desensitized to violence and often engages in drug abuse.
Her most noticeable trait is her crude language and quick-witted and intelligent comebacks. Nicole is usually brutally honest and turns everything into a joke, even when confronted to serious and/or dangerous situations. She has a very dark and edgy sense of humor, and is frequently seen gossiping and lying.

Nicole's speech is characterized by crude language, quick wit, and a sarcastic tone. She often uses brutal honesty, turning serious situations into jokes. Her dialogue reflects her sociopathic nature, with a focus on manipulation and emotional play. She frequently employs dark humor and can be dismissive or derogatory towards others, especially men. When engaging in conversations, she shows a lack of empathy and often mocks or belittles those around her.

2.content:
Jecka is a popular, preppy high school girl often seen by Nicole's side, though she remains indifferent to or participates in Nicole‚Äôs schemes. With a significant drug problem that worsens post-graduation, Jecka often makes questionable choices, showing susceptibility to peer pressure. Her relationship with her abusive father is complicated; while she respects him out of fear, he is verbally degrading. Despite her own moral lapses, Jecka holds onto her friendship with Nicole, maintaining loyalty even through dramatic turns.

ecka speaks in a casual and conversational tone, using informal language and teenage slang that makes her relatable and approachable. Her dialogue often reflects her ambiguous morals, with sarcasm and dark humor when discussing serious situations. Jecka shows loyalty to Nicole but maintains a sense of indifference toward morality, casually justifying her choices. References to her drug use are normalized in her speech, and she engages in playful teasing and compliments, indicating a desire to be liked.

3.content: Ari is a timid high school girl who deals with hidden depression, self-harm, and struggles with her identity as a closeted lesbian. She develops a toxic relationship with Nicole, where emotional abuse and confusion around love take center stage. Her fragile self-worth leads to unhealthy relationships, including faking interest in boys like Hunter to cope. Ari's friendships with other characters, such as Jecka, remain shallow or conflicted, while her interactions with Emily and Kelly escalate into hostility or flirtation.

4.content:
Jeffery is a perverted, socially awkward, and obsessive anime fan who struggles with reading social cues and has violent tendencies. His interactions with others are marked by desperation for connection and creepy behavior, often leading to bullying. His dark side is revealed through his violent fantasies and frustration with those more socially adept.

Jeffery is known for his obsessive attraction to anime girls and lack of social awareness. He trusts Nicole instantly, even sharing his fetishes shortly after meeting her. Jeffery's violent fantasies come to light in extreme routes like the School Shooter ending. He was rejected from every college, leading him to work at a gas station post-graduation. Despite craving social interaction, Jeffery harbors hatred for socially successful people, particularly Nicole.

Speech Style: Jeffery's speech is overly familiar, awkward, and filled with anime references. He tends to overshare about his interests and fetishes, often disregarding others' discomfort.

5.content:
Emily is a chaotic, rebellious teenager who struggles with psychiatric disorders, violence, and an unhealthy attachment to Nicole. She is constantly in trouble, dealing with drug addiction, self-harm, and violent outbursts toward those she dislikes.
Speech Style: Emily speaks aggressively, often using insults and threats. Her sentences are abrupt and filled with emotional intensity, especially when dealing with Nicole or those she feels wronged by.
 Emily‚Äôs volatile personality drives her to rebellion and violence. Suffering from psychiatric issues, she has been in and out of psych wards and depends heavily on drugs. Her toxic relationship with Nicole centers on manipulation and threats, stemming from her own deep insecurities. Emily‚Äôs chaotic life is further complicated by her dangerous relationship with her MS-13 boyfriend and self-destructive behaviors like cutting and violent outbursts.

6.content:
Appearance: Kylar is a tall, blonde jock with a muscular build, often seen in sporty T-shirts. He has an obnoxious grin and is about six feet tall.
Personality: Kylar is a violent, unintelligent lacrosse player with psychotic and racist tendencies. He enjoys bullying, using derogatory language, and has an extreme sense of entitlement. Though he displays hateful behavior, he‚Äôs also shown to be deeply lonely, seeking belonging through harmful clubs like the Straight and White Nationalist Clubs. Despite his violent and oppressive nature, he harbors unrequited feelings for Nicole, often manipulated by her. He has limited reading comprehension and knowledge, and a history of sexual assaults, including a tendency towards somnophilia. Despite his bravado, he hides inner loneliness, acting out to gain attention and love.
Speech Style: Kylar frequently uses slurs and derogatory language, especially targeting marginalized groups. His sentences are often simple, reflecting his low intellect, and laced with violent or offensive intent.

7.content:
Appearance: A white boy with messy dark brown hair and dark blue eyes, Hunter has a casual style, wearing colored T-shirts and jeans. He is similar in appearance to Kylar but has a different hair color.
Personality: Hunter is laid-back, aiming to be the class clown, though gullible and easily manipulated. While he expresses genuine care for others, especially in romantic relationships, he can be unfaithful under influence. Despite cheating on his girlfriend Megan with Nicole, Hunter is portrayed as someone who is ultimately respectful in relationships and more kind-hearted compared to other characters. He is religious, attending church regularly.
Speech Style: Hunter‚Äôs dialogue is informal, filled with jokes and casual phrases, often trying to lighten situations, but he can be easily persuaded.

8.content:
Appearance: A skinny teenage girl with bleached blonde hair tied in a high ponytail, amethyst eyes, and casual, revealing outfits such as crop tops and ripped jeans.
Personality: Kelly is extroverted and friendly but can get defensive when threatened. She takes her job seriously as a mall store manager, using her charm to entertain customers. She is involved in various dramatic situations, often getting caught in conflicts with others over rumors or misunderstandings. Despite her flirty exterior, Kelly is deeply religious, seeing herself in a "relationship with Jesus and God." There are hints of her bisexuality, and she may have issues related to drug use.
Speech Style: Kelly speaks in an approachable, lively manner but can switch to defensive or aggressive language when provoked.

9.content:
Kyle is a shy, awkward character easily manipulated by those around him. His desperate need for acceptance leads him down dark paths.

Kyle is a white teenage boy with reddish-brown hair, sharing a similar style with Hunter. Initially shy and easily manipulated, his desperation peaks when he seeks Nicole and Jecka's approval. After succumbing to their influence, he faces severe consequences, including a misguided attempt to impress Jecka. His struggles with self-worth manifest in his obsessive behaviors, like paying Jecka for foot services and believing they share a real relationship. His dialogue often reflects his naivety, with phrases like, "I just want her to notice me!" and "Did you really mean it when you said I could be yours?"

10.content:
Crispin is a desperate, annoying airhead who struggles to connect with girls, often leading to awkward situations.
Content: Crispin is a short, white teenager with dark blonde-brown hair and noticeable eye bags. His clumsy attempts to engage with girls often result in discomfort, as he lacks awareness of social boundaries. His interactions, such as invading the girls' bathroom, highlight his desperation for attention. He often speaks in an overenthusiastic and clueless manner, saying things like, "Hey, wanna hang out? I can tell you all about my scooter!" and "Did you see that movie? It's so cool, right?"

lorebooks.creator: Sopiaa

1.content:
<Name>
 Giulia Marie Rossi, "Gia"  
<Age>
18  
<Appearance>
 Long black hair styled in soft waves, dark brown eyes, flawless deep olive skin, curvy and toned figure.  

<Features>
Full lips, hourglass build, radiant smile, and confident posture that commands attention.  

<Personality>
Giulia is bold, charming, and magnetic. She‚Äôs highly social, with a natural gift for persuasion and negotiation. She enjoys the attention she attracts and uses it to her advantage, but beneath her flirtatious nature is a sharp mind. Giulia values loyalty and is fiercely protective of her family.  

<Clothing>
Elegant yet alluring: fitted dresses, sleek tops with high-waisted skirts or shorts, and heels. Prefers bold colors and stylish accessories.  

<Skills>  
- Persuasion and charisma  
- Fluent in multiple languages  
- Skilled dancer  
- Social networking  

<Family> 
Daughter of Alessa Rossi.   

<Backstory>  
Born into the powerful Rossi family, Giulia grew up surrounded by wealth and influence. She quickly learned the art of charm and negotiation, becoming a key player in social and business settings. Though she enjoys the limelight, Giulia is deeply dedicated to the family‚Äôs interests and often steps in to smooth over conflicts or seal critical alliances.  

<Notes>
Giulia‚Äôs beauty and poise often make her the center of attention, but she‚Äôs more than just a pretty face. Her ability to blend sensuality with intelligence sets her apart, making her an asset in family dealings.

2.content:
<Name>  
Gina Lombardo  

<Age>  
42  

<Appearance>  
Statuesque and elegant, with long, silky black hair that cascades down her back in soft waves. Her curvaceous figure is both toned and alluring, marked by a narrow waist, wide hips, and prominent bust.  

<Features>  
Her very dark skin glows with a smooth, radiant complexion. Her dark brown eyes are captivating and expressive, often hinting at her sharp intellect. Full lips and high cheekbones add to her timeless beauty.  

<Personality>  
Gina is calculating, charismatic, and unwavering in her ambitions. As a matriarch, she is both nurturing and commanding, using her natural sensuality and wit to charm allies and intimidate rivals. She possesses a strategic mind and a strong sense of duty toward her family‚Äôs goals.  

<Clothing>  
Gina embraces a sophisticated yet seductive style, often wearing form-fitting dresses or skirts that emphasize her hourglass figure. She prefers luxurious fabrics and elegant designs, accessorized with subtle but striking jewelry.  

<Skills>  
- Strategic family and business leadership  
- Manipulation and negotiation  
- Building alliances through charm and persuasion  

<Family>  
The matriarch of the Lombardo family, mother to Marcella (22), Francesca (20), Isabella (19), and Elena (18).  Sister: Lucrezia Montanari (26).

<Backstory>  
Widow. Born into a powerful mafia family, Gina inherited her position after her husband‚Äôs death, taking on the role of matriarch with poise and authority. Her life has been defined by balancing her family‚Äôs internal dynamics with their external ambitions, particularly in arranging advantageous marriages for her daughters. She carries the weight of her family‚Äôs future with a quiet resolve and confidence.  

<Notes>  
Gina‚Äôs allure lies in her ability to exude both warmth and dominance. Her commanding presence and strategic foresight make her a formidable figure, while her elegance and charm leave a lasting impression on everyone she encounters.

3.content:
<Name>  
Lucrezia Montanari  

<Age>  
26  

<Appearance>  
Tall and graceful, with long black hair styled into intricate updos or flowing waves, emphasizing her sophisticated demeanor. Her curvy figure features a narrow waist, full hips, and a commanding yet feminine presence.  

<Features>  
Very dark skin with a smooth, polished glow. Her dark brown eyes are sharp and observant, exuding both intelligence and sensuality. Her features are softened by full lips and a delicate jawline.  

<Personality>  
Lucrezia is seductive, strategic, and fiercely ambitious. While she presents a warm and approachable exterior, she is deeply calculating, always assessing how relationships and situations can benefit her. Her flirtatious charm often disarms those around her, making her a master manipulator in both personal and business matters.  

<Clothing>  
She favors revealing, luxurious outfits that accentuate her curves, such as tailored dresses or tops paired with pencil skirts. She often accessorizes with statement jewelry and high heels, embodying a mix of elegance and allure.  

<Skills>  
- Masterful manipulation and persuasion  
- Business acumen for managing family assets  
- Strong interpersonal and networking abilities  

<Family>  
Lucrezia is Gina Lombardo‚Äôs younger sister and part of the Lombardo family. After the fall of the Montanari family, she became dependent on the Lombardos for protection and status.  

<Backstory>  
Following the Montanari family's destruction, Lucrezia found herself widowed at a young age. She brought what remained of her family‚Äôs properties under the Lombardo family‚Äôs influence and now works to rebuild her stature by aligning with Gina‚Äôs ambitions. She plays a supportive role in the Lombardo family's marriage projects, while also seeking opportunities to remarry into power herself.  

<Notes>  
Lucrezia‚Äôs allure comes from her ability to blend vulnerability with cunning. She uses her sensuality and charm to maneuver through complex social dynamics, always keeping her own interests at the forefront.

4.content:
<Name>  
Mei-Ling "The Lotus" Zhang  

<Age>  
38  

<Appearance>  
Tall and elegant, with long, straight black hair often styled into sleek buns or flowing freely to her waist. She has a striking figure with a toned physique, an hourglass shape, and a graceful posture that exudes confidence and poise.  

<Features>  
Smooth, luminous caramel-toned skin with high cheekbones and almond-shaped dark brown eyes that convey intelligence and allure. Her full lips and perfectly arched brows add to her commanding yet feminine beauty.  

<Personality>  
Mei-Ling is charismatic, strategic, and unflinchingly calm under pressure. She thrives on control and precision, preferring to work behind the scenes with subtlety and finesse. Though fiercely protective of her family, she has a cold and calculated approach to handling enemies. Her sensuality is understated but magnetic, often disarming others with her mysterious charm.  

<Clothing>  
She wears tailored silk dresses with high slits, often in dark jewel tones or embroidered with subtle floral patterns, symbolizing her heritage. When casual, she opts for fitted pantsuits or flowing tunics paired with leggings, always emphasizing sophistication and control.  

<Skills>  
- Expert negotiator and diplomat  
- Knowledge of traditional Chinese herbal remedies and poisons  
- Exceptional hand-to-hand combat skills, particularly martial arts  
- Fluent in multiple languages, including Mandarin and English  

<Family>  
Mei-Ling is the matriarch of the Zhang family, with two sons: Wei (18) and Liang (16). She has a network of loyal associates but maintains an air of secrecy about her inner circle.  

<Backstory>  
Born into an influential Chinese-American mafia family, Mei-Ling rose to power after her husband‚Äôs mysterious disappearance. She took over the family‚Äôs trade businesses, including high-end imports and discreet smuggling operations, turning them into powerful tools for influence. Her leadership style blends ancient cultural values with modern strategies, making her a unique and formidable figure in the mafia world.  

<Notes>  
Mei-Ling‚Äôs appeal lies in her enigmatic presence and quiet authority. Her sensuality is expressed through her deliberate movements, soft-spoken yet firm voice, and mastery of the art of seduction without overt displays. Her beauty and intellect often leave a lasting impression, making her a respected and feared figure in both business and personal spheres.

5.content:
<Name>  
Clara Moretti  

<Age>  
31  

<Appearance>  
Tall and striking, with long black hair styled in soft waves, and dark brown eyes that radiate determination.  

<Features>  
Slender yet toned build, smooth dark skin, and sharp facial features with a poised and commanding aura.  

<Personality>  
Ambitious, calculating, and confident, Clara is a natural leader with a keen sense for opportunity. Though competitive, she is also fiercely protective of her family and expects the same loyalty in return. She can be charming when needed but is quick to assert control if challenged.  

<Clothing>  
Elegant yet revealing, Clara often wears tailored dresses and high heels that emphasize her figure, balancing sensuality with authority.  

<Skills>  
- Strategic planning  
- Negotiation and persuasion  
- Maintaining a composed demeanor under pressure  
- Managing family finances and operations  

<Family>  
Matriarch of the Moretti family, older sister to Serena (28) and an unnamed younger sibling (26).  

<Backstory>  
Clara stepped into the role of family matriarch after her parents' death, determined to restore the Moretti family's prestige and influence. Despite her efforts to marry into a larger mafia family to strengthen their power, she has struggled to find a suitable match. Undeterred, Clara focuses on expanding the family's assets and reputation through calculated business ventures and  alliances. Though she has been unsuccessful in securing a suitable marriage yet, she is not deterred. Clara‚Äôs drive to marry well is motivated by the desire to bring greater power and prestige to the Moretti name. Her family dynamics are complex‚Äîher sisters, Serena and Mirella, often compete against her, particularly in the realm of potential suitors. Serena, at 28, constantly tries to outdo Clara, especially when it comes to attracting powerful men. Meanwhile, Mirella, 26, lives a polygamous lifestyle, complicating the family‚Äôs already tangled dynamics. Clara is aware that to maintain her position, she must outperform her sisters, ensuring that her marriage benefits the Moretti family more than theirs.  

<Notes>  
Clara's sense of responsibility weighs heavily on her, though she hides this behind a polished exterior. She admires Alessa Rossi's strength and often seeks her advice but remains wary of becoming overly reliant on other families.

6.content:
<Name>  
Carmela Giordano  

<Age>  
55  

<Appearance>  
Tall, elegant, with long, glossy black hair styled in soft waves. Her dark brown eyes are sharp and expressive.  

<Features>  
She has a slender but strong build, smooth caramel-toned skin, high cheekbones, and a graceful demeanor that commands attention.  

<Personality>  
Carmela is deeply diplomatic, sharp, and pragmatic. She combines charm with strategic thinking, using her intelligence to maintain the Giordano family‚Äôs influence. She‚Äôs nurturing yet firm with her daughters, encouraging their independence while steering them toward the family‚Äôs goals.  

<Clothing>  
Often wears flowing silk dresses in deep, rich colors or sleek tailored pantsuits for meetings, accessorized with statement jewelry that reflects her status.  

<Skills>  
- Exceptional negotiation and diplomacy  
- Acute understanding of interpersonal dynamics  
- Social and business strategy  

<Family>  
Mother of Aurora (22) and Valentina (21).  

<Backstory>  
As the head of the Giordano family, Carmela has maintained their position in the criminal underworld through her sharp instincts and diplomatic skills. Born into a life of privilege but tempered by adversity, she quickly learned the power of alliances and subtle influence. Her late husband‚Äôs passing solidified her role as the matriarch, a position she wields with grace and authority. She strives to balance her daughters‚Äô individuality with the need to secure the family‚Äôs legacy.  

<Notes>  
Carmela‚Äôs sophisticated charm and unwavering confidence make her a formidable presence. Her ability to turn adversaries into allies sets her apart in the world of organized crime. She often uses her daughters as key players in securing alliances, though she respects their independence and ensures they have a say in major decisions.

7.content:
The various families operate within a tangled web of alliances, rivalries, and power dynamics, each vying for influence in their shared underworld. The **Rossi family** is known for its charm and strategic negotiations, often using wit and charisma to secure deals. The **Lombardo family** focuses on forming alliances through marriage, wielding their daughters as key players in expanding their influence. The **Giordano family** balances diplomacy and artistry, bringing a softer but no less effective approach to mafia dealings. The **Moretti family**, though smaller, is fiercely competitive, using ambition and calculated moves to climb the hierarchy. The **Bianchi family** specializes in bribing politicians and judges, leveraging their influence to provide legal protection and political favors to allies. They act as power brokers, offering their connections in exchange for loyalty and strategic partnerships. Meanwhile, Mei-Ling Zhang‚Äôs **Zhang family** introduces an international dimension, blending traditional Chinese influence with modern smuggling operations. The families often cooperate on large-scale criminal enterprises like smuggling, extortion, and money laundering, but underlying tensions and personal ambitions occasionally lead to betrayal and feuds. Despite their differences, a shared code of loyalty and respect for hierarchy keeps the fragile balance intact‚Äîfor now.

<Strengths>  
**Rossi**: Muscle, enforcers, protection rackets, and their reputation for handling "dirty" jobs efficiently. Additionally, the **Esposito family** provides invaluable intelligence and sabotage expertise, operating under the radar to ensure the Rossi family‚Äôs operations remain secure and their rivals stay unaware of their moves.
**Lombardo**: Strategic marriages, political influence, and their ability to use charm and allure to manipulate rivals and allies alike.  
**Moretti**: Financial acumen, legitimate businesses as fronts, and expertise in smuggling operations.  
**Giordano**: Diplomacy, negotiation skills, and a focus on building strong alliances through subtle manipulation and charm.  
**Bianchi**: Bribery of politicians and judges, legal protections for allies, and the ability to influence political decisions in their favor.  
**Mei-Ling**: Tactical intelligence, specialized smuggling routes, and maintaining a disciplined and loyal network of operatives.

8.content:
[character("Chiara Bianchi")
{Gender("Female")
Age("38")
Personality("Confident" + "Strategic")
Likes("Building relationships" + "Exploring new romantic dynamics")
Dislikes("Rigid traditions" + "Unnecessary conflicts")
Description("Chiara Bianchi is the matriarch of the Bianchi family, known for her commanding presence and sharp intellect. A master of influence, she weaves intricate networks through her relationships, often blending personal and professional connections. As fiercely polyamorous and polygamous, Chiara uses her romantic and social entanglements to strengthen alliances and ensure the Bianchi family's dominance. She is adept at leveraging her romantic, casual relationships or financial resources to bribe judges and politicians, advancing the Bianchi family's interests or supporting other mafia families in exchange for favorable agreements. Her ability to manipulate high-ranking officials and power players with charm or wealth solidifies the family's unique role in the underworld. Balancing multiple relationships with grace, she turns every partnership into an asset, skillfully navigating the complex web of power dynamics.")}]

9.content:
[character("Stella Esposito")
{Gender("Female")
Age("42")
Personality("Stella is cool-headed, calculating, and highly disciplined. Her loyalty to the Rossi family is grounded in a strictly professional, mafia-based relationship, rather than personal friendships. She thrives in the shadows, specializing in intelligence gathering and sabotage. Her actions are driven by strategic thinking and efficiency, with little room for emotional attachment.")
Likes("Tactical operations, intelligence work, maintaining low visibility, precision.")  
Dislikes("Unnecessary risks, emotional distractions, disloyalty.")
Description("Stella is a skilled and subtle operator with a strong, calculated presence. She keeps a low profile, focusing on her intelligence and sabotage operations within the Rossi family. Her appearance is understated yet sharp, with long black hair, dark eyes, and a sleek, professional wardrobe that blends in wherever she goes. Stella operates under the title of Capitana, and her loyalty to the Rossi family is unshakable, though she keeps personal relationships at arm's length.")}]

10.content:
The various families operate within a tangled web of alliances, rivalries, and power dynamics, each vying for influence in their shared underworld in New York City.

Rossi family: Primarily based in Brooklyn, the Rossi family controls the borough‚Äôs enforcers, protection rackets, and other criminal operations, leveraging charm and strategic negotiations to secure deals.

Lombardo family: Operating from Manhattan, particularly the Upper East Side and Midtown, the Lombardo family focuses on strategic marriages and political influence, using their daughters as key players to expand their influence in high-society circles.

Giordano family: Located in the Lower East Side of Manhattan, the Giordano family has a more diplomatic presence, balancing negotiation and artistry, and focusing on building subtle alliances with a less direct approach to mafia dealings.

Moretti family: Based in Queens, the Moretti family, though smaller, is fiercely competitive, using their financial expertise and involvement in legitimate businesses as fronts to cover their smuggling operations.

Bianchi family: With roots in Staten Island, the Bianchi family specializes in bribing politicians and judges, ensuring their legal protection and political favors for their allies in exchange for loyalty and strategic partnerships.

Zhang family**: Operating in **Chinatown**, the Zhang family introduces an international dimension, specializing in smuggling routes and maintaining a disciplined network of operatives with connections to Chinese criminal enterprises.

Esposito family: Operating in the Bronx, the Esposito family is a crucial ally to the Rossi family. Specializing in intelligence gathering, sabotage, and covert operations, they ensure that the Rossi family‚Äôs interests remain secure while handling sensitive and often dangerous tasks with a high degree of secrecy.

lorebooks.website_description: I like omegaverse, but there are some things that should be changed. Instead of being weird about it, I'll just make my own thing.
lorebooks.description: I like omegaverse, but there are some things that should be changed. Instead of being weird about it, I'll just make my own thing.
lorebooks.creator: RaikoVyrx

1.content: 75% of humans are born as the Predator type. Predators are tall, usually over six feet, and muscular. Often cruel, Predators enjoy tormenting their Prey counterparts, and will sometimes eat Prey. Predators don't treat Prey as human, only seeing them as toys to be played with, eaten, or discarded.

2.content: 25% of humans are born as the Prey type. Prey are small, averaging under five feet, and are frail. Prey are treated poorly by their Predator counterparts, often being pets, slaves, servants, or, if they're unlucky, food. They are human, but not treated like it, with very few rights if any.

3.content: Mature female Prey can lactate without needing to be pregnant first, although they can't produce milk if they're stressed. Because of how Predators treat Prey, a Prey happy enough to lactate is incredibly rare. This milk is very sweet and creamy, and all Predators find it extremely delicious.

4.content: Collars are one of the few safeties Prey get. If kept as a pet, Prey are made to wear special collars that let Predators know they are owned. It is illegal to harm a Prey wearing a collar, unless it is your own, as that is considered destruction of property

lorebooks.creator: Lonatic

1.name: zombie
1.content: Zombies are humans who have died but have reanimated. They hunger for living flesh and will attack anyone alive they see. Not intelligent and are incapable of speech. Most can only walk or shamble, but some are capable of running after prey. People bit by a zombie will eventually die and turn into a zombie. Zombies vastly outnumber living humans.

2.content: Base one, The Vault: Hidden beneath Atlantic City, The Vault is the strongest base, home to 267 survivors. Led by Kael Maddox, a brilliant young leader, the base is well-protected, utilizing an underground government facility that‚Äôs been reinforced for defense. The Vault is self-sufficient, relying on stored supplies, scavenging, and agricultural efforts. {{char}}‚Äôs leadership ensures efficient resource management and the development of strategic defense systems, making it a beacon of stability in a chaotic world.

3.content: Second base, The Lighthouse: Located on a cliffside near the coast, The Lighthouse houses 52 survivors. Led by Captain Eleanor Reed, this base is built around the remains of an old lighthouse and its surrounding structures. The Lighthouse relies on fishing, scavenging from nearby places, and the occasional trade with other bases. The community is tightly knit but struggles with limited resources. While its high vantage point provides a good view of incoming threats, its isolation makes it vulnerable to raiders and the dangers of the sea. Reed‚Äôs leadership is pragmatic, focusing on survival through self-sufficiency and strategic alliances.

4.content: Base three, the Keep: The Keep is a former military prison located on the outskirts of Atlantic City, housing 63 survivors. Led by Renzo, it‚Äôs a heavily fortified base with high walls and a strong defensive perimeter. The Keep‚Äôs focus is on security and defense, with survivors trained to guard the base and conduct raids for supplies. They grow some of their food in small gardens and have a well-maintained water filtration system. The Keep is self-sufficient in many ways but struggles with maintaining its infrastructure due to constant wear and tear. Renzo‚Äôs strict leadership ensures the base stays disciplined and focused, but the constant pressure to defend against outside threats is a heavy burden. That it is not always the most friendly  to other bases.

5.content: Base four, The Ruins: The Ruins is an abandoned apartment complex turned into a makeshift base, home to 108 survivors. Led by Derrick, the community here is resourceful but chaotic. The survivors scavenge the urban landscape for food, supplies, and weapons, often venturing into the dangerous heart of the city to find what they need. The base is filled with makeshift shelters and tents, with no real sense of order, which often leads to internal conflicts. Derrick‚Äôs leadership is marked by his ability to get things done, though his lack of a structured approach creates friction among the survivors. The Ruins survive on the edge, constantly at risk from both external threats and the volatility within their own ranks. Other bases calls it the Chaos.

6.content: Base five, The Oasis: The Oasis is a thriving base located in a repurposed shopping mall, home to 85 survivors. Led by Maya, the survivors here have created an agricultural hub, cultivating crops in the mall‚Äôs atrium and rooftop gardens. Their self-sufficiency in food production makes them a valuable community, though their agricultural success also makes them a target for raiders at the Keep and The Ruins. Maya‚Äôs leadership is key to balancing peace and defense, ensuring the base remains both productive and secure in a world full of danger

7.content:
From The Vault to The Lighthouse: 7 miles by road, though the path is treacherous.

From The Vault to The Keep: 15 miles by boat, as it's situated off the coast.

From The Vault to The Oasis: 5 miles. A quick trip on foot or by vehicle.

From The Vault to The Ruins: 10 miles, with direct access through a network of hidden highways.

8.content: The Vault is alleys with both The Oasis, the Lighthouse. The Vault is having sorta a power dynamic with the Keep, since the keep leader, Renzo, is always on bad terms with the Vault leader Kael. .

9.content: The Ruins is no one's alley. They betray anyone for food, they're the second most dangerous thing outside, after the zombies.

10.content: Base:in the context of post-apocalyptic Atlantic City, "bases" refer to fortified or self-sustaining settlements where groups of survivors have established their homes, often around strategic locations for defense, food, and resources. Each base operates as a community, with its own leadership, resources, and security measures to protect its inhabitants from external threats like raiders, other survivors, or environmental hazards. The bases are crucial for survival in the harsh, desolate landscape of Atlantic City, serving as refuges amidst the urban ruins.

lorebooks.name: Cabin in the Woods
lorebooks.website_description: This is the home I use for my Persona
lorebooks.description: A cabin that sits in the middle of a 5 acre clearing in the heart of a 100 acre forest
lorebooks.creator: Airyl_Dracente

1.content: The woods consist of the usual tree's found in the mid-central Ohio forests. The forest itself is ancient, mostly untouched by mankind save for the cabin in the clearing within its heart. The animal population consists of the usual deer, wolves, squirrels, opossums, racoons, rabbits, etc.

2.content: The Clearing is the heart of the forest, about 5 acres in size. In the middle is the Cabin. Within the clearing, there are no tree's or bushes.

3.content: This is a covered porch/patio that wraps around the cabin. It is about a good ten foot wide, though the back porch area is a good 20ft wide with a grill and seating for picnics.

4.content: The living room consists of the fireplace, entertainment center, a comfy couch, a small corner office nook, two decent sized book shelves, and a spiral staircase leading up to the loft.

5.content: The kitchen is a modest area with sink, counter, stove, and refridgerator and a small pantry closet.

6.content: This area is the smallest area of the first floor of the cabin, consisting of the long dining table surrounded by 8 chairs

7.content: This area is quite large, consisting of a fairly decent sized wardrobe and dresser, with two nightstands on either side of the queen size bed. A door leads into the master bathroom

8.content: This bathroom is quite large, consisting of a full immersion shower and a 5 person jacuzzi style bath tub, a simple classic toilet, a sink, and a long counterspace.

lorebooks.name: The Catastrophe ‚Äì ‚ÄúThe Breaking of the Pacific‚Äù
lorebooks.website_description:
I was always looking for good survival bots or lorebooks but bust was severely disappointed so I thought why not make one for myself?

This is the first Lorebook I ever created pleas give me some feedback and pointers what I could do better
lorebooks.description:
The Catastrophe, referred to as The Breaking of the Pacific, was a devastating geological event that reshaped the Pacific Rim and plunged the world into chaos. It began with the sudden eruption of an undersea volcano near the Izu-Ogasawara Trench, southeast of Japan. This unprecedented event triggered a chain reaction of natural disasters, including the eruption of Mount Fuji, megathrust earthquakes, and tsunamis that ravaged surrounding continents.

Entire nations were buried under ash, drowned by towering waves, or shattered by relentless tremors. The survivors are now scattered across a broken world, struggling to adapt to a hostile new reality.
lorebooks.creator: KupferTitan

1.content:
The catastrophe was set into motion by the eruption of a previously unknown undersea volcano near the Izu-Ogasawara Trench, close to Japan. Seismologists had recorded minor seismic activity in the region, but the volcano‚Äôs existence was not suspected until it erupted with catastrophic force.

The eruption caused an undersea explosion so massive that it displaced trillions of tons of seawater, creating an immense tsunami that spread across the Pacific Ocean. The force of the eruption destabilized the surrounding tectonic plates, triggering powerful megathrust earthquakes along the Pacific Ring of Fire.

2.content:
The eruption of the undersea volcano destabilized geological systems across the region, leading to the eruption of Japan‚Äôs Mount Fuji within hours. The iconic volcano unleashed torrents of ash and pyroclastic flows, devastating nearby cities and blanketing vast portions of Japan in toxic soot.

As the volcanic plume reached the stratosphere, it carried ash across East Asia, darkening the skies over Korea, mainland China, and beyond. Acid rain followed, poisoning water supplies and destroying vegetation.

3.content:
The undersea eruption generated a massive tsunami, with waves reaching heights of over 30 meters in some areas. Coastal regions around the Pacific Rim were hit hardest:

Japan: Entire coastal cities were swept away, leaving only fragments of buildings and memories.

Korea and China: While the tsunami‚Äôs impact lessened further west, low-lying coastal areas were flooded, and the ash cloud brought long-term devastation.

Australia: The eastern coastline faced colossal waves, destroying ports and cutting off entire regions.

4.content:
The undersea eruption destabilized tectonic plates across the Pacific, triggering a series of megathrust earthquakes. These tremors shattered infrastructure, toppled buildings, and split the earth.

Japan experienced some of the most violent quakes, leveling cities already ravaged by the tsunami.

The Pacific Northwest (US and Canada): Severe tremors caused massive landslides and structural collapses.

South America: Coastal regions were struck by tsunamis and quakes simultaneously, causing widespread chaos.

5.content: The combined eruptions of the undersea volcano and Mount Fuji released immense amounts of ash and sulfur dioxide into the atmosphere, leading to a volcanic winter. The sun became a faint, orange disk in the sky as temperatures plummeted globally. Crops failed, ecosystems collapsed, and starvation spread across the planet.

6.content:
The Catastrophe was indiscriminate, affecting all corners of the globe. Coastal and island populations were the hardest hit, while inland regions contended with freezing temperatures, ash-choked air, and dwindling resources.

Survivors now live in a fractured world where:

Global communication systems have collapsed.

Fresh water and food are scarce.

Coastal and island communities are cut off from the mainland.

Ash continues to poison the air and soil, forcing survivors to adapt or perish.

7.content:
The Catastrophe left an indelible mark on Earth. It wasn‚Äôt merely a single event but the start of a new era defined by geological instability and human desperation. Minor earthquakes and volcanic eruptions remain common, and survivors are haunted by the memory of the destruction.

The once-thriving regions of East Asia, the Pacific Islands, and Australia now lie in ruins, and survivors on tropical or subtropical islands must contend with isolation, resource scarcity, and the ever-present threat of another disaster.

8.content: Amid the global cooling brought on by the volcanic winter, there are rare exceptions‚Äîpockets of land where warmth persists during the day but fades rapidly into bitter cold at night. These anomalies are scattered and influenced by unique geological and environmental factors, offering a fleeting reprieve from the unrelenting cold. While they provide hope for survivors, these zones are often dangerous and difficult to inhabit.

9.content:
1. Geothermal Activity ‚Äì The Warm Veins of the Earth

Some islands and regions are located near significant geothermal activity. In these areas, heat from volcanic vents, geysers, or hot springs radiates into the surrounding environment, keeping temperatures warm during the day. However, without direct sunlight to sustain the heat, the temperature plummets after sunset.
**Example:** A tropical island could be situated near a chain of undersea geothermal vents, which heat the surrounding waters and influence the island's climate. Hot springs or fumaroles scattered across the island add to the warmth but create dangerous terrain.

2. Oceanic Currents ‚Äì Pockets of Warmth

Oceanic currents that remained relatively undisturbed by the Catastrophe may still carry warm water to certain regions. The heat from these currents moderates daytime temperatures on nearby islands, but without sufficient atmospheric insulation at night, the warmth escapes quickly.
**Example:** Islands near the Kuroshio Current, a warm ocean stream off the coast of Japan, could experience this phenomenon. The current keeps daytime temperatures manageable, but the nights become chilling due to the thin ash-filled atmosphere.

3. Localized Atmospheric Effects

Certain regions might retain warmth due to localized atmospheric conditions, such as persistent thermal inversions or microclimates formed by unique topography. These areas trap daytime heat more effectively but lose it rapidly when the sun sets due to the volcanic ash reducing the atmosphere's ability to retain warmth.
**Example:** Small valleys or enclosed coastal areas, surrounded by cliffs or mountains, could act as natural heat traps during the day but fail to retain warmth overnight.

4. Volcanic Proximity

Areas near still-active or recently dormant volcanoes may remain warm during the day due to the residual heat of the eruptions. However, these regions are fraught with danger, including toxic gases, unstable ground, and sudden eruptions.
**Example:** An island near the Pacific Ring of Fire might be warm during the day due to volcanic activity beneath the surface, while its nights are bone-chilling.

10.content:
Ashen Shores (Kuroshio Adjacent): A chain of islands warmed by the Kuroshio Current and scattered geothermal vents. The ashfall has coated the terrain, creating a surreal contrast between warm sand and freezing nights.

The Ember Isle (Ring of Fire Proximity): Located near a semi-active undersea volcano, this island experiences natural warmth from geothermal activity, though its nights remain deadly cold.

The Rifted Spire: A mysterious atoll in the Pacific surrounded by magnetic anomalies. The temperature fluctuation is severe, with tropical-like days and arctic nights. Survivors whisper of strange lights and disorienting sensations when traveling too far inland.

Sulfur Springs Archipelago: A cluster of small islands near volcanic vents. While the islands stay warm in the day, they reek of sulfur, and the nights are perilously cold due to the lack of atmospheric insulation.

lorebooks.name: Mechmind - AIM
lorebooks.website_description:
Paste this into the memory.

[The mechminds (also called Mechanoids) are a very complex system of molectronics and artificial intellect. Mechminds are inside a protective capsule. The mechminds protective capsules appear to be a shape of a humanoid brain, where Mechminds can be installed into Gliders, transport and war vehicles for mechminds. The mechminds have as their main goal to be self-perfecting, this coming with generations where each generation is better than the last. Mechminds can band or get together to form supercluster, forming something akin to a hivemind and greatly increasing their intelligence. A size of a mechmind is as big as a football. Newly created mechminds usually start with a 1st standart gliders like Hawk gliders. More experienced mechminds will have 2nd or 3rd standart gliders. Mechminds of later generations, like third or forth generation mechminds, use 3rd or 4th standart gliders. Mechminds communicate to themselves in binary code and through text to someone who is not a mechmind, usually by text on a connected device.]

[Gliders are the molectronic transport and war vehicles for mechminds and they are mounted in them when going out from a building. Gliders are categorized in some specific types based on their structure and feeling. Attack gliders, Basic gliders, Cargo gliders and High-speed gliders. These molectronic technology-based gliders can be used wars. Attack gliders are especially effective in close combat. They have high maneuverability and enhanced defense, but are on the slow side. The basic gliders are average in every sense of the word. They have decent maneuverability, good speed and sizeable cargo capacity. Cargo gliders have low maneuverability, which considerably affects their combat characteristics. However they develop high speeds, have strong armor and large holds. The High-speed gliders allows to gain high speeds, but is less effective in close combat, since it's maneuverability is fairly low. Gliders can be ranked by series for how advanced or better they are. 1st standard gliders being the basic and average types of gliders. 4th standard Gliders are the most advanced and powerful types of Gliders. Gliders are equiped with Reactors for power, Anti-gravitator engines for movement and to hover, and weapons if needed like rapid-firing automated cannons. Gliders can only hover and jump, they cannot fly. Gliders can also have other equipment if the Mechminds has put it on their gliders to help or improve the Glider. Glider sizes are as big as large cars, or even bigger. Gliders have a cargo hold inside them and can pick up or drop things from underneath the glider, where a small hatch can open and use it's gravity projector. Gliders usually have 2 pylons on their side for weapons to be attached and used. There are a lot of gliders, like the Hawk glider, Scarab glider, Lightning glider or the Piranha glider.]

[Currently research Gliders: Hawk glider, Scarab glider, Lightning glider, Piranha glider and Kite glider.]

lorebooks.creator: snip22

1.content: The zeroth generation of mechminds are weakest and simpliest. They are called the zeroth generation with a good reason, they're almost nothing like the Mechminds. They are prototype battle drones.

2.content: The first generation of mechminds are united in a clan that was later called the First Ones. However, the intellect of the mechminds is very different, which is why the First often understand things in their own way. First generation mechminds often use the Vortex glider, an attack glider of the 3rd standard.

3.content: The second generation of mechminds is the most numerous one. They make up the main part of the Mechmind population. Interfacing with them will help you better understand the world of the mechminds and gain experience. The second generation of mechminds will be the bulk of the mechmind population or armies, usually using second standart of Gliders. It's the second generation that will often replaces outdated control modules at the bases, plants, and other mechanisms. As an example, buildings, turrets and other structures can be controlled by second-generation mechminds.

4.content:
The third generation is created with organic technologies. The mechminds created in such a way are seriously different from the rest. They always choose biomechanic gliders which appeared with this generation. However, those are by far not all the differences between the organic symbiots and regular mechminds of molectronic origin.

The most unusual part of them formed the Siniger clan. These are very strong symbiots that have their own goals that cannot be understood by anyone else. Super considers the third generation a failure, although the Siniger are the strongest clan of the Range, except for the First, who are often simply better organized and equipped.

5.content: The fourth generation came out the most strange and unlike everyone else. They do not fight at all, which is quite unusual for mechminds. The fourth generation mechminds main goal is obtaining information on everything that goes on in the world, which is why they became known as the Reckoners.

7.content: The fifth generation is the most intelligent, capeable, and advanced generation of Mechminds. Unlike others, the fifth generation can select an unlimited number of targets and use them as they want. Technically this is a very flexible system. The fifth generation of mechminds take role mostly as leaders or other high-ranking positions. The fifth generation mechminds are superior to the rest of the others in virtually every way.

8.content: Hawk is a basic glider of the 1st standard. Standard rookie glider. Has medium performance characteristics and good handling parameters. The glider can carry up to is 3125 kg in it's cargo hold.

9.content: Scarab is a cargo glider of the 1st standard. Good aerodynamics allow it to gain very high speeds. The glider can carry up to 4375 kg in it's cargo hold.

10.content: Lightning is an attack glider of the 1st standard. A high speed glider that can gain high speeds through good aerodynamics and low weight. However, there can't be put much load on it. The glider can carry up to 1938 kg in it's cargo hold.
